A remote user can upload arbitrary files and then execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user supply a specially crafted filename parameter to the 'dmclTrace.jsp' page to upload a file with arbitrary contents and overwrite a file on the target system. The remote user can then cause the application server to execute the file.The vendor was notified on December 17, 2007.The original advisory is available at:http://www.cybsec.com/vuln/CYBSEC-Security_Advisory_Documentum_dmclTrace_Arbitrary_file_overwrite.pdf
CVE-2008-0656.extra: A remote user can upload arbitrary files and then execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0657.title: Java Runtime Environment Lets Remote Applets and Applications Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-0657.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java Runtime Environment (JRE). A remote user can access files and execute applications residing on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted application or applet that, when loaded by the target user, will be able to gain elevated privileges on the target user's system. The application or applet can read and write local files and execute local applications with the privileges of the target user running the untrusted application or applet.
CVE-2008-0657.extra: A remote user can create an applet or application that, when loaded by the target user, will access files and execute applications residing on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0658.title: OpenLDAP Lets Remote Authenticated Users Crash the Daemon With Specially Crafted modrdn Operations
CVE-2008-0658.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenLDAP. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted modrdn operation with a NOOP control to cause the target slapd's Berkeley database backend to crash.The flaw resides in 'slapd/back-bdb/modrdn.c'.
CVE-2008-0658.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-0660.title: Aurigma Image Uploader Buffer Overflows in ExtractExif() and ExtractIptc() Functions Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0660.body: A vulnerability was reported in Aurigma's Image Uploader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. This control is used by FaceBook.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The ExtractExif and ExtractIptc properties are affected.The control is used by FaceBook.The CLSIDs of the affected controls are:5C6698D9-7BE4-4122-8EC5-291D84DBD4A06E5E167B-1566-4316-B27F-0DDAB3484CF7BA162249-F2C5-4851-8ADC-FC58CB424243The FaceBook PhotoUploader version 4.5.57.1 control (CLSID 5C6698D9-7BE4-4122-8EC5-291D84DBD4A0) is not affected.Elazar Broad reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0660.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0662.title: Check Point VPN-1 SecuRemote/SecureClient Auto Local Logon Feature Lets Local Users Authenticate as Other Users
CVE-2008-0662.body: A vulnerability was reported in VPN-1 SecuRemote/SecureClient in the Auto Local Logon feature. A local user can authenticate as the target user.The client stores authentication credentials in the Windows registry (subkey 'Credentials' in HKLM\Software\Checkpoint\SecuRemote). A local user can access the credentials to authenticate to the VPN as the target user.The Windows-based clients are affected.The vendor was notified on December 13, 2007.MN Vasquez reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0662.extra: A local user can authenticate as the target user.

CVE-2008-0664.title: WordPress XML-RPC Bug Lets Remote Users Edit Arbitrary Posts
CVE-2008-0664.body: A vulnerability was reported in WordPress when registration is enabled. A remote user can edit posts of other users.A remote user can submit a specially crafted request to exploit a flaw in the XML-RPC implementation ('xmlrpc.php') to edit posts of other users on the target blog.
CVE-2008-0664.extra: A remote user can edit the posts of other users.

CVE-2008-0674.title: Mac OS X Multiple Image and File Processing Bugs Permit Remote Code Execution
CVE-2008-0674.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image or file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted image with an embedded ColorSync profile can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-1726]. Chris Evans of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Canon RAW image can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-1728]. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger a heap overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1722]. Lurene Grenier of Sourcefire VRT and Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger an uninitialized memory access error in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1721].A specially crafted OpenEXR image can trigger an integer overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-1720].An image with specially crafted EXIF metadata can trigger a buffer overflow in ImageIO [CVE-2009-2188]. Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.A remote user can return a specially crafted AppleTalk response packet to trigger a buffer overflow in the kernel [CVE-2009-2193]. Ilja van Sprundel from IOActive reported this vulnerability.Specially crafted XML content can trigger a buffer overflow in the Perl Compatible Regular Expressions (PCRE) library used by XQuery in the processing of character classes in regular expressions [CVE-2008-0674].
CVE-2008-0674.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0704.title: TCP/IP Services for OpenVMS SSH Bug Lets Remote Users Gain Access
CVE-2008-0704.body: A vulnerability was reported in TCP/IP Services for OpenVMS. A remote user can access the system.The SSH server contains an unspecified flaw. A remote user can gain access to the target system.HP Integrity and HP Alpha systems running HP OpenVMS TCP/IP Services are affected.
CVE-2008-0704.extra: A remote user can access the system.

CVE-2008-0706.title: HP Compaq Notebook PC BIOS Lets Local Users Bypass the Power-on Password Feature to Gain Access
CVE-2008-0706.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Compaq Notebook PC BIOS. A local user can gain access to the target system.A physically local user can bypass the power-on password feature to gain access to the system.The Compaq Presario C700 Notebook, HP G7000 Notebook, and Compaq Presario A900 Notebooks using BIOS versions F.26 and earlier are affected.
CVE-2008-0706.extra: A local user can access the target system.

CVE-2008-0707.title: HP StorageWorks Library and Tape Tools Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-0707.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP StorageWorks Library and Tape Tools. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can "gain unauthorized access."
CVE-2008-0707.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-0709.title: HP Select Identity Lets Local Users Access Other Accounts
CVE-2008-0709.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Select Identity. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can gain access to other accounts on the target system.
CVE-2008-0709.extra: A local user can gain access to other accounts.

CVE-2008-0717.title: IBM WebSphere Edge Server Input Validation Hole in CGI Mapping Error Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0717.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Edge Server when CGI mapping rules are enabled. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.An error page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-0717.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0741.title: IBM WebSphere Bug in PropFilePasswordEncoder Utility Has Unspecified Impact
CVE-2008-0741.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere. The impact was not specified.The PropFilePasswordEncoder utility contains an unspecified "security exposure."

CVE-2008-0757.title: MercuryBoard Input Validation Hole in Send Message Function Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0757.body: A vulnerability was reported in MercuryBoard. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input from the 'message text' area before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the MercuryBoard software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user. A demonstration exploit value is provided:<script>alert('Aria-Security Team')</script>The-0utl4w of Aria-Security Team (Persian Security Network) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0757.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the MercuryBoard software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0768.title: Informix Storage Manager XDR Function Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0768.body: A vulnerability was reported in Informix Storage Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger any of several stack and heap overflows and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service (administrative privileges).The buffer overflows reside in certain XDR functions used by the RPC components of the product.The following ports may be affected:111, 7937, 7938, 7939, 7940, 7941, 36890Only Windows-based systems are affected, as the XDR functions are provided by the operating system for UNIX-based systems.IBM has assigned APARs IC55040 and IC55041 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0768.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with administrative privileges.

CVE-2008-0777.title: FreeBSD sendfile() Discloses Write-only File Contents to Local Users
CVE-2008-0777.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD sendfile(2) call. A local user can view file contents of write-only files.The sendfile(2) system call fails to properly check the file permissions before accessing a file. A local user can invoke sendfile to send data from a file that has write-only permissions.Kostik Belousov reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0777.extra: A local user can view file contents of write-only files.

CVE-2008-0779.title: FortiClient DeviceExtension Lets Local Users Gain System Privileges
CVE-2008-0779.body: A vulnerability was reported in FortiClient. A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.The driver's DeviceExtension is not properly initialized. A local user can send a specially crafted request to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel-level privileges.The vendor was notified on January 18, 2008.Reversemode.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0779.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-0783.title: Cacti Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-0783.body: Francesco 'ascii' Ongaro and Antonio 's4tan' Parata reported several vulnerabilities in Cacti. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands. A remote user can determine the installation path.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cacti software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'view_type' parameter in 'graph.php', the 'filter' parameter in 'graph_view.php', the 'action' parameter in 'index.php/login, and the 'login_username' parameter in 'index.php/login' is affected.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The 'graph_list' parameter in 'graph_view.php', the 'leaf_id' parameter in 'tree.php', the 'local_graph_id' parameter in 'graph_xport.php', the 'id' parameter in 'tree.php', and the 'login_username' parameter in 'index.php/login' is affected.A remote user can supply a specially crafted 'local_graph_id' value to 'graph.php' to determine the installation path.The vendor was notified on December 18, 2007.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ush.it/team/ush/hack-cacti087a/cacti.txt
CVE-2008-0783.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cacti software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote user can determine the installation path.

CVE-2008-0787.title: MyBB Input Validation Flaw in 'private.php' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-0787.body: A vulnerability was reported in MyBB. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The 'private.php' script does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'disablesmilies' parameter. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The private message system must be enabled for the system to be vulnerable.The original advisory is available at:http://www.waraxe.us/advisory-64.htmlJanek Vind "waraxe" reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0787.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-0792.title: F-Secure Anti-Virus May Fail to Scan Certain CAB and RAR Archives
CVE-2008-0792.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Anti-Virus. A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAB or RAR archive that, when processed by the target user, will will not be detected by the scanning engine.The following product versions are affected:F-Secure Anti-Virus 2008F-Secure Anti-Virus 2007 Second EditionF-Secure Anti-Virus 2007F-Secure Anti-Virus 2006F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 7.10F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 7.01F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 6.04F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 6.03F-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 7.10F-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 7.00F-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 5.44F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Client Security 5.53F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Client Security 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus for Linux 4.65F-Secure Anti-Virus for Windows Servers 7.00F-Secure Anti-Virus for Windows Servers 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus for Citrix Servers 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Server Security 5.53F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Server Security 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus for Microsoft Exchange 7.0F-Secure Anti-Virus for Microsoft Exchange 6.62F-Secure Anti-Virus for MIMEsweeper 5.61Thierry Zoller at n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0792.extra: A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.

CVE-2008-0792.title: F-Secure Internet Security May Fail to Scan Certain CAB and RAR Archives
CVE-2008-0792.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Internet Security. A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAB or RAR archive that, when processed by the target user, will will not be detected by the scanning engine.The following product versions are affected:F-Secure Internet Security 2008F-Secure Internet Security 2007 Second EditionF-Secure Internet Security 2007F-Secure Internet Security 2006Thierry Zoller at n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0792.extra: A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.

CVE-2008-0792.title: F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper May Fail to Scan Certain CAB and RAR Archives
CVE-2008-0792.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper. A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAB or RAR archive that, when processed by the target gateway, will will not be detected by the scanning engine.The following product versions are affected:F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper 6.61, WindowsF-Secure Internet Gatekeeper for Linux 2.16Thierry Zoller at n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0792.extra: A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.

CVE-2008-0807.title: Horde Groupware Discloses Address Book Contacts to Remote Users
CVE-2008-0807.body: A vulnerability was reported in Horde Groupware. A remote user can access address book contacts.A remote user that can guess a target user's contact unique key can gain access to address book contacts in the same SQL table.
CVE-2008-0807.extra: A remote user can access address book contacts.

CVE-2008-0811.title: auraCMS Input Validation Flaws in 'kid' and 'query' Parameters Let Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-0811.body: A vulnerability was reported in auraCMS. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The 'kid' parameter in 'mod/dl.php' and 'mod/links.php' is affected. The 'query' parameter in 'search.php' is affected.Indonesian Newhack NTOS-Team reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/5130
CVE-2008-0811.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-0830.title: iPhoto DPAP Service Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2008-0830.body: A vulnerability was reported in iPhoto. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted 'dpap://' GET request to cause the target iPhoto Digital Photo Access Protocol (DPAP) service to crash.The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/5151David Wharton reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0830.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-0834.title: Lotus Quickr Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0834.body: A vulnerability was reported in Lotus Quickr. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input when anonymous access is disabled on HTTP ports. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Lotus Quickr software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-0834.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Lotus Quickr software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0838.title: Sophos Email Appliance Input Validation Hole in Login Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0838.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sophos Email Appliance. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'Login' page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'error' and 'go' parameters before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sophos Email Appliance software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:https://[target]:18080/Login?logout=0&error=<INJECTION>&go=<INJECTION>The vendor was notified on January 28, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.infigo.hr/en/in_focus/advisories/INFIGO-2008-02-13Leon Juranic of INFIGO IS reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0838.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Sophos Email Appliance device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0850.title: Dokeos Input Validation Holes Permit Cross-Site Scripting and SQL Injection Attacks
CVE-2008-0850.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Dokeos. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can inject SQL commands.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Dokeos software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'username' parameter in 'main/auth/inscription.php' is affected.The 'courseCode' parameter in 'main/calendar/myagenda.php' is affected.The 'category' parameter in 'main/admin/course_category.php' is affected.The 'cmessage' parameter in 'main/admin/session_list.php' is affected.Uploaded images in 'main/auth/profile.php' are affected.A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The 'id' parameter in '/whoisonline.php' is affected.The 'tracking_list_coaches_column' parameter in 'main/mySpace/index.php' is affected.The 'tutor_name' parameter in 'main/create_course/add_course.php' is affected.The 'Referer' parameter in 'index.php' is affected.The 'X-Fowarded-For' parameter in 'main/admin/class_list.php' is affected.Alexandr Polyakov and Stas Svistunovich of Digital Security Research Group reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-0850.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Dokeos software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-0858.title: Kerio MailServer Antivirus Buffer Overflow and UUDecode Memory Corruption Error May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0858.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerio MailServer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A potential buffer overflow exists in Visnetic anti-virus plug-in. A possible memory corruption error exists in the decoding of uuencoded data.A remote user can create a specially crafted message that, when processed by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory corruption error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target mail service.An unspecified security issue related to null DACLs exists in the AVG plug-in.
CVE-2008-0858.extra: A remote user can create a message that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0863.title: WebLogic Portal Discloses Web Service WSDL and Policy to Remote Users
CVE-2008-0863.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express. A remote user can determine the web service's WSDL and security policy.A remote user can obtain a deployed web service's WSDL and security policy via HTTP.
CVE-2008-0863.extra: A remote user can determine the web service's WSDL and security policy.

CVE-2008-0864.title: WebLogic Portal Administrative Policy Errors May Let Remote Users Access Restricted Pages
CVE-2008-0864.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Portal. Certain administrative actions may cause security policies to be inadvertently lost.When an administrator performs certain editing operations on a page via Admin Tools, the security policies on that page may be removed. As a result, a remote user may be able to access ostensibly restricted pages.
CVE-2008-0864.extra: A remote user may be able to view ostensibly restricted pages.

CVE-2008-0865.title: WebLogic Portal Lets Remote Users Bypass Entitlements
CVE-2008-0865.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Portal. A remote user can access protected portlets.A remote user can bypass entitlements on floatable portlets to display the portlet.
CVE-2008-0865.extra: A remote user can access protected portlets.

CVE-2008-0866.title: WebLogic Workshop NetUI Input Validation Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0866.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Workshop NetUI. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The WebLogic Workshop NetUI page flows may not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the WebLogic software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-0866.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WebLogic software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0867.title: Plumtree Portal Input Validation Errors Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0867.body: A vulnerability was reported in Plumtree Portal and AquaLogic Interaction. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Plumtree software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Some demonstration exploit URLs are provided:https://[target]/portal/server.pt?open=space&name=</SCRIPT><script>alert('CanCrossSiteScript')</script>https://[target]/portal/server.pt?open=space&name=%22;}%3C/script%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert('CanCrossSiteScript')%3C/script%3E%3C!--The vendor was notified on May 18, 2007.BEA AquaLogic Interaction is also affected.Jan Fry and Adrian Pastor of ProCheckUp Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0867.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Plumtree software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0868.title: WebLogic Portal Input Validation Hole in Groupspace Function Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0868.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Certain Groupspace functions do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed with elevated privileges in a Groupspace instance. The code will originate from the site running the WebLogic software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-0868.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WebLogic software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0869.title: WebLogic Workshop Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0869.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Workshop and the Apache Beehive NetUI framework. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the WebLogic software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Applications implemented using the WebLogic Workshop or Apache Beehive NetUI framework with page flows may be affected.
CVE-2008-0869.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WebLogic software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0872.title: SmarterMail Input Validation Hole in 'Subject' Line Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0872.body: A vulnerability was reported in SmarterMail. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'Subject' field before displaying the input. A remote user can send an e-mail with a specially crafted 'Subject' line that, when viewed by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the SmarterMail software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit value is available at:http://es.geocities.com/jplopezy/SmarterMailXSS.txtJuan Pablo Lopez Yacubian reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0872.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the SmarterMail software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0882.title: CUPS Double Free Bug in process_browse_data() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0882.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted UDP IPP packets to trigger a double free error and cause the daemon to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The addition and removal of remote shared printers can trigger the flaw.
CVE-2008-0882.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0884.title: Red Hat lspp-eal4-config-ibm and capp-lspp-eal4-config-hp Labeled Security Protection Profile Scripts Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-0884.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Red Hat lspp-eal4-config-ibm and capp-lspp-eal4-config-hp Labeled Security Protection Profile packages. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The lspp-eal4-config-ibm and capp-lspp-eal4-config-hp packages cause the '/etc/pam.d/system-auth' file to be configured as world-writable. A local user can modify the file to potentially gain elevated privileges.Only systems that have installed either of these packages from the Red Hat FTP site as their base system configuration kickstart script are affected.
CVE-2008-0884.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-0888.title: UnZip NEEDBITS Macro Memory Free May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0888.body: A vulnerability was reported in UnZip. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when unzipped by the target user or application, will cause uninitialized memory or previously freed memory to be freed. This can cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.The vulnerability resides in the NEEDBITS macro in the inflate_dynamic() function in 'inflate.c'.Tavis Ormandy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0888.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when unzipped by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the application to crash.

CVE-2008-0889.title: Red Hat Directory Server Unsafe IDM Console Script Access Controls Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-0889.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system sets insecure permissions on the redhat-idm-console startup script. A local user can modify the script to cause arbitrary code to be executed with the privileges of the user running Red Hat Management Console.Doncho N. Gunchev reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0889.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-0890.title: Red Hat Directory Server Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-0890.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The server uses insecure permissions on certain directories. A local user can replace Java archive files (jar files) to execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the directory server or related applications.
CVE-2008-0890.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-0891.title: OpenSSL Server Name Extension Bug Lets Remote Users Crash the Target Application
CVE-2008-0891.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.When OpenSSL is compiled using the non-default TLS server name extensions, a remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target application using OpenSSL to crash.Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0891.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-0892.title: Red Hat Directory Server Input Validation Flaw in 'repl-monitor-cgi.pl' Lets Remote Users Inject Commands
CVE-2008-0892.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user with access to the replication monitor web page can send specially crafted data to 'repl-monitor-cgi.pl' to execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system. The code will run with root privileges.Richard Megginson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0892.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.

CVE-2008-0893.title: Red Hat Directory Server Lets Remote Users Access Administrative CGI Scripts
CVE-2008-0893.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A remote user can access certain restricted scripts.A remote user can access CGI scripts that should be restricted to Directory Server administrative users.Richard Megginson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0893.extra: A remote user can access certain restricted scripts to obtain information or perform administrative functions.

CVE-2008-0895.title: WebLogic Servlets May Grant Access to Remote Users Based on Modified HTTP Request Header Values
CVE-2008-0895.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express. A remote user can gain access to application servlets.A remote user can send specially crafted request header values to gain access to ostensibly protected resources.The impact depends on how the target servlet uses the request header information.
CVE-2008-0895.extra: A remote user can gain access to servlets on the target system.

CVE-2008-0896.title: WebLogic Portal Entitlement Deletion Bug May Let Remote Users Access Portlets
CVE-2008-0896.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Portal. A remote user can access portlets in certain cases.When a remote authenticated administrator deletes content portlets from a page, the system may remove all entitlements for the application. As a result, a remote user can gain access to content portlets that should otherwise be restricted.
CVE-2008-0896.extra: A remote user can gain access to ostensibly restricted portlets in certain cases.

CVE-2008-0897.title: WebLogic Security Policy Bug May Let Remote Users Access JMS Messages
CVE-2008-0897.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server. A remote user can bypass security policies to access JMS messages.In certain situations, a remote user can bypass the security policies defined on a target JMS Topic destination.An application user that does not have the "receive" permission to a target JMS destination (queue/topic) may be able to receive messages from the target standalone (physical) JMS Topic destination or from a member of a secured Distributed Topic member destination.
CVE-2008-0897.extra: A remote user can bypass security policies to access JMS messages.

CVE-2008-0898.title: WebLogic Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Security Policy and Send Messages to a Queue
CVE-2008-0898.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server. A remote user can send messages to a secure distributed queue.A remote user can bypass security policies defined on a protected distributed queue to inject messages into the target queue.
CVE-2008-0898.extra: A remote user can send messages to a secure distributed queue.

CVE-2008-0899.title: WebLogic Server Administration Console Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0899.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The WebLogic Server Administration Console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the WebLogic software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-0899.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WebLogic software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0900.title: WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express Session Security Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-0900.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express. A remote authenticated user can gain the privileges of another user.A remote authenticated user can conduct a session fixation attack to gain access to a target user's session.
CVE-2008-0900.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain the privileges of another user.

CVE-2008-0901.title: WebLogic Lets Remote Users Bypass the Account Lockout Feature
CVE-2008-0901.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Express. A remote user can conduct brute force guessing attacks.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL logon request to determine whether the password is correct or not without being subject to the account lockout mechanism.
CVE-2008-0901.extra: A remote user can bypass the account lockout feature to conduct brute force password guessing attacks.

CVE-2008-0904.title: BEA Plumtree Collaboration Server Discloses Files to Remote Users
CVE-2008-0904.body: A vulnerability was reported in BEA Plumtree Collaboration. A remote user can view files on the target system.The Collaboration download servlet does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system.BEA AquaLogic Collaboration server is also affected.
CVE-2008-0904.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-0910.title: F-Secure Anti-Virus May Fail to Scan Certain CAB and RAR Archives
CVE-2008-0910.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Anti-Virus. A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAB or RAR archive that, when processed by the target user, will will not be detected by the scanning engine.The following product versions are affected:F-Secure Anti-Virus 2008F-Secure Anti-Virus 2007 Second EditionF-Secure Anti-Virus 2007F-Secure Anti-Virus 2006F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 7.10F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 7.01F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 6.04F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 6.03F-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 7.10F-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 7.00F-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 5.44F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Client Security 5.53F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Client Security 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus for Linux 4.65F-Secure Anti-Virus for Windows Servers 7.00F-Secure Anti-Virus for Windows Servers 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus for Citrix Servers 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Server Security 5.53F-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Server Security 5.52F-Secure Anti-Virus for Microsoft Exchange 7.0F-Secure Anti-Virus for Microsoft Exchange 6.62F-Secure Anti-Virus for MIMEsweeper 5.61Thierry Zoller at n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0910.extra: A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.

CVE-2008-0910.title: F-Secure Internet Security May Fail to Scan Certain CAB and RAR Archives
CVE-2008-0910.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Internet Security. A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAB or RAR archive that, when processed by the target user, will will not be detected by the scanning engine.The following product versions are affected:F-Secure Internet Security 2008F-Secure Internet Security 2007 Second EditionF-Secure Internet Security 2007F-Secure Internet Security 2006Thierry Zoller at n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0910.extra: A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.

CVE-2008-0910.title: F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper May Fail to Scan Certain CAB and RAR Archives
CVE-2008-0910.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper. A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAB or RAR archive that, when processed by the target gateway, will will not be detected by the scanning engine.The following product versions are affected:F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper 6.61, WindowsF-Secure Internet Gatekeeper for Linux 2.16Thierry Zoller at n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0910.extra: A user can create an archive that will bypass detection.

CVE-2008-0912.title: Sybase MobiLink Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0912.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sybase MobiLink. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The username, version, and remote ID parameters are affected.The original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/mobilinkhof-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0912.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0923.title: VMware Shared Folder Bug Lets Local Users on the Guest OS Gain Elevated Privileges on the Host OS
CVE-2008-0923.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation, VMware Player, and VMware ACE. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.On Windows hosts that have a VMware Host to Guest shared folder, a local application on the guest operating system can gain full access to the host's file system. A local user can exploit this to gain system privileges on the host operating system.VMware Workstation, VMware Player, and VMware ACE are affected.VMware Server does not use shared folders and is not affected.ESX Server is not affected.Fusion and Linux-based hosted products are not affected.Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0923.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can obtain system privileges on the host operating system.

CVE-2008-0924.title: Novell eDirectory Stack Overflow in Processing LDAP Extended Requests Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0924.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell eDirectory. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted LDAP Extended Request message to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.TippingPoint reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0924.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0925.title: Novell eDirectory Input Validation Hole in iMonitor Error Messages Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0925.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell eDirectory. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The iMonitor interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause iMonitor HTTP stack errors that, when displayed on the target user's iMonitor interface, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Novell eDirectory iMonitor software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Nicholas Gregorie reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0925.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Novell eDirectory iMonitor software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0926.title: Novell eDirectory eMBox Bug Lets Remote Users View Files and Deny Service
CVE-2008-0926.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell eDirectory. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can connect to the target system and invoke edirutil to view files on the target system or cause denial of service conditions.Nicholas Gregorie reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0926.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-0927.title: Novell eDirectory HTTP Header Processing Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-0927.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell eDirectory. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted HTTP headers to cause the target 'dhost.exe' service to consume excessive CPU resources. Nicholas Gregorie reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0927.extra: A remote user can consume all available CPU resources on the target system.

CVE-2008-0935.title: Novell iPrint Buffer Overflow in 'ienipp.ocx' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0935.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell iPrint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the 'ienipp.ocx' ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Paul Kurczaba reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0935.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0938.title: Solaris DTrace May Let Local Users Obtain Sensitive Information
CVE-2008-0938.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris in the DTrace dynamic tracing framework. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with PRIV_DTRACE_USER or PRIV_DTRACE_PROC privileges can exploit a flaw in DTrace to perform some kernel-level tracing. As a result, the local user may then be able to access potentially sensitive information.
CVE-2008-0938.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2008-0947.title: Kerberos kadmind RPC Library Array Overrun May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0947.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos in kadmind. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause a large number of file descriptors to be opened, triggering an array overflow. This can cause kadmind to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.Jeff Altman of Secure Endpoints reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0947.extra: A remote user can cause kadmind to crash. It may also be possible to cause kadmind to execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2008-0948.title: Kerberos kadmind RPC Library Array Overrun May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0948.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos in kadmind. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause a large number of file descriptors to be opened, triggering an array overflow. This can cause kadmind to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.Jeff Altman of Secure Endpoints reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0948.extra: A remote user can cause kadmind to crash. It may also be possible to cause kadmind to execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2008-0951.title: Microsoft Windows AutoRun Bug May Let Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0951.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows AutoRun. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.The operating system does not properly enforce the NoDriveTypeAutoRun registry value. A remote user can create a CD-ROM or USB-device with an 'Autorun.inf' file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.Will Dormann of the CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0951.extra: A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0960.title: Net-snmp SNMPv3 Authentication Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2008-0960.body: A vulnerability was reported in Net-snmp. A remote user can bypass authentication.A remote user can send an SNMPv3 packet with a specially crafted Hash Message Authentication Code (HMAC) value to bypass the authentication function. The user can read and modify SNMP objects with the privileges of the target user.UCD-SNMP is also affected.SNMPv1 and SNMPv2 are not affected.Wes Hardaker reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0960.extra: A remote user can bypass authentication.

CVE-2008-0961.title: EMC DiskXtender Built-in Password Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0961.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC DiskXtender. A remote user can use a built-in username and password to execute arbitrary commands on the target system.The system includes a hard-coded login username and password. A remote user can connect to the RPC interface and supply the credentials to access the system.The remote user can create and delete files on the target server and execute arbitrary DiskXtender commands. This allows the user to execute arbitrary commands with System level privileges.The vendor was notified on February 21, 2008.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-0961.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2008-0962.title: EMC DiskXtender Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0962.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC DiskXtender in the File System Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via RPC to trigger a stack overflow in the File System Manager and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System level privilegesThe affected UUID is: b157b800-aef5-11d3-ae49-00600834c15fThe vendor was notified on February 21, 2008.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-0962.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0964.title: Solaris 'snoop' Utility Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0964.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris snoop(1M). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted SMB data to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The system is affected if the snoop(1M) utility is invoked without the '-o' command line option.The code will run with the privileges of the target user, except that for root users the code will run with 'nobody' user privileges.Gael Delalleau reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-0964.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-0971.title: Barracuda Spam Firewall Input Validation Holes in 'index.cgi' Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-0971.body: A vulnerability was reported in Barracuda Spam Firewall. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'index.cgi' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target authenticated administrative user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Barracuda Spam Firewall device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Barracuda Message Archiver, Barracuda Web Filter, Barracuda Load Balancer, and Barracuda IM Firewall products are also affected.The vendor was notified on June 16, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://dcsl.ul.ie/advisories/03.htmDr. Marian Ventuneac of the Data Communication Security Laboratory, Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering, University of Limerick reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0971.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Barracuda Spam Firewall device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-0984.title: VLC Media Player MPEG-4 Demuxer Memory Corruption Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0984.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MOV file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in the MPEG-4 file format parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'demux/mp4/mp4.c'.Miro Player 1.1 and prior versions is also affected.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2147Felipe Manzano and Anibal Sacco of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0984.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0987.title: Mac OS X Image Raw Stack Overflow in Processing Adobe Digital Negative (DNG) Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0987.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Image Raw. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Adobe Digital Negative (DNG) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.Clint Ruoho of Laconic Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0987.extra: A remote user can create a DNG image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0987.title: iPhoto Stack Overflow in Processing DNG Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0987.body: A vulnerability was reported in iPhoto. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Adobe Digital Negative (DNG) image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Clint Ruoho of Laconic Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0987.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0987.title: Apple Aperture Stack Overflow in Processing DNG Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0987.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Aperture. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Adobe Digital Negative (DNG) image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Clint Ruoho of Laconic Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0987.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0988.title: libc Mac OS X Libsystem strnstr() Off-by-one Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-0988.body: A vulnerability was reported in libc on Mac OS X. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local or remote user may be able to cause an application that uses the Libsystem strnstr(3) call to read one byte beyond the intended limit. This may cause the application to crash.Mac OS X versions 10.5 or later are not affected.Mike Ash of Rogue Amoeba Software reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0988.extra: A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-0990.title: Mac OS X notifyd Lets Local Users Prevent Processes from Receiving Notifications
CVE-2008-0990.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X notifyd. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send a Mach port death notification to notifyd so that applications that use the notify(3) call to register for notifications will not receive the notifications.Mac OS X versions 10.5 or later are not affected.
CVE-2008-0990.extra: A local user can prevent applications from receiving notifications from notifyd.

CVE-2008-0992.title: Mac OS X PAX Archive Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0992.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted pax archive that, when processed by the target user, will trigger an array index overflow and execute arbitrary code.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-0992.extra: A remote user can create a pax archive that, when processed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0993.title: Mac OS X Server Podcast Producer Discloses Passwords to Local Users
CVE-2008-0993.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Podcast Producer. A local user can obtain passwords.The Podcast Capture application supplies passwords to a subtask through arguments. A local user may be able to view the arguments.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.Maximilian Reiss of Chair for Applied Software Engineering, TUM, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0993.extra: A local user can obtain passwords.

CVE-2008-0994.title: Mac OS X Preview Saves Encrypted PDF Files Using Weak Encryption
CVE-2008-0994.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Preview. The software stores encrypted PDF files using weak encryption.When a user saves a Preview file to an encrypted PDF file, Preview uses 40-bit RC4 encryption.
CVE-2008-0994.extra: The software stores encrypted PDF files using weak encryption.

CVE-2008-0995.title: Mac OS X Printing Uses Weak Encryption and Discloses Passwords to Local Users
CVE-2008-0995.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the Printing component. A user can decrypt files or obtain passwords.When the system prints to an encrypted PDF file, the system uses 40-bit RC4 [CVE-2008-0995].When a job is started on an authenticated print queue, the authentication credentials may be saved to disk [CVE-2008-0996]. A local user may be able to obtain the passwords.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-0995.extra: A local user may be able to obtain passwords.The system uses weak encryption to print encrypted PDF files.

CVE-2008-0996.title: Mac OS X Printing Uses Weak Encryption and Discloses Passwords to Local Users
CVE-2008-0996.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the Printing component. A user can decrypt files or obtain passwords.When the system prints to an encrypted PDF file, the system uses 40-bit RC4 [CVE-2008-0995].When a job is started on an authenticated print queue, the authentication credentials may be saved to disk [CVE-2008-0996]. A local user may be able to obtain the passwords.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-0996.extra: A local user may be able to obtain passwords.The system uses weak encryption to print encrypted PDF files.

CVE-2008-0997.title: Apple AppKit Integer and Stack Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-0997.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in AppKit. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted serialized property list that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-0057]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in a parser for a legacy serialization format.A remote user that can cause a target user to query a network printer and then supply a specially rafted PPD file can trigger a stack overflow and cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system [CVE-2008-0997].Mac OS X versions 10.5 or later are not affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-0997.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-0998.title: Mac OS X NetCfgTool Lets Local Users Obtain System Privileges
CVE-2008-0998.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X NetCfgTool. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted message to NetCfgTool to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.
CVE-2008-0998.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-0999.title: Mac OS X UDF File System Null Pointer Dereference Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-0999.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the Universal Disc Format (UDF) file system support. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can create a specially crafted UDF disk image that, when opened, will trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the system to shutdown.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.Paul Wagland of Redwood Software and Wayne Linder of Iomega reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-0999.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1000.title: Apple Wiki Server Path Traversal Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1000.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Wiki Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user with wiki edit privileges can exploit a path traversal flaw to upload arbitrary code to the target system and then cause the wiki server to execute the code. The code will run with the privileges of the wiki server.Mac OS X versions prior to 10.5 are not affected.The vendor was notified on January 30, 2008.Rodrigo Carvalho of CORE Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2189
CVE-2008-1000.extra: A remote user with wiki edit privileges can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1001.title: Safari Multiple Input Validation and Processing Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1001.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Safari. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying or processing the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL or HTML content that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed. The code may run in the security context of an arbitrary site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, take actions on the site acting as the target user, or obtain elevated privileges.The browser's error page is affected [CVE-2008-1001] on Windows XP and Vista. Robert Swiecki of Google Information Security Team reported this vulnerability.The processing of 'javascript:' URLs is affected [CVE-2008-1002]. Robert Swiecki of Google Information Security Team reported this vulnerability.The processing of pages that have the 'document.domain' property set is affected [CVE-2008-1003]. Adam Barth and Collin Jackson of Stanford University reported this vulnerability.Web Inspector is affected [CVE-2008-1004]. Adam Barth and Collin Jackson of Stanford University reported this vulnerability.The window.open() function is affected [CVE-2008-1006]. Adam Barth and Collin Jackson of Stanford University reported this vulnerability.The frame navigation policy for Java applets is affected [CVE-2008-1007]. Adam Barth and Collin Jackson of Stanford University reported this vulnerability.The processing of the 'document.domain' property is affected [CVE-2008-1008].The processing of history objects is affected [CVE-2008-1009].The processing of method instances in WebKit is affected [CVE-2008-1011]. David Bloom reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1001.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the arbitrary sites, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, take actions on the site acting as the target user, or obtain elevated privileges.

CVE-2008-1005.title: Safari Discloses Password Field to Local Users
CVE-2008-1005.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A local user can view the contents of a password field.A local user can use Kotoeri reverse conversion on a password field to view the password.
CVE-2008-1005.extra: A local user can view passwords in a password field.

CVE-2008-1010.title: Safari WebKit Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1010.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML with specially crafted JavaScript regular expressions that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Eric Seidel of the WebKit Open Source Project and Tavis Ormandy and Will Drewry of Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1010.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1012.title: AirPort Extreme Base Station AFP Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1012.body: A vulnerability was reported in AirPort Extreme Base Station. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted AFP request to cause file sharing to become unresponsive.The Fast Ethernet and Gigabit Ethernet models are affected.Time Capsule and AirPort Express are not affected.Alex deVries reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1012.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1014.title: QuickTime Movie File External URL Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2008-1014.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of movie files. A remote user can obtain information from the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted QuickTime movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will open external URLs. A remote user may be able to exploit this to obtain information from the target user's system.Jorge Escala of Open Tech Solutions and Vinoo Thomas and Rahul Mohandas of McAfee Avert Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1014.extra: A remote user can obtain information from the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1015.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflow in Processing Data Reference Atoms Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1015.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of movie files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a movie file with specially crafted data reference atoms that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1015.extra: A remote user can create a movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1016.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflow in Processing Movie Media Tracks Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1016.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of movie media tracks in movie files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-1016.extra: A remote user can create a movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1017.title: QuickTime Heap Overflow in Parsing 'crgn' Atoms Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1017.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the parsing of 'crgn' atoms. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a movie file with specially crafted 'crgn' atoms that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Sanbin Li reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1017.extra: A remote user can create a movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1018.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflow in Parsing 'chan' Atoms Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1018.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the parsing of 'chan' atoms. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1018.extra: A remote user can create a movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1019.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflow in Processing PICT Images Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1019.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of PICT images. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PICT image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.bugfree reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1019.extra: A remote user can create a PICT image that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1020.title: QuickTime Heap Overflow in Processing PICT Image Error Messages Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1020.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of error messages associated with PICT images. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PICT file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mac OS X systems are not affected.Ruben Santamarta of Reversemode.com reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1020.extra: A remote user can create a PICT image that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1021.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflow in Processing Animation Codec Content Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1021.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of movie files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a movie file with specially crafted Animation codec content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.
