The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mac OS X systems are not affected.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1021.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1022.title: QuickTime Stack Overflow in Processing 'obji' Atoms Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1022.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of QuickTime VR movies. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a QuickTime VR movie file with specially crafted 'obji' atoms that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1022.extra: A remote user can create a QuickTime VR movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1023.title: QuickTime Heap Overflow in Parsing Clip Opcodes Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1023.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of PICT images. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PICT image with specially crafted Clip opcodes that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mac OS X systems are not affected.Wei Wang of McAfee AVERT labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1023.extra: A remote user can create a PICT image that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1024.title: Safari Bug in Processing Download Filenames Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1024.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari on Windows. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML with a specially crafted file name that, when downloaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mac OS X systems are not affected.
CVE-2008-1024.extra: A remote user can create a filename that, when downloaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1025.title: Safari WebKit Input Validation Bug in Processing URLs Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1025.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The browser does not properly filter HTML code from URLs. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL (containing a colon character in the host name) that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will run in the security context of an arbitrary site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Robert Swiecki of Google Information Security Team and David Bloom reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1025.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1026.title: Safari WebKit Bug in Processing JavaScript Regular Expressions Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1026.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Regular expressions with large, nested repetition counts can trigger code execution.Charlie Miller reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1026.extra: A remote user can create JavaScript that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1027.title: Mac OS X Apple File Protocol Server Discloses Files to Remote Users
CVE-2008-1027.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Mac OS X Apple File Protocol (AFP) server. A remote user can view files that are not designated for sharing.A remote user can access files and directories on the target system that are located within folders not designated for sharing.Alex deVries and Robert Rich reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1027.extra: A remote user can view files that are in folders that are not designated for sharing.

CVE-2008-1028.title: Mac OS X AppKit Document Processing Bug Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1028.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted document file that, when loaded by the target user with an application that uses AppKit, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.TextEdit is affected.Systems running Mac OS X 10.5 and later are not affected.Rosyna of Unsanity reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1028.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1030.title: Mac OS X CoreFoundation Integer Overflow in Processing CFData Objects Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1030.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CoreFoundation. A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can create specially crafted CFData objects to trigger a heap overflow in CFDataReplaceBytes() and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Applications that use the CFData API may be affected.
CVE-2008-1030.extra: A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1031.title: Mac OS X CoreGraphics PDF File Pointer Initialization Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1031.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CoreGraphics. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-1031.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1033.title: CUPS Scheduler Discloses Information to Local Users
CVE-2008-1033.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS on Mac OS X. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The CUPS scheduler does not properly process authentication environment variables when printing with debug logging enabled. When a user prints to a password-protected printer with debug logging enabled, a local user may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information, such as the username, domain, and password.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 that have Security Update 2008-002 installed are not affected.[Editor's note: It is not clear if systems other than Mac OS X are affected or not.]
CVE-2008-1033.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2008-1034.title: Apple Help Viewer Buffer Overflow in Processing 'help:topic' URL Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1034.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Help Viewer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'help:topic' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Systems running Mac OS X 10.5 or later are not affected.Paul Haddad of PTH Consulting reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1034.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1035.title: Apple iCal Memory Error May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1035.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iCal. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.ics' file that, when processed by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2219Rodrigo Carvalho from the Core Security Consulting Services (SCS) team of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1035.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1036.title: Mac OS X ICU Character Encoding Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Content Filters
CVE-2008-1036.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the processing of certain character encodings. A remote user can bypass content filters.The International Components for Unicode (ICU) component does not properly handle certain character encodings.A remote user can create character sequences that may not appear in the converted output, allowing the remote user to create content that bypasses content filters. This may also allow cross-site scripting attacks.
CVE-2008-1036.extra: A remote user can create content that may bypass content filters or permit cross-site scripting attacks.

CVE-2008-1037.title: Packeteer PacketShaper Input Validation Hole in 'FILELIST' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1037.body: A vulnerability was reported in PacketShaper. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web management interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'FILELIST' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the PacketShaper device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Packeteer PolicyCenter is also affected.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:https://[target]/whatever.htm?FILELIST=%3C/script%3E%3Cbody+onLoad=alert(%26quot%3BXSS%26quot%3B)%3E%3Cscript%3Ennposter reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1037.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the PacketShaper device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1048.title: Plume CMS Input Validation Hole in 'xmedia.php' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1048.body: A vulnerability was reported in Plume CMS. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'xmedia.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'dir' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Plume CMS software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://www.digitrustgroup.com/advisories/web-application-security-plume-cms.htmlOmer Singer of The DigiTrust Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1048.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Plume CMS software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1054.title: SurgeMail Format String and Heap Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1054.body: A vulnerability was reported in SurgeMail. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted 'page' parameter to the web mail service (webmail.exe) to trigger a format string flaw and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/scripts/webmail.exe?page=%n%n%n%s%s%s%sA remote user can trigger a heap overflow in the processing of CGI environment strings potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The swatch process is also affected.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/surgemailz.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1054.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1071.title: Wireshark SCTP, SNMP, and TFTP Dissector Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1071.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark (Ethereal), affecting the SCTP, SNMP, and TFTP dissectors. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.The SCTP dissector is only affected in versions 0.99.5 through 0.99.7.The SNMP dissector is only affected in versions 0.99.6 and 0.99.7.The TFTP dissector is only affected when running on Ubuntu 7.10 apparently due to a bug in the Cairo library on Ubuntu. Noam Rathaus reported this TFTP dissector vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1071.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to crash.

CVE-2008-1073.title: IBM ISS Internet Scanner Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1073.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM ISS Internet Scanner. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The reporting interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Internet Scanner software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.JPCERT reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://jvn.jp/jp/JVN%2342381549/index.html
CVE-2008-1073.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Internet Scanner software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1083.title: Microsoft GDI Buffer Overflow in Processing EMF and WMF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1083.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft GDI. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted EMF or WMF image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted EMF or WMF image file can trigger a heap overflow in performing integer calculations [CVE-2008-1083].An EMF file with specially crafted filename parameters can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2008-1087].Jun Mao of iDefense Labs, Sebastian Apelt of Zero Day Initiative, Thomas Garnier of SkyRecon, and Yamata Li reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1083.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1084.title: Windows Kernel Lets Local Users Gain Kernel Level Privileges
CVE-2008-1084.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.The kernel does not properly validate input passed from user mode. A local user can supply specially crafted input to execute arbitrary code on the target system with kernel level privileges.Thomas Garnier reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1084.extra: A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1085.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Data Stream Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1085.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer (IE). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory error in the processing of data streams and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This can be triggered by, for example, an unexpected MIME-type for which there is no handler registered on the target user's system.Carsten Eiram of Secunia reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1085.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1086.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer 'hxvz.dll' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1086.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer in the 'hxvz.dll' ActiveX control. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSIDs of the vulnerable controls are: 314111b8-a502-11d2-bbca-00c04f8ec294, 314111c6-a502-11d2-bbca-00c04f8ec294An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1086.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1087.title: Microsoft GDI Buffer Overflow in Processing EMF and WMF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1087.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft GDI. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted EMF or WMF image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted EMF or WMF image file can trigger a heap overflow in performing integer calculations [CVE-2008-1083].An EMF file with specially crafted filename parameters can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2008-1087].Jun Mao of iDefense Labs, Sebastian Apelt of Zero Day Initiative, Thomas Garnier of SkyRecon, and Yamata Li reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1087.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1088.title: Microsoft Project Memory Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1088.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Project. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Project file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The National Cyber Security Center of the Republic of Korea reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1088.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1089.title: Microsoft Visio Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1089.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Visio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Visio file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted object header data can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-1089].Specially crafted .DXF files loaded from disk can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-1090].Microsoft Visio 2002 Viewer, Visio 2003 Viewer, Visio 2007 Viewer, and Visio 2007 Viewer SP1 are not affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1089.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1090.title: Microsoft Visio Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1090.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Visio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Visio file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted object header data can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-1089].Specially crafted .DXF files loaded from disk can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-1090].Microsoft Visio 2002 Viewer, Visio 2003 Viewer, Visio 2007 Viewer, and Visio 2007 Viewer SP1 are not affected.An anonymous researcher reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1090.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1091.title: Microsoft Word Memory Error in Processing RTF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1091.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Word in the processing of RTF files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Rich Text Format (.rtf) file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory calculation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This can be exploited via a specially crafted .rtf file in a rich text e-mail.wushi of team509 reported this vulnerability via Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-1091.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1092.title: Microsoft Jet Database Buffer Overflow in 'msjet40.dll' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code via Word Documents
CVE-2008-1092.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Jet, which can be exploited via Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted database file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in 'msjet40.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted Word document can trigger this overflow.Word 2000 SP3, 2002 SP3, 2003 SP2 and SP3, and 2007 and 2007 SP1 are affected when running on Windows 2000, Windows XP, or Windows Server 2003 SP1.Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista, and Windows Vista SP1 are not affected.Limited and targeted attacks are attempting to exploit this vulnerability.[Editor's note: Microsoft has confirmed that this vulnerability is the same vulnerability as previously reported by cocruder in Alert ID 1018976 in November 2007. However, the attack vector using Microsoft Word is a new attack vector.]
CVE-2008-1092.extra: A remote user can create a database file or Word file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1093.title: FLEXnet Connect/InstallShield Update Agent Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1093.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FLEXnet Connect/InstallShield Update Agent. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.The software uses an unencrypted HTTP connection to download unsigned update rules. A remote user with the ability to spoof the centralized download server or the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can inject arbitrary rules to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Third party software that uses an update mechanism based on InstallShield/FLEXnet Connect products may be affected.The vendor was notified on January 2, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.simplicity.net/vuln/CVE-2008-1093.txtBrian Dowling of Simplicity Communications reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1093.extra: A remote user with the ability to spoof the centralized download server or the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1094.title: Barracuda Spam Firewall Input Validation Flaw in 'Accounts View' Section Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-1094.body: A vulnerability was reported in Barracuda Spam Firewall. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The 'index.cgi' script does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'pattern_x' parameter in the 'Users -> Account View' section under the 'Message Count =' search filter. A remote authenticated administrative user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor was notified on June 16, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://dcsl.ul.ie/advisories/02.htmDr. Marian Ventuneac of the Data Communication Security Laboratory, Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering, University of Limerick reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1094.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-1096.title: ImageMagick Heap Overflow in Processing XCF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1096.body: A vulnerability was reported in ImageMagick. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted XCF file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in the load_tile() function in 'coders/xcf.c'.
CVE-2008-1096.extra: A remote user can create an XCF file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1097.title: ImageMagick Heap Overflow in Processing PCX Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1097.body: A vulnerability was reported in ImageMagick. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PCX file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in the ReadPCXImage() function in 'coders/pcx.c'.
CVE-2008-1097.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1100.title: Clam AntiVirus Buffer Overflow in cli_scanpe() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1100.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Upack executable file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a buffer overflow in the cli_scanpe() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'libclamav/pe.c'.The vendor was notified on March 10, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-11/advisory/
CVE-2008-1100.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1104.title: Foxit Reader Stack Overflow in util.printf() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1104.body: A vulnerability was reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in the util.printf() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on April 23, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-18/advisory/Dyon Balding, Secunia Research, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1104.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1105.title: Samba Buffer Overflow in receive_smb_raw() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1105.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote server can send a specially crafted SMB packet to a connected client to trigger a heap overflow in receive_smb_raw() and execute arbitrary code on the target client system.A remote user can also send a specially crafted print request to a target nmbd server to execute arbitrary code on the target server. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in 'lib/util_sock.c'.The vendor was notified on May 15, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-20/advisory/
CVE-2008-1105.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1106.title: Akamai Client Software Authentication Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1106.body: A vulnerability was reported in Akamai Client Software. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.The management interface (on TCP port 9421 on the loopback interface) authenticates commands based on the user-supplied HTTP Referer header. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks to cause the system to execute arbitrary commands.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will issue a command to the management interface to cause the system to download and execute arbitrary files.The vendor was notified on May 13, 2008.The product was formerly called 'Red Swoosh'.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1106.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will download and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1108.title: Evolution Buffer Overflow in Processing iCalendar Timezone Strings Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1108.body: A vulnerability was reported in Evolution. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an iCalendar attachment with a specially crafted timezone string that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 27, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-22/advisory/
CVE-2008-1108.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1109.title: Evolution Buffer Overflow in Replying to iCalendar Requests Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1109.body: A vulnerability was reported in Evolution. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an iCalendar request with a specially crafted 'DESCRIPTION' property. When the request is replied to by the target user when in calendar view, a buffer overflow will occur and arbitrary code will be executed on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 27, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability. Discovered by Alin Rad Pop, Secunia Research.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-23/advisory/
CVE-2008-1109.extra: A remote user can create a request that, when replied to by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1113.title: Cisco Unified Wireless IP Phone 7921 Does Not Validate Sever Certificates When Using PEAP
CVE-2008-1113.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Wireless IP Phone model 7921. A remote user can determine the installation path.When configured to use Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol (PEAP), the phone does not validate server certificates.A remote user may be able to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack.The original advisory is available at:http://blogs.zdnet.com/security/?p=901George Ou reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1113.extra: The device does not validate server certificates.

CVE-2008-1130.title: IBM WebSphere MQ Lets Local Users Bypass Queue Manager Access Restrictions
CVE-2008-1130.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere MQ. A local user can bypass security restrictions to access a queue manager.A local user can connect to a queue manager via a SVRCONN (MQ client) channel even if the channel is protected with a security exit or mcauserid.No further details were provided.IBM has assigned APAR IZ01272 to this vulnerability.The Security Assurance Team of the National Australia Bank reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1130.extra: A local user can bypass security restrictions to access a queue manager.

CVE-2008-1145.title: Ruby Directory Traversal Flaw in WEBrick Library Lets Remote Users View Files on the Target System.
CVE-2008-1145.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby in the WEBrick web library. A remote user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system that are located outside of the document directory.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]:[port]/..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c..%5c/boot.iniA remote user can also view files that match the patterns specified by the ':NondisclosureName' option on systems that have case insensitive filesystems.The vendor was notified on February 20, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5215Digital Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1145.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-1150.title: Cisco IOS Bugs in Virtual Private Dial-up Network PPTP Connection Termination Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1150.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.When virtual private dial-up networking (VPDN) is configured and PPTP is used, a remote user can cause denial of service conditions.When a PPTP session is terminated, the virtual access interface that is associated with the PPTP session is not reused, which may exhaust all available interface descriptor blocks [CVE-2008-1150]. This may prevent VPDN connections. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCdv59309 to this vulnerability.When a PPTP session is terminated, a memory leak may occur [CVE-2008-1151]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsj58566 to this vulnerability.Cisco IOS XR is not affected by these vulnerabilities.Martin Kluge of Elxsi Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1150.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1151.title: Cisco IOS Bugs in Virtual Private Dial-up Network PPTP Connection Termination Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1151.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.When virtual private dial-up networking (VPDN) is configured and PPTP is used, a remote user can cause denial of service conditions.When a PPTP session is terminated, the virtual access interface that is associated with the PPTP session is not reused, which may exhaust all available interface descriptor blocks [CVE-2008-1150]. This may prevent VPDN connections. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCdv59309 to this vulnerability.When a PPTP session is terminated, a memory leak may occur [CVE-2008-1151]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsj58566 to this vulnerability.Cisco IOS XR is not affected by these vulnerabilities.Martin Kluge of Elxsi Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1151.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1152.title: Cisco IOS Data-link Switching Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1152.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the processing of Data-link switching (DLSw) packets. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted UDP packet to UDP port 2067 or IP Protocol 91 packet to trigger a memory leak on the target device or cause the target device to reloadCisco IOS devices that are configured for DLSw Fast Sequenced Transport (FST) are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsk73104 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1152.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1154.title: Cisco Unified Communications Disaster Recovery Framework Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commadns
CVE-2008-1154.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Disaster Recovery Framework. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.The Disaster Recovery Framework master server does not properly authenticate requests received via the network. A remote user can send a specially crafted request to TCP port 4040 to execute commands on the target system.A remote user can exploit this to modify or delete scheduled backups, copy a system backup to a remote server, restore a configuration from a remote server, and execute arbitrary operating system commands.The following products are affected: * Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM) 5.x and 6.x * Cisco Unified Communications Manager Business Edition * Cisco Unified Precense 1.x and 6.x * Cisco Emergency Responder 2.x * Cisco Mobility Manager 2.xCisco Unified Communications Manager versions 3.x and 4.x are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCso53771 to this vulnerability.VoIPshield Systems reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1154.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2008-1155.title: Cisco Network Admission Control Appliance Discloses Clean Access Server and Clean Access Manager Shared Secret
CVE-2008-1155.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Cisco Network Admission Control appliance. A remote user can obtain the shared secret that is used between the Cisco Clean Access Server (CAS) and the Cisco Clean Access Manager (CAM).A remote user monitoring the network can obtain the shared secret used by the CAS and the CAM from error logs that are transmitted over the network.The remote user can then gain full control of the CAS.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj33976 to this vulnerability.The vendor discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1155.extra: A remote user can obtain the shared secret that is used between the Cisco Clean Access Server (CAS) and the Cisco Clean Access Manager (CAM).

CVE-2008-1156.title: Cisco IOS Multicast Virtual Private Network (MVPN) Data Leak Lets Remote Users Obtain VPN Traffic
CVE-2008-1156.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the Multicast Virtual Private Network implementation. A remote user can create multicast states or obtain VPN traffic.A remote user can send specially crafted Multicast Distribution Tree (MDT) Data Join messages to create extra multicast states on the core routers or obtain traffic from other Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) based VPNs.The remote user must know or guess the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) peering IP address of a remote PE router and the address of the multicast group that is used in other MPLS VPNs.Devices that are configured for MVPN are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi01470 to this vulnerability.Thomas Morin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1156.extra: A remote user can create extra multicast states on the core routers or obtain traffic from other Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) based VPNs.

CVE-2008-1157.title: CiscoWorks Internetwork Performance Monitor Shell Process Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1157.body: A vulnerability was reported in CiscoWorks Internetwork Performance Monitor. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.The IPM software launches a shell that is bound to a randomly selected TCP port. A remote user can connect to the port to execute arbitrary commands on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service ('casuser' user privileges on Solaris and System privileges on Windows).Solaris and Windows systems are affected.IPM versions 2.5 and prior version are not affected.IPM version 4.0 is not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj06260 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1157.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2008-1158.title: Cisco Unified Presence Services Can Be Interrupted By Remote Users
CVE-2008-1158.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Presence. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1158, CVE-2008-1740]. Versions prior to 6.0(1) are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsh50164 and CSCsh20972 to these vulnerabilities.A remote user can conduct a TCP port scan to trigger a flaw in the SIP Proxy service and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1741]. Versions 6.0(1) and 6.0(2) are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj64533 to this vulnerability.Cisco discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1158.extra: A remote user can interrupt presence services.

CVE-2008-1167.title: Squid Analysis Report Generator Buffer Overflow in Processing HTTP User-Agent and Access Logs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1167.body: A vulnerability was reported in Squid Analysis Report Generator. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP User-Agent value that will trigger a buffer overflow in the report generator when the target user processes the useragent log. Arbitrary code can be executed on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted 'access.log' file can also trigger the overflow.The vendor was notified on January 28, 2008.L4teral reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1167.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1174.title: AuthentiX Input Validation Hole in 'username' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1174.body: A vulnerability was reported in AuthentiX. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The administration interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the AuthentiX software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.https://[target]/aspAdmin/editUser.asp?username=%3CMETA%20HTTP-EQUIV=%22refresh%22%20CONTENT=%220;%20URL=http://www.google.com/%22%3EThe vendor was notified on February 25, 2008.William Hicks and Chris Castaldo reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1174.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the AuthentiX software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1181.title: Juniper Networks Secure Access 2000 Discloses Path to Remote Users
CVE-2008-1181.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Networks Secure Access 2000 SSL VPN. A remote user can determine the web server path.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to the 'remediate.cgi' script to determine the web server path.The vendor was notified on December 12, 2007.Richard Brain of ProCheckUp Ltd (www.procheckup.com) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1181.extra: A remote user can determine the web server path.

CVE-2008-1185.title: Java Runtime Environment Virtual Machine Lets Remote Users Access Files and Gain Privileges on the Target System
CVE-2008-1185.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the JRE Virtual Machine. A remote user can access files on the target user's system. A remote user can cause arbitrary applications on the target user's system to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an unspecified flaw to gain access to files on the target system or execute arbitrary applications residing on the target system.SDK and JRE 1.3.x is not affected.Fujitsu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1185.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1186.title: Java Runtime Environment Virtual Machine Lets Remote Users Access Files and Gain Privileges on the Target System
CVE-2008-1186.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the JRE Virtual Machine. A remote user can access files on the target user's system. A remote user can cause arbitrary applications on the target user's system to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an unspecified flaw to gain access to files on the target system or execute arbitrary applications residing on the target system.SDK and JRE 1.3.x is not affected.Fujitsu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1186.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1187.title: Java Runtime Environment Applet XSLT Transformation Bug Lets Remote Users Gain Privileges
CVE-2008-1187.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a bug in the processing of XSLT transformations to gain elevated privileges on the target system. The applet can access files and web pages and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Hisashi Kojima of Fujitsu and JPCERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1187.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1188.title: Java Web Start Buffer Overflows and Other Bugs Let Remote Users Read/Write Files and Execute Applications on the Target User's System
CVE-2008-1188.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Java Web Start. A remote user can access files on the target user's system. A remote user can cause arbitrary applications on the target user's system to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or other bug to gain access to files on the target system and execute arbitrary applications residing on the target system.An anonymous researcher reported some of these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1188.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1189.title: Java Web Start Buffer Overflows and Other Bugs Let Remote Users Read/Write Files and Execute Applications on the Target User's System
CVE-2008-1189.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Java Web Start. A remote user can access files on the target user's system. A remote user can cause arbitrary applications on the target user's system to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or other bug to gain access to files on the target system and execute arbitrary applications residing on the target system.An anonymous researcher reported some of these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1189.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1190.title: Java Web Start Buffer Overflows and Other Bugs Let Remote Users Read/Write Files and Execute Applications on the Target User's System
CVE-2008-1190.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Java Web Start. A remote user can access files on the target user's system. A remote user can cause arbitrary applications on the target user's system to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or other bug to gain access to files on the target system and execute arbitrary applications residing on the target system.An anonymous researcher reported some of these vulnerabilities via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-1190.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1193.title: Java Runtime Environment Bugs in Image Parsing Library Let Remote Users Gain Privileges
CVE-2008-1193.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java. A remote user can access files on the target user's system. A remote user can cause arbitrary applications on the target user's system to be executed.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger flaws in the image parsing library to gain access to files on the target system or execute arbitrary applications that reside on the target system.Some flaws in the color management library may cause JRE to crash.SDK and JRE 1.4.x and 1.3.x are not affected by these vulnerabilities.Chris Evans of the Google Security Team reported the privilege escalation vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1193.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1196.title: Java Web Start Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Read/Write Files and Execute Applications on the Target User's System
CVE-2008-1196.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java Web Start. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in Java Web Start to gain access to files on the target user's system or execute arbitrary applications located on the target system.CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1196.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will access files or execute arbitrary applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1201.title: Adobe Flash Professional/Basic Bug in Parsing FLA Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1201.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flash Professional and Flash Basic. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted FLA file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The Mac versions of Flash Professional and Flash Basic are not affected.Flash Player is not affected.The vendor was notified on November 9, 2007.cocoruder reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.fortiguardcenter.com/advisory/FGA-2008-07.html
CVE-2008-1201.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1202.title: Adobe LiveCycle Workflow Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1202.body: Dave Lewis of Liquidmatrix Security Digest reported a vulnerability in Adobe LiveCycle Workflow. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web management login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Adobe LiveCycle software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on January 16, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.liquidmatrix.org/blog/2008/03/11/advisory-adobe-livecycle-workflow-xss-vulnerability/
CVE-2008-1202.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Adobe LiveCycle software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1208.title: Check Point VPN-1 UTM Edge Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1208.body: A vulnerability was reported in Check Point VPN-1 UTM Edge. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted HTTP POST request that, when submitted by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the VPN-1 device and will run in the security context of that device. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on February 19, 2008.Henri Lindberg of Louhi Networks Oy reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.louhi.fi/advisory/checkpoint_080306.txt
CVE-2008-1208.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the VPN-1 UTM device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1217.title: IBM Lotus Notes SMTP Message Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1217.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Notes. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted e-mail to execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause the target Notes client to crash.A specially crafted e-mail message body or e-mail attachment can trigger this vulnerability.SPRs SNES6NMVG7 and ABUI76AJAM were assigned to this vulnerability.Dan Ritter and the VCC reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: The e-mail body vulnerability was originally reported in October 2007. The e-mail attachment vulnerability was reported on February 20, 2008.]
CVE-2008-1217.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1232.title: Tomcat Input Validation Hole in HttpServletResponse.sendError() Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1232.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tomcat. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The HttpServletResponse.sendError() function does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input on an error page. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Tomcat software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Konstantin Kolinko reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1232.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Tomcat software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1233.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1233.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted JavaScript that, when loaded by the target user, will run with the wrong principal and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-1235]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.JavaScript from page content can also be executed with elevated privileges [CVE-2008-1233].Cross-site scripting attacks by exploiting event handlers are also possible [CVE-2008-1234].Some of these bugs are variants of previously reported XPCNativeWrapper bugs (reported by the vendor in MFSA 2007-25 and MFSA2007-35).moz_bug_r_a4, Boris Zbarsky, and Johnny Stenback reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1233.extra: A remote user can create JavaScript that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1234.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1234.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted JavaScript that, when loaded by the target user, will run with the wrong principal and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-1235]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.JavaScript from page content can also be executed with elevated privileges [CVE-2008-1233].Cross-site scripting attacks by exploiting event handlers are also possible [CVE-2008-1234].Some of these bugs are variants of previously reported XPCNativeWrapper bugs (reported by the vendor in MFSA 2007-25 and MFSA2007-35).moz_bug_r_a4, Boris Zbarsky, and Johnny Stenback reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1234.extra: A remote user can create JavaScript that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1236.title: Mozilla Firefox Bugs in JavaScript Engine and Layout Engine May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1236.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox in the layout and JavaScript engines. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in the layout engine [CVE-2008-1236]. This may cause the browser to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The JavaScript engine may also crash or permit arbitrary code execution [CVE-2008-1237].Tom Ferris, Seth Spitzer, Martin Wargers, John Daggett, Mats Palmgren, georgi, tgirmann, and Igor Bukanov reported these vulnerabilties.
CVE-2008-1236.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to crash or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2008-1237.title: Mozilla Firefox Bugs in JavaScript Engine and Layout Engine May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1237.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox in the layout and JavaScript engines. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in the layout engine [CVE-2008-1236]. This may cause the browser to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The JavaScript engine may also crash or permit arbitrary code execution [CVE-2008-1237].Tom Ferris, Seth Spitzer, Martin Wargers, John Daggett, Mats Palmgren, georgi, tgirmann, and Igor Bukanov reported these vulnerabilties.
CVE-2008-1237.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to crash or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2008-1238.title: Mozilla Firefox URL Bug Lets Remote Users Spoof HTTP Referer Values in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-1238.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can spoof the HTTP Referer value in certain cases.When a request is sent to a URL with Basic Authentication credentials and an empty username value, the browser removes characters from the hostname in the HTTP Referer field. If a target web site relies on the value for security purposes, the remote user may be able to bypass security controls.Gregory Fleischer reported this vulnerability. RSnake reported the original concept.
CVE-2008-1238.extra: A remote user can spoof the HTTP Referer value to potentially bypass security controls on the target web site.

CVE-2008-1276.title: MailEnable Buffer Overflows in FETCH, EXAMINE, and UNSUBSCRIBE Commands Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1276.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in MailEnable. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted IMAP command values to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service (MEIMAPS.exe).The IMAP FETCH, EXAMINE, and UNSUBSCRIBE commands are affected.A remote user can trigger a null pointer bug by sending specially crafted IMAP SEARCH and APPEND commands to cause the target service to crash.Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/maildisable.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1276.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target service.

CVE-2008-1277.title: MailEnable Buffer Overflows in FETCH, EXAMINE, and UNSUBSCRIBE Commands Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1277.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in MailEnable. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted IMAP command values to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service (MEIMAPS.exe).The IMAP FETCH, EXAMINE, and UNSUBSCRIBE commands are affected.A remote user can trigger a null pointer bug by sending specially crafted IMAP SEARCH and APPEND commands to cause the target service to crash.Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/maildisable.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1277.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target service.

CVE-2008-1285.title: JBoss Input Validation Hole in JavaServer Faces Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Access Control Bug in Status Servlet Lets Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2008-1285.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in JBoss. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can determine information about deployed web contexts.The JavaServer Faces (JSF) component does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2008-1285]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the JBoss software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can access the status servlet to obtain information about deployed web contexts [CVE-2008-3273].
CVE-2008-1285.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the JBoss software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can determine details about deployed web contexts on the target system.

CVE-2008-1288.title: Rational ClearQuest Discloses ClearQuest User Information to Local Users
CVE-2008-1288.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational ClearQuest Web. A local user can determine information about ClearQuest users.The ClearQuest application uses session cookies that contain information about the authenticated ClearQuest user. The cookies are not removed at the end of a session.A local user can obtain the information from the browser.
CVE-2008-1288.extra: A local user can determine information about ClearQuest users.

CVE-2008-1289.title: Asterisk Buffer Overflow in Processing RTP Codec Payload Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1289.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk in the processing of RTP payloads. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted RTP payload number or send more than 32 RTP payloads to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on March 11, 2008.Mu Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1289.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1293.title: Linux Terminal Server Project ldm Access Control Bug Lets Remote Users Access X Sessions
CVE-2008-1293.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Terminal Server Project. A remote user can access X windows sessions.A remote user can connect to X on any LTSP client from arbitrary hosts on the network. As a result, the remote user can view client windows and keystrokes.The vulnerability resides in 'ldm.c'.Christian Herzog reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1293.extra: A remote user can access X windows sessions.

CVE-2008-1304.title: WordPress Input Validation Holes in Invite Function Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1304.body: A vulnerability was reported in WordPress. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the WordPress software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'inviteemail' parameter of the invite function of the 'wp-admin/users.php' script is affected.The 'to' parameter of the 'wp-admin/invites.php' script is affected.DoZ from Hackers Center Security Group reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.hackerscenter.com/index.php?/Latest-posts/114-WordPress-Multiple-Cross-Site-Scripting-Vulnerabilities.html?id=114
CVE-2008-1304.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the WordPress software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1309.title: RealPlayer ActiveX Control Memory Corruption Bug May Let Remote Users Execute Abitrary Code
CVE-2008-1309.body: A vulnerability was reported in RealPlayer. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in 'rmoc3260.dll' and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSIDs of the vulnerable control are: 2F542A2E-EDC9-4BF7-8CB1-87C9919F7F93, CFCDAA03-8BE4-11CF-B84B-0020AFBBCCFAElazar Broad reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1309.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, may execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1309.title: RealPlayer ActiveX Control Heap Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Abitrary Code
CVE-2008-1309.body: A vulnerability was reported in RealPlayer in an ActiveX control. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in an ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Rhapsody 4 is also affected.
CVE-2008-1309.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1318.title: MediaWiki Discloses API Data for Other Sites to Remote Users
CVE-2008-1318.body: A vulnerability was reported in MediaWiki. A remote user can obtain API data from other sites.A remote user can supply specially crafted JavaScript via the the API's callback parameter for JSON-formatted results to obtain API data for other sites.
CVE-2008-1318.extra: A remote user can obtain API data from other sites.

CVE-2008-1328.title: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops Bugs in LGServer and NetBackup Service Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1328.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted commands to the LGServer service to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-1328].A remote user can upload a specially crafted file to trigger a flaw in the NetBackup service and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2008-1329].The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Client installations are not affected.CA Desktop Management Suite is also affected.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1328.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1330.title: GroupWise Windows Client API Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Access E-mail
CVE-2008-1330.body: A vulnerability was reported in GroupWise. A remote authenticated user can access a target user's e-mail.A remote authenticated user that is the recipient of a shared folder from a target user can gain access to the target user's e-mail.
CVE-2008-1330.extra: A remote authenticated user can access a target user's e-mail in certain cases.

CVE-2008-1331.title: Alcatel OmniPCX Input Validation Flaw in 'FastJSData.cgi' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1331.body: A vulnerability was reported in Alcatel OmniPCX. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.The '/cgi-data/FastJSData.cgi' script does not properly validate user-supplied data in the 'id2' parameter. A remote user can submit a specially crafted value to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/cgi-data/FastJSData.cgi?id1=sh2kerr&id2=91|cat%20/etc/passwdThe vendor was notified on January 8, 2008.Digital Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1331.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1332.title: Asterisk SIP Channel Driver Lets Remote Users Make Unauthenticated Calls
CVE-2008-1332.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can make phone calls without authenticating.A remote user can set a specially crafted 'From' header to make unauthenticated calls via the SIP channel driver.The vendor was notified on March 12, 2008.Jason Parker from Digium reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1332.extra: A remote user can make phone calls without authenticating.

CVE-2008-1340.title: VMware Virtual Machine Communication Interface Memory Corruption Flaw Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1340.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware in the Virtual Machine Communication Interface. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can make a specially crafted call to the Virtual Machine Communication Interface (VMCI) to consume excessive memory or corrupt memory and crash the host system.Andrew Honig of the U.S. Department of Defense reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1340.extra: A local user can cause the target host system.

CVE-2008-1356.title: Sun Java Desktop System (JDS) XscreenSaver Bug Lets Physically Local Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2008-1356.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java Desktop System on Solaris. A physically local user can bypass the XscreenSaver authentication.When the GNOME On-Screen Keyboard (GOK) is used, a physically local user can bypass the XscreenSaver authentication process and gain access to the target system.Solaris 8 and Solaris 9 are not affected.
CVE-2008-1356.extra: A physically local user can bypass the XscreenSaver authentication.

CVE-2008-1358.title: MDaemon Buffer Overflow in IMAP Service FETCH Command Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1358.body: A vulnerability was reported in MDaemon. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted IMAP FETCH command to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Matteo Memelli (aka ryujin) reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.be4mind.com/?q=node/256
CVE-2008-1358.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1361.title: VMware Windows Hosted Systems Named Pipe Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1361.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on a Windows system can open a named pipe and cause the authd process to connect to the named pipe. This can be exploited to obtain LocalSystem privileges.A local user can create a named pipe and impersonate authd to obtain the privileges of the authd process.The vulnerabilities were discovered during an internal security audit.
CVE-2008-1361.extra: A local user can obtain LocalSystem privileges on a Windows-based target system.

CVE-2008-1362.title: VMware Windows Hosted Systems Named Pipe Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1362.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user on a Windows system can open a named pipe and cause the authd process to connect to the named pipe. This can be exploited to obtain LocalSystem privileges.A local user can create a named pipe and impersonate authd to obtain the privileges of the authd process.The vulnerabilities were discovered during an internal security audit.
CVE-2008-1362.extra: A local user can obtain LocalSystem privileges on a Windows-based target system.

CVE-2008-1363.title: VMware VMX Configuration File Access Controls Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1363.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The VMX configuration file ('config.ini') is located in the application data directory for "All Users". A local user can modify the file to hijack the VMX process.Windows-based systems are affected.Sun Bing reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1363.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1364.title: VMware Unspecified DHCP Bug Lets Users Deny Service
