CVE-2008-1364.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can cause unspecified denial of service conditions on the target DHCP service.VMware Workstation 6, VMware Player 2, and ACE 2 products are not affected.Martin O'Neal reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1364.extra: A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1365.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Buffer Overflow in Processing Encrypted Passwords Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1365.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan in the processing of encrypted passwords. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted encrypted password to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/officescaz.zip[Send the exploit file to netcat, such as: nc SERVER 8080 -v -v < officescaz1.txt]Luigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1365.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1366.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan HTTP Request Parameter Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1366.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The software does not properly validate various user-supplied HTTP request parameters, including the HTTP Content-Length field. A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a null pointer bug and cause the target child process to die. This can be repeated to create a series of dead processes and potentially cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/officescaz.zip[Send the exploit file to netcat, such as: nc SERVER 8080 -v -v < officescaz3.txt]Luigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1366.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1369.title: Sun SPARC Enterprise T5120 and T5220 Default Configuration Permits Remote Root Command Execution
CVE-2008-1369.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris 10 on certain Sun SPARC Enterprise T5120 and T5220 systems. A remote or local user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges.The system ships with an insecure configuration that allows local and remote users to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges.Sun SPARC Enterprise T5120 and T5220 systems with a datecode prior to BEL07480000 are affected.
CVE-2008-1369.extra: A remote or local user can execute arbitrary commands with root privileges.

CVE-2008-1372.title: Bzip2 Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1372.body: A vulnerability was reported in Bzip2. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted archive that, when processed by the target application using bzip, will trigger a memory access error and cause the application to crash.The vulnerability was reported by the University of Oulu and CERT-FI in March 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.cert.fi/haavoittuvuudet/joint-advisory-archive-formats.html
CVE-2008-1372.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-1373.title: CUPS Buffer Overflow in gif_read_lzw() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1373.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a GIF file with a specially crafted code_size value to trigger a buffer overflow in gif_read_lzw() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2008-1373.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1376.title: nfs-utils on Red Hat Has Missing TCP Wrappers Support Which May Let Remote Users Connect to NFS Systems
CVE-2008-1376.body: A vulnerability was reported in nfs-utils on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A remote user may be able to connect to NFS systems.In nfs-utils as packaged on Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5, support for TCP wrappers is missing. As a result, an administrator may incorrectly believe that access controls are configured when they are not.
CVE-2008-1376.extra: A remote user can connect to NFS systems.

CVE-2008-1377.title: X Memory Corruption Error in SProcSecurity Functions Lets Local Users and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1377.body: A vulnerability was reported in the X Windows System. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger a memory corruption error in the SProcSecurityGenerateAuthorization(), SProcRecordCreateContext(), and SProcRecordRegisterClients() functions and execute arbitrary code on the target X server. The code will run with the privileges of the target server (which may be root privileges on many systems).A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The RECORD and Security Extensions are affected.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1377.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1379.title: X ShmPutImage() Integer Overflow Lets Local Users and Remote Authenticated Users View Arbitrary Memory Contents
CVE-2008-1379.body: A vulnerability was reported in the X Window System. A local user or remote authenticated user can view arbitrary memory contents on the target system.A local user or a remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger an integer overflow in the processing of ShmPutImage() requests and allow the user to view arbitrary X server memory locations.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1379.extra: A local user or remote authenticated user can view arbitrary X server memory contents on the target system.

CVE-2008-1380.title: Mozilla Firefox Bug in JavaScript Garbage Collector Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1380.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the JavaScript garbage collector code and cause the target user's browser to crash.The vendor indicates that similar crashes have been exploitable in the past, so arbitrary code execution may be possible. However, the reported did not confirm code execution.This vulnerability was introduced by the fix for CVE-2008-1237 described in Mozilla Foundation Security Advisory 2008-15 [see Alert ID 1019695].
CVE-2008-1380.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to crash.A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1382.title: libpng Bug in Processing Zero Length Chunks May Let Remote Users Deny Service or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1382.body: A vulnerability was reported in libpng in the processing of zero length chunks. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted data that, when processed by the target application using libpng, may execute arbitrary code on the target system. The vulnerability may also result in incorrect output, information leaks, or crashes.The vendor was notified on April 5, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2008-003.htmlTavis Ormandy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1382.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1385.title: Serendipity Input Validation Holes in the Installer and Referrer Plugin Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1385.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Serendipity. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The referrer plugin does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the HTTP Referer string before displaying the input [CVE-2008-1385]. A remote user can supply a specially crafted HTTP Referer value. When the target user views the target site, arbitrary scripting code will be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Serendipity software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit is provided:wget --referer=3D'http://<hr onMouseOver=3D"alert(7)">' http://[target]/Also, the Serendipity installer does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2008-1386].The vendor was notified of the two vulnerabilities on March 18 and 21, 2008, respectively.The original advisories are available at:http://int21.de/cve/CVE-2008-1385-s9y.htmlhttp://int21.de/cve/CVE-2008-1386-s9y.htmlHanno Boeck reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1385.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Serendipity software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1386.title: Serendipity Input Validation Holes in the Installer and Referrer Plugin Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1386.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Serendipity. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The referrer plugin does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the HTTP Referer string before displaying the input [CVE-2008-1385]. A remote user can supply a specially crafted HTTP Referer value. When the target user views the target site, arbitrary scripting code will be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Serendipity software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit is provided:wget --referer=3D'http://<hr onMouseOver=3D"alert(7)">' http://[target]/Also, the Serendipity installer does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2008-1386].The vendor was notified of the two vulnerabilities on March 18 and 21, 2008, respectively.The original advisories are available at:http://int21.de/cve/CVE-2008-1385-s9y.htmlhttp://int21.de/cve/CVE-2008-1386-s9y.htmlHanno Boeck reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1386.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Serendipity software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1389.title: Clam AntiVirus CHM Unpacking Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1389.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted CHM file that, when processed by ClamAV, will trigger an invalid memory access error and cause the target service to crash.Hanno Bock reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1389.extra: A remote user can cause the ClamAV service to crash.

CVE-2008-1391.title: libc strfmon() Integer Overflows May Let Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1391.body: A vulnerability was reported in libc. A user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted value that, when processed by the target application that uses libc, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Applications that use the strfmon() function are affected.Maksymilian Arciemowicz (cxib) of SecurityReason.com reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://securityreason.com/achievement_securityalert/53
CVE-2008-1391.extra: A user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system. The specific impact depends on the application using libc.

CVE-2008-1397.title: Check Point VPN-1 SecuRemote Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1397.body: A vulnerability was reported in Check Point VPN-1 SecuRemote. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.In certain VPN configurations, a remote authenticated user can create an IP address collision between the user's client and an IP address in the encrypted domain. This may prevent new connections to the encrypted domain or cause traffic intended for the encrypted domain to be forwarded to the remote user's client.The vendor was notified on February 20, 2008.Robert Mitchell of PureSecurity reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://puresecurity.com.au/index.php?action=fullnews&id=5
CVE-2008-1397.extra: A remote authenticated user can prevent connections to an encrypted domain.A remote authenticated user may be able to obtain VPN traffic.

CVE-2008-1412.title: F-Secure Internet Security Unhandled Exception in Processing Archives Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1412.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Internet Security. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted archive that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an unhandled exception and cause the service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.University of Oulu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1412.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1412.title: F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper Unhandled Exception in Processing Archives Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1412.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Internet Gatekeeper. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted archive that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an unhandled exception and cause the service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.University of Oulu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1412.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1412.title: F-Secure Anti-Virus Unhandled Exception in Processing Archives Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1412.body: A vulnerability was reported in F-Secure Anti-Virus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted archive that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an unhandled exception and cause the service to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Several product versions are affected, including the following:F-Secure Anti-Virus Client Security 6.04 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus for Workstations 7.11 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Client Security 5.54 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus for Linux 4.65 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus for Windows Servers 7.01 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus for Citrix Servers 7.00 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus Linux Server Security 5.54 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus for Microsoft Exchange 7.10 and priorF-Secure Anti-Virus for MIMEsweeper 5.61 and priorF-Secure Mobile Anti-Virus for S60 2nd editionF-Secure Mobile Anti-Virus for Windows Mobile 2003/5.0/6University of Oulu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1412.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1419.title: libvorbis Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1419.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in libvorbis. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted OGG audio file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an integer overflow, heap overflow, or memory corruption error and crash or execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Will Drewry of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1419.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1420.title: libvorbis Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1420.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in libvorbis. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted OGG audio file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an integer overflow, heap overflow, or memory corruption error and crash or execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Will Drewry of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1420.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1423.title: libvorbis Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1423.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in libvorbis. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted OGG audio file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an integer overflow, heap overflow, or memory corruption error and crash or execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.Will Drewry of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1423.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1434.title: Microsoft Word Memory Error in Processing CSS Values Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1434.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a Word file with a specially crafted cascading style sheet (css) value that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Jun Mao reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1434.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1435.title: Windows Explorer Bug in Parsing Saved Search Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1435.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted saved-search file file that, when opened by the target user via Windows Explorer, will trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008 are affected.
CVE-2008-1435.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1436.title: Windows Kernel Bug Lets Local Users Gain LocalSystem Privileges
CVE-2008-1436.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.A local user can run code in context of the NetworkService or LocalService accounts to gain access to resources in processes that are also running as NetworkService or LocalService and potentially cause those processes to execute arbitrary code with LocalSystem privileges.Any process that runs with SeImpersonatePrivilege and runs user-supplied code may be subject to exploit.A presentation on the exploit technique from Cesar Cerrudo of Argeniss is available at:http://www.argeniss.com/research/TokenKidnapping.pdfWindows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, and Windows Server 2008 are affected.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://www.argeniss.com/research/Churrasco.zipOn March 13, 2009, the SANS Internet Storm Center reported that this vulnerability is being actively exploited as part of a blended attack in conjunction with various unrelated remote application vulnerabilities:http://isc.sans.org/diary.html?date=2009-03-13
CVE-2008-1436.extra: A local user can obtain LocalSystem privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1437.title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1437.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Malware Protection Engine. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when received by the target system and scanned by the Microsoft Malware Protection Engine, will cause the engine to crash and restart [CVE-2008-1437]. A remote user can also cause the engine to consume excessive disk space, crash, and restart [CVE-2008-1438].The following products are affected:Windows Live OneCareMicrosoft Antigen for ExchangeMicrosoft Antigen for SMTP GatewayMicrosoft Windows DefenderMicrosoft Forefront Client SecurityMicrosoft Forefront Security for Exchange ServerMicrosoft Forefront Security for SharePointStandalone System Sweeper located in Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 6.0SoWhat of Nevis Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1437.extra: A remote user can cause the scanning engine to stop responding and then automatically restart.

CVE-2008-1438.title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1438.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Malware Protection Engine. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when received by the target system and scanned by the Microsoft Malware Protection Engine, will cause the engine to crash and restart [CVE-2008-1437]. A remote user can also cause the engine to consume excessive disk space, crash, and restart [CVE-2008-1438].The following products are affected:Windows Live OneCareMicrosoft Antigen for ExchangeMicrosoft Antigen for SMTP GatewayMicrosoft Windows DefenderMicrosoft Forefront Client SecurityMicrosoft Forefront Security for Exchange ServerMicrosoft Forefront Security for SharePointStandalone System Sweeper located in Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 6.0SoWhat of Nevis Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1438.extra: A remote user can cause the scanning engine to stop responding and then automatically restart.

CVE-2008-1440.title: Windows Bug in Processing Pragmatic General Multicast Packets with an Invalid Option Length Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1440.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Pragmatic General Multicast support. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM) protocol packet with a specially crafted option length value to cause the target system to become non-responsive.
CVE-2008-1440.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to become non-responsive.

CVE-2008-1441.title: Windows Bug in Processing Pragmatic General Multicast Packets with an Invalid Fragment Option Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1441.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Pragmatic General Multicast support. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM) protocol packet with a specially crafted fragment option value to cause the target system to become non-responsive for the duration of the attack.
CVE-2008-1441.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to become non-responsive for the duration of the attack.

CVE-2008-1442.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bug in Processing Method Calls Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1442.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML with specially crafted method calls to HTML objects that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Sebastian Apelt, Peter Vreugdenhil, and an anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint and the Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-1442.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1444.title: Microsoft DirectX SAMI File Validation Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1444.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft DirectX in the processing of SAMI file types. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Synchronized Accessible Media Interchange (SAMI) file type that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via Tipping Point and the Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-1444.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1445.title: Microsoft Active Directory LDAP Validation Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1445.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Active Directory. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP packets to cause the target system to stop responding and automatically restart.Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) and Active Directory Lightweight Directory Service (AD LDS) are also affected.Alex Matthews and John Guzik of Securify reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1445.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding and automatically restart.

CVE-2008-1446.title: Microsft Internet Information Server Integer Overflow in Internet Printing Protocol Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1446.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Internet Printing Service in Microsoft IIS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send an HTTP POST request to the target Internet Information Server (IIS) system to cause the target system to connect to an Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) system specified by the remote user. The system specified by the remote user can return specially crafted IPP data to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1446.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1448.title: Microsoft Outlook Express MTHML Redirect Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2008-1448.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Outlook Express. A remote user can access information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will access information with the privileges of the target user.HTML that redirects Internet Explorer via the Windows MHTML protocol handler causes the protocol handler to incorrectly interpret HTTP headers as MHTML content.Jorge Luis Alvarez Medina of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1448.extra: A remote user can obtain information with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2008-1448.title: Windows Mail MTHML Redirect Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2008-1448.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Mail. A remote user can access information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will access information with the privileges of the target user.HTML that redirects Internet Explorer via the Windows MHTML protocol handler causes the protocol handler to incorrectly interpret HTTP headers as MHTML content.Jorge Luis Alvarez Medina of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1448.extra: A remote user can obtain information with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2008-1451.title: Microsoft WINS Data Structure Validation Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1451.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft WINS (Windows Internet Name Service). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send WINS network packets with specially crafted data structures to the target WINS service to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2008-1451.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1453.title: Windows Bluetooth Stack SDP Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1453.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Bluetooth stack. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a large number of specially crafted Service Discovery Protocol (SDP) request packets via Bluetooth to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with elevated privileges.Systems with Bluetooth enabled are affected.
CVE-2008-1453.extra: A remote user within Bluetooth network range can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1455.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1455.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Ruben Santamarta of Reversemode.com via iDefense and ADLab of Venustech reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1455.extra: A remote user can create a PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1456.title: Microsoft Windows Event System Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1456.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Microsoft Windows Event System. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user in the domain can send specially crafted data to trigger an error in processing per-user subscriptions [CVE-2008-1457] or an error in indexing arrays [CVE-2008-1456] and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with local system privileges.Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks reported the array index error.
CVE-2008-1456.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with Local System privileges.

CVE-2008-1457.title: Microsoft Windows Event System Bugs Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1457.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Microsoft Windows Event System. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user in the domain can send specially crafted data to trigger an error in processing per-user subscriptions [CVE-2008-1457] or an error in indexing arrays [CVE-2008-1456] and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with local system privileges.Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks reported the array index error.
CVE-2008-1457.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with Local System privileges.

CVE-2008-1471.title: Panda Internet Security 'cpoint.sys' Driver Bug Lets Local Users Gain Kernel Level Privileges
CVE-2008-1471.body: A vulnerability was reported in Panda Internet Security and Panda Antivirus+Firewall. A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL value to trigger a memory corruption error in the 'cpoint.sys' driver and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.IOCTL call 0xba002848 is affected.A local user can also cause the system to crash.The vendor was notified on January 8, 2008.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2008-001.txt
CVE-2008-1471.extra: A local user can obtain kernel privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1472.title: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops Buffer Overflow in AddColumn() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1472.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops in an ActiveX control. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the AddColumn() function of the 'ListCtrl.ocx' ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: BF6EFFF3-4558-4C4C-ADAF-A87891C5F3A3The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5264Krystian Kloskowski (h07) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1472.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1473.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Server Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1473.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Agent. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can conduct a shatter attack against the agent (AClient.exe) to gain elevated privileges.Brett Moore of Insomnia Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1473.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1483.title: OpenSSH Lets Local Users Hijack Forwarded X Sessions in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-1483.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSH. A local user can hijack a target user's X session.If the specified X11 forwarding port is in use via IPv4 but not in use by IPv6, the server does not properly select a different port. A local user can hijack forwarded X connections.Timo Juhani Lindfors reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1483.extra: A local user can hijack forwarded X connections.

CVE-2008-1517.title: Mac OS X Kernel Workqueue Index Bug Lets Local Users Gain System Privileges
CVE-2008-1517.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Mac OS X kernel. A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the kernel's processing of workqueues to cause the target system to shutdown or to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with system privileges.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1517.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1518.title: Kaspersky Internet Security IOCTL Stack Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1518.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kaspersky Internet Security. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL command to the 'kl1.sys' kernel driver to trigger a stack overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with kernel level privileges.IOCTL 0x800520e8 is affected.The vendor was notified on March 19, 2008.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1518.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1518.title: Kaspersky Anti-Virus IOCTL Stack Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1518.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kaspersky Anti-Virus. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL command to the 'kl1.sys' kernel driver to trigger a stack overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with kernel level privileges.IOCTL 0x800520e8 is affected.The vendor was notified on March 19, 2008.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1518.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1544.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTTP Request Header Bug May Let Remote Users Obtain Information in a Different Domain
CVE-2008-1544.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTTP request header that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass the same-origin policy and access information from the target user's system in the context of the target domain.Stefano Di Paola of Minded Security reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.mindedsecurity.com/MSA02240108.html
CVE-2008-1544.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain information from the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1552.title: Secure Internet Live Conferencing (SILC) Buffer Overflow in Processing PKCS Data Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1552.body: A vulnerability was reported in Secure Internet Live Conferencing (SILC). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted PKCS data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.A remote client or remote server can trigger the overflow.Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on March 19, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2206
CVE-2008-1552.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1562.title: Wireshark X.509sat/Roofnet/LDAP/SCCP Dissector Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1562.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.The X.509sat dissector is affected on versions 0.99.5 through 0.99.8.The Roofnet dissector is affected on versions 0.99.5 through 0.99.8 on Windows, Solaris, and other platforms.The LDAP dissector is affected on versions 0.99.2 through 0.99.8 on Windows and other platforms.The 'decode as' feature of the SCCP dissector is affected on versions 0.99.6 through 0.99.8.
CVE-2008-1562.extra: A remote user can cause Wireshark to crash.

CVE-2008-1571.title: Mac OS X Image Capture Lets Local Users View Files and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1571.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Image Capture. A local user can view files and obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can load a specially crafted URL to exploit a path traversal flaw in the Image Capture embedded web server and obtain files on the target system [CVE-2008-1571].The system uses unsafe temporary files [CVE-2008-1572]. A local user can cause files to be overwritten by a target user with the privileges of the target user. A local user can also access the contents of images being resized by the target user.Systems running Mac OS X v10.5 and later are not affected by either of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1571.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1572.title: Mac OS X Image Capture Lets Local Users View Files and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1572.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Image Capture. A local user can view files and obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can load a specially crafted URL to exploit a path traversal flaw in the Image Capture embedded web server and obtain files on the target system [CVE-2008-1571].The system uses unsafe temporary files [CVE-2008-1572]. A local user can cause files to be overwritten by a target user with the privileges of the target user. A local user can also access the contents of images being resized by the target user.Systems running Mac OS X v10.5 and later are not affected by either of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1572.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1573.title: Mac OS X ImageIO Bugs Disclose Memory Contents to Local Users and Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1573.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X ImageIO. A local user can view portions of system memory. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A user can create a specially crafted BMP or GIF file that, when loaded, will trigger an out-of-bounds memory read in the BMP and GIF image decoding engine and disclose potentially sensitive memory contents to the user [CVE-2008-1573]. Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted JPEG2000 image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2008-1574]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-1573.extra: A local user can view portions of system memory.A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1574.title: Mac OS X ImageIO Bugs Disclose Memory Contents to Local Users and Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1574.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X ImageIO. A local user can view portions of system memory. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A user can create a specially crafted BMP or GIF file that, when loaded, will trigger an out-of-bounds memory read in the BMP and GIF image decoding engine and disclose potentially sensitive memory contents to the user [CVE-2008-1573]. Gynvael Coldwind of Hispasec reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted JPEG2000 image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2008-1574]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-1574.extra: A local user can view portions of system memory.A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1575.title: Mac OS X Apple Type Services Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1575.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Apple Type Services. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file containing specially crafted embedded fonts that, when printed by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.Melissa O'Neill of Harvey Mudd College reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1575.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when printed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1576.title: Apple Mail Buffer Overflow in Sending SMTP via IPv6 May Cause Arbitrary Code Execution
CVE-2008-1576.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Mail. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.When a user sends mail via an SMTP server and using IPv6, Apple Mail does not properly initialize memory and a buffer overflow may occur. Arbitrary code may be executed on the target system. Also, potentially sensitive information may be delivered to message recipients and mail server administrators.Systems running Mac OS X v10.5 and later are not affected.Derek Morr of The Pennsylvania State University reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1576.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1578.title: Mac OS X Single Sign-On Discloses Passwords to Local Users
CVE-2008-1578.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Single Sign-On. A local user can obtain passwords.Passwords are supplied to the sso_util command-line tool as command line arguments. A local user can potentially view the passwords and then gain elevated privileges.This includes user passwords, administrator passwords, and the KDC administration password.Geoff Franks of Hauptman Woodward Institute reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1578.extra: A local user can obtain passwords.

CVE-2008-1579.title: Apple Wiki Server Discloses Usernames to Remote Users
CVE-2008-1579.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Wiki Server. A remote user can determine user names.A remote user can access a nonexistent blog on the Wiki Server on Mac OS X Server. Based on information returned in the error message, the remote user can determine local user names.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.Don Rainwater of the University of Cincinnati reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1579.extra: A remote user can determine valid user names on the target system.

CVE-2008-1580.title: Mac OS X CFNetwork Certificate Processing Bug Discloses Client Certificates to Remote Users
CVE-2008-1580.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CFNetwork. A remote user can obtain certificate information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user with Safari, will cause the first client certificate in the keychain will be disclosed to the remote web server.
CVE-2008-1580.extra: A remote user can create a web site that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain certificate information from the target user's browser.

CVE-2008-1581.title: QuickTime PICT File PixData Structure Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1581.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of PICT files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PICT file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1581.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1582.title: QuickTime AAC-Encoded Media Handling Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1582.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of AAC-endcoded media files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted AAC-encoded media file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Dave Soldera of NGS Software and Jens Alfke reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1582.extra: A remote user can create a media file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1583.title: QuickTime Heap Overflow in Processing PICT Images Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1583.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of PICT image files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PICT image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Liam O Murchu of Symantec reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1583.extra: A remote user can create a PICT image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1584.title: QuickTime Indeo Video Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1584.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime in the processing of Indeo video media content. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Indeo movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-1584.extra: A remote user can create an Indeo video file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1585.title: QuickTime 'file://' URL Handler Bug Lets Remote Users Load Arbitrary Applications and Files
CVE-2008-1585.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary files or applications to be loaded on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted QuickTime content containing a 'file://' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will load the referenced file or application.Vinoo Thomas and Rahul Mohandas of McAfee Avert Labs reported this vulnerability. Petko D. (pdp) Petkov of GNUCITIZEN reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-1585.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will load arbitrary applications or files on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1586.title: Apple iPhone TIFF Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1586.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iPhone. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted TIFF file that, when viewed by the target user, will trigger a memory allocation error and cause the target user's device to crash.Sergio 'shadown' Alvarez of n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1586.extra: A remote user can create an image that, when viewed by the target user, will cause the target user's device to crash.

CVE-2008-1592.title: IBM WebSphere MQ for HP NonStop Server Lets Local Users Perform Administrative Tasks
CVE-2008-1592.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere MQ for HP NonStop Server. A local user can perform administrative tasks.A local user that is not in the 'mqm' group can invoke the Pathway panels and 'runmqsc' to start and stop channels and perform other administrative tasks.
CVE-2008-1592.extra: A local user can bypass security controls and perform administrative tasks.

CVE-2008-1593.title: IBM AIX Kernel Bugs Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Access Data, and Deny Service
CVE-2008-1593.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the IBM AIX kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local 64-bit process that is restarted via the checkpoint and restart feature can gain read and write access to certain portions of kernel memory. A local user can exploit this to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges.A user on a remote node of a concurrent volume group can reduce the size of a JFS2 filesystem residing on the concurrent volume group can cause a remote node to crash.When the permission on a directory on a proc filesystem is more restrictive than the permission on an executing file in that directory, directory access controls are not properly enforced.When a user make modifications via hard links, Trusted Execution does not properly protect files. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user can invoke some WPAR specific system calls to cause denial of service conditions. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user with privileges to run ProbeVue can read arbitrary kernel memory locations. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1. The following files are affected: /usr/lib/boot/unix_64 /usr/lib/boot/unix_mp /usr/lib/boot/unix_up /usr/lib/drivers/hd_pin /usr/sbin/lreducelvIBM discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1593.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1595.title: IBM AIX Kernel Bugs Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Access Data, and Deny Service
CVE-2008-1595.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the IBM AIX kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local 64-bit process that is restarted via the checkpoint and restart feature can gain read and write access to certain portions of kernel memory. A local user can exploit this to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges.A user on a remote node of a concurrent volume group can reduce the size of a JFS2 filesystem residing on the concurrent volume group can cause a remote node to crash.When the permission on a directory on a proc filesystem is more restrictive than the permission on an executing file in that directory, directory access controls are not properly enforced.When a user make modifications via hard links, Trusted Execution does not properly protect files. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user can invoke some WPAR specific system calls to cause denial of service conditions. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user with privileges to run ProbeVue can read arbitrary kernel memory locations. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1. The following files are affected: /usr/lib/boot/unix_64 /usr/lib/boot/unix_mp /usr/lib/boot/unix_up /usr/lib/drivers/hd_pin /usr/sbin/lreducelvIBM discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1595.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1596.title: IBM AIX Kernel Bugs Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Access Data, and Deny Service
CVE-2008-1596.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the IBM AIX kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local 64-bit process that is restarted via the checkpoint and restart feature can gain read and write access to certain portions of kernel memory. A local user can exploit this to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges.A user on a remote node of a concurrent volume group can reduce the size of a JFS2 filesystem residing on the concurrent volume group can cause a remote node to crash.When the permission on a directory on a proc filesystem is more restrictive than the permission on an executing file in that directory, directory access controls are not properly enforced.When a user make modifications via hard links, Trusted Execution does not properly protect files. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user can invoke some WPAR specific system calls to cause denial of service conditions. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user with privileges to run ProbeVue can read arbitrary kernel memory locations. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1. The following files are affected: /usr/lib/boot/unix_64 /usr/lib/boot/unix_mp /usr/lib/boot/unix_up /usr/lib/drivers/hd_pin /usr/sbin/lreducelvIBM discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1596.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1598.title: IBM AIX Kernel Bugs Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Access Data, and Deny Service
CVE-2008-1598.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in the IBM AIX kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local 64-bit process that is restarted via the checkpoint and restart feature can gain read and write access to certain portions of kernel memory. A local user can exploit this to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges.A user on a remote node of a concurrent volume group can reduce the size of a JFS2 filesystem residing on the concurrent volume group can cause a remote node to crash.When the permission on a directory on a proc filesystem is more restrictive than the permission on an executing file in that directory, directory access controls are not properly enforced.When a user make modifications via hard links, Trusted Execution does not properly protect files. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user can invoke some WPAR specific system calls to cause denial of service conditions. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1.A local user with privileges to run ProbeVue can read arbitrary kernel memory locations. This vulnerability only affects AIX 6.1. The following files are affected: /usr/lib/boot/unix_64 /usr/lib/boot/unix_mp /usr/lib/boot/unix_up /usr/lib/drivers/hd_pin /usr/sbin/lreducelvIBM discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1598.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1599.title: IBM AIX 'nddstat' Commands Let Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2008-1599.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit certain 'nddstat' commands to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.The following files are affected: /usr/sbin/atmstat /usr/sbin/entstat /usr/sbin/fddistat /usr/sbin/hdlcstat /usr/sbin/tokstatIBM discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1599.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1600.title: IBM AIX lsmcode Environment Variable Bug Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2008-1600.body: A vulnerability was reported in AIX in the lsmcode command. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in '/usr/sbin/lsmcode' to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.IBM discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1600.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1601.title: IBM AIX Buffer Overflow in 'reboot' Command Lets Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1601.body: A vulnerability was reported in AIX. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user in the 'shutdown' group can can invoke '/usr/sbin/reboot' trigger a stack overflow to execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the target system.IBM discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1601.extra: A local user in the 'shutdown' gropu can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1615.title: Linux Kernel AMD64 PTrace Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1615.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can invoke the process-trace capability to cause the kernel to crash.
CVE-2008-1615.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-1618.title: WatchGuard Firebox PPTP VPN Discloses Whether Usernames are Valid or Invalid
CVE-2008-1618.body: A vulnerability was reported in WatchGuard Firebox. A remote user can determine valid PPTP VPN usernames.The PPTP VPN service returns different error codes during the MS-CHAPv2 authentication handshake for valid usernames and invalid usernames. The system will return an 'E=691 Authentication Failure' error response for a valid username with an incorrect password and an 'E=649 No dialin permission' error response for an invalid username.The vendor was notified on November 5, 2007.Luke Jennings of MWR InfoSecurity reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.mwrinfosecurity.com/publications/mwri_watchguard-firebox-pptp-vpn-user-enumeration-advisory_2008-04-04.pdf
CVE-2008-1618.extra: A remote user can determine valid PPTP VPN usernames.

CVE-2008-1625.title: avast! 'aavmker4.sys' Kernel Driver Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1625.body: A vulnerability was reported in avast!. A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL request to the 'aavmker4.sys' kernel driver to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel privileges.The 0xb2d60030 IOCTL call is affected.The vendor was notified on March 16, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2008-002.txtTobias Klein reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1625.extra: A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1628.title: Audit Stack Overflow in audit_log_user_command() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1628.body: A vulnerability was reported in Audit. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted command argument to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in the audit_log_user_command() function in 'lib/audit_logging.c'.Joe Nall reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1628.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1643.title: LANDesk Management Suite PXE Representative TFTP Server Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2008-1643.body: A vulnerability was reported in LANDesk Management Suite. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to the TFTP service to view files on target system.The system is affected when PXE Representatives is deployed.
CVE-2008-1643.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-1654.title: Adobe Flash Player Cross-Domain Policy Bug Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2008-1654.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted SWF file that, when loaded by the target user, will send arbitrary HTTP headers to an arbitrary target domain. This can be exploited to conduct DNS rebinding attacks by sending messages to a UPnP control point.Nathan McFeters and Rob Carter of Ernst and Young's Advanced Security Center reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1654.extra: A remote user can conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.

CVE-2008-1655.title: Adobe Flash Player Bug Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2008-1655.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted SWF file that, when loaded by the target user, will send arbitrary HTTP headers to an arbitrary target domain. This can be exploited to conduct DNS rebinding attacks by sending messages to a UPnP control point.Tom Gallagher of Microsoft reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1655.extra: A remote user can conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.

CVE-2008-1656.title: Adobe ColdFusion Lets Remote Users Access CFC Methods
CVE-2008-1656.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A remote user can bypass security controls to access restricted functions.A remote user can invoke CFC methods via Flex 2 remoting even if the access level is set to 'public'.
CVE-2008-1656.extra: A remote user can access CFC methods.

CVE-2008-1657.title: OpenSSH Unsafe Default Configuration May Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2008-1657.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSH. A local user may be able to bypass security restrictions to execute arbitrary commands.In the default configuration, a local user with write privileges to the '~/.ssh/rc' file can modify the file and cause sshd to execute commands in the file even if an sshd_config(5) ForceCommand directive is in effect.This behavior is documented but considered by the vendor to be an unsafe default.
CVE-2008-1657.extra: A local user may be able to execute arbitrary commands.

CVE-2008-1661.title: HP StorageWorks Storage Mirroring Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1661.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP StorageWorks Storage Mirroring software. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.Version 5.0 is not affected.Titon of BastardLabs reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-1661.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1663.title: HP System Management Homepage Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1663.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP System Management Homepage. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Management Homepage software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-1663.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP System Management Homepage software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1667.title: HP OpenView Internet Services Bug in Probe Builder Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1667.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Internet Services when running Probe Builder. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target system to crash.The vulnerability resides in 'PBOVISServer.exe'.Probe Builder is a 3rd party product that is included with HP OpenView Internet Services.The vendor was notified on April 3, 2008.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1667.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-1668.title: HP-UX ftpd Unspecified Bug Lets Remote Users Gain Access
CVE-2008-1668.body: A vulnerability was reported in the HP-UX ftpd. A remote user can gain privileged access.No details were provided.
CVE-2008-1668.extra: A remote user can gain privileged access.

CVE-2008-1669.title: Linux Kernel fcntl_setlk() Race Condition May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1669.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a race condition in 'locks.c' to gain re-ordered access to the descriptor table.Alexander Viro reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1669.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1670.title: KDE Buffer Overflow in KHTML PNG Loader May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1670.body: A vulnerability was reported in KDE KHTML. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PNG image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the PNG image loader and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.KDE 3.x is not affected.Matt Rogers reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1670.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, may execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1672.title: OpenSSL TLS Handshake Bug Lets Remote Servers Crash the Connected Client
CVE-2008-1672.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote server can cause denial of service conditions on the target client.A remote server can return specially crafted data to the connected client during a TLS handshake to cause the target client to crash.This can be triggered when certain cipher suites are used and the remote server omits the 'Server Key exchange message' from the TLS handshake.Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1672.extra: A remote server can cause the connected client to crash.

CVE-2008-1673.title: Linux Kernel Heap Overflow in Decoding ASN.1 BER Data May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1673.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Kernel. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted ASN.1 data to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability affects the netfilter ip_nat_snmp_basic module and the CIFS subsystem.Wei Wang from McAfee reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1673.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1675.title: Linux Kernel Tehuti Network Driver May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1675.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The bdx_ioctl_priv() function in 'drivers/net/tehuti.c' does not properly check for CAP_NET_ADMIN permissions. A local user may be able to exploit this to obtain elevated privileges.David S. Miller reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1675.extra: A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1677.title: Red Hat Directory Server Buffer Overflow in Regex Handler Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1677.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2008-1677.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1686.title: Speex Validation Flaw in Speex Decoder Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1686.body: A vulnerability was reported in Speex. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a stream with specially crafted headers that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger an error in the speex decoder and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.libfishsound and xine-lib are also affected.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2008-2.htmlAn anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1686.extra: A remote user can create a stream that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1693.title: Xpdf Bug in Processing Embedded Fonts Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1693.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with specially crafted embedded fonts that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the CairoFont::create() function in 'CairoFontEngine.cc' (from the Poppler code base).Kees Cook from the Ubuntu Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1693.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1697.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Buffer Overflow in OVAS.EXE Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1697.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenView. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 7510 trigger a buffer overflow in 'OVAS.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Mati Aharoni of offensive-security.com reported this vulnerability.The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.offensive-security.com/0day/hp-nnm-ov.py.txt
CVE-2008-1697.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1703.title: TIBCO Enterprise Message Service Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1703.body: A vulnerability was reported in TIBCO Enterprise Message Service. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in 'tibemsd' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service. On Windows-based systems, this may be system level privileges.
CVE-2008-1703.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1704.title: TIBCO Enterprise Message Service Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1704.body: A vulnerability was reported in TIBCO Enterprise Message Service. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in 'tibemsd' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service. On Windows-based systems, this may be system level privileges.
CVE-2008-1704.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1706.title: IBM solidDB Format String and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service
CVE-2008-1706.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM solidDB. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a format string flaw in the logging function and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an invalid array index, a null pointer dereference, or a memory allocation error to cause the target service to crash.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/soliduro.zipThe original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/soliduro-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1706.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1707.title: IBM solidDB Format String and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service
CVE-2008-1707.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM solidDB. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a format string flaw in the logging function and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an invalid array index, a null pointer dereference, or a memory allocation error to cause the target service to crash.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/soliduro.zipThe original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/soliduro-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1707.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1708.title: IBM solidDB Format String and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code or Deny Service
CVE-2008-1708.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM solidDB. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a format string flaw in the logging function and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an invalid array index, a null pointer dereference, or a memory allocation error to cause the target service to crash.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/soliduro.zipThe original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/soliduro-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1708.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1710.title: IBM AIX 'chnfsmnt' Utility Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1710.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The '/usr/sbin/chnfsmnt' utility does not specify full path names when calling certain binaries. A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2008-1710.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1720.title: Rsync Buffer Overflow in Extended Attribute Support Code Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1720.body: A vulnerability was reported in Rsync. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted access control list data to trigger a buffer overflow in the extended attribute support code and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Sebastian Krahmer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1720.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1721.title: Python zlib Extension Module Signed Integer Overflow May Let Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1721.body: A vulnerability was reported in Python.
