A user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A user can supply specially crafted data that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'Modules/zlibmodule.c'.The vendor was notified on April 8, 2008.Justin Ferguson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1721.extra: A user may be able execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1722.title: CUPS Integer Overflows in Processing PNG Images May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1722.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System). A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted PNG image to trigger an integer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerabilities reside in 'filter/image-png.c' and 'filter/image-zoom.c'.thomaspollet reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1722.extra: A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1737.title: Sophos Anti-Virus Lets Local Users Deny Service and Potentially Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1737.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sophos Anti-Virus. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The software hooks several System Service Descriptor Table (SSDT) functions but does not properly validate user-mode input. A local user can supply specially crafted values to trigger an error in the driver and cause the target system to crash.The 'NtCreateKey' function is affected.The system is only affected if Runtime Behavioural Analysis is enabled.The vendor was notified on March 25, 2008.Damian Saura, Anibal Sacco, Dario Menichelli, Norberto Kueffner, Andres Blanco, and Rodrigo Carvalho from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2249
CVE-2008-1737.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.A local user may be able to obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1738.title: Rising Antivirus Lets Local Users Deny Service and Potentially Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1738.body: A vulnerability was reported in Rising Antivirus. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The software hooks several System Service Descriptor Table (SSDT) functions but does not properly validate user-mode input. A local user can supply specially crafted values to trigger an error in the driver and cause the target system to crash.The 'NtOpenProcess' function is affected.The vendor was notified on March 25, 2008.Anibal Sacco from the Core Security Technologies exploit writers team reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2249
CVE-2008-1738.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.A local user may be able to obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1740.title: Cisco Unified Presence Services Can Be Interrupted By Remote Users
CVE-2008-1740.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Presence. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1158, CVE-2008-1740]. Versions prior to 6.0(1) are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsh50164 and CSCsh20972 to these vulnerabilities.A remote user can conduct a TCP port scan to trigger a flaw in the SIP Proxy service and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1741]. Versions 6.0(1) and 6.0(2) are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj64533 to this vulnerability.Cisco discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1740.extra: A remote user can interrupt presence services.

CVE-2008-1741.title: Cisco Unified Presence Services Can Be Interrupted By Remote Users
CVE-2008-1741.body: Some vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Presence. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1158, CVE-2008-1740]. Versions prior to 6.0(1) are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsh50164 and CSCsh20972 to these vulnerabilities.A remote user can conduct a TCP port scan to trigger a flaw in the SIP Proxy service and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1741]. Versions 6.0(1) and 6.0(2) are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj64533 to this vulnerability.Cisco discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1741.extra: A remote user can interrupt presence services.

CVE-2008-1742.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Bugs in CTL CAPF, SIP, and SNMP Services Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1742.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash. The Certificate Trust List (CTL) Provider, Certificate Authority Proxy Function (CAPF), Session Initiation Protocol (SIP), and Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) Trap services are affected.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted TCP packets to the CTL service on TCP port 2444 to cause excessive memory consumption [CVE-2008-1742]. Version 5.x is affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj80609 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted TCP packets to the CTL service on TCP port 2444 to trigger a separate flaw and cause excessive memory consumption [CVE-2008-1743]. Versions 5.x and 6.x are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi98433 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 3804 to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1744]. Versions 4.1, 4.2, and 4.3 are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsk46770 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted SIP JOIN message to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1745]. Versions 5.x and 6.x are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsi48115 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted UDP packets to the SNMP trap agent on UDP port 61441 to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1746]. Versions 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 5.x, and 6.x are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj24113 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP INVITE messages to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1747]. Versions 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 5.x, and 6.x are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsk46944 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP INVITE messages to cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-1748]. Versions 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 5.x, and 6.x are affected. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsl22355 to this vulnerability.Cisco discovered these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1742.extra: A remote user can interrupt voice services.

CVE-2008-1749.title: Cisco Content Switching Module Memory Leak Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1749.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Content Switching Module. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.When the target device is configured for layer 7 load balancing, a remote user can send TCP packets with specially crafted TCP flag combinations. If the servers behind the target device are overloaded and/or fail to accept a TCP connection, a memory leak may occur and the target device may stop processing traffic.The Cisco Content Switching Module with SSL (CSM-S) is also affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsl40722 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1749.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to stop processing traffic.

CVE-2008-1754.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Stores AClient Password in Memory in Clear Text
CVE-2008-1754.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution. A local user can obtain the AClient password and then gain system privileges.The software stores the AClient password in system memory. A local user can dump the system memory for AClient.exe to obtain the password.The local user can then use this password to access the local agent administrative interface and execute arbitrary code with system level privileges.Mazin Faour of Information Risk Management reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1754.extra: A local can obtain the AClient password.

CVE-2008-1765.title: Adobe Photoshop Album Starter Edition Buffer Overflow in Processing BMP Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1765.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Photoshop Album Starter Edition. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted BMP file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-1765.extra: A remote user can create a BMP file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1767.title: libxslt XSL Style Sheet Array Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1767.body: A vulnerability was reported in libxslt. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted XSL style sheet file that, when processed by the target application using libxslt, will trigger an array overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in 'libxslt/pattern.c'.Anthony de Almeida Lopes reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1767.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2008-1770.title: Akamai Download Manager ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1770.body: A vulnerability was reported in Akamai Download Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the Download Manager ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.FortiNet reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1770.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1771.title: Firefly Media Server Integer Overflow in ws_getpostvars() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1771.body: A vulnerability was reported in Firefly Media Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send an HTTP POST request with a specially crafted Content-Length value to trigger an integer overflow in ws_getpostvars() and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Nico Golde reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1771.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1777.title: Novell eDirectory HTTP Request Procesing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1777.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell eDirectory. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to consume excessive resources or crash.Mati Aharoni of offensive-security.com reported this vulnerability.The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.offensive-security.com/0day/novel-edir.py.txt
CVE-2008-1777.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1779.title: Solaris Bug in ip_rput_local_options() in Processing Self Encapsulated IP Packets Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1779.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A remote user can cause the target system to crash.A remote user can send a self encapsulated IP packet with a specially crafted time stamp option to trigger a system panic.The vulnerability resides in ip_rput_local_options().
CVE-2008-1779.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-1780.title: Solaris Trusted Extensions Bug Lets Local Applications Bypass Labeled Networking Restrictions
CVE-2008-1780.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris Trusted Extensions. A local application can bypass label restrictions.A local untrusted application in a labeled zone can exchange data with an application in a separate labeled zone.
CVE-2008-1780.extra: A local untrusted application in a labeled zone can exchange data with an application in a separate labeled zone.

CVE-2008-1786.title: CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops Bug in gui_cm_ctrls ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1786.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA ARCserve Backup for Laptops and Desktops. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an input validation flaw in the gui_cm_ctrls control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: E6239EB3-E0B0-46DA-A215-CFA9B3B740C5Only the server installation is affected. Client installations are not affected.The vulnerability also affects CA Desktop Management Suite, Unicenter Desktop Management Bundle, Unicenter Asset Management, Unicenter Software Delivery, and Unicenter Remote Control.Greg Linares of eEye Digital Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1786.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1795.title: Blackboard Academic Suite Input Validation Holes Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1795.body: A vulnerability was reported in Blackboard Academic Suite. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Blackboard software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'searchText' parameter of the 'viewCatalog' script is affected.The 'announcement' script is affected.The vendor was notified on February 2008.Duong Thanh (Knight4vn) reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.scribd.com/doc/2363025/Blackboard-Academic-Suite-Multiple-XSS-Vulnerabilities-
CVE-2008-1795.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Blackboard software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1801.title: rdesktop Integer Underflow in iso_recv_msg() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1801.body: A vulnerability was reported in rdesktop. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote RDP server can send a specially crafted reply to the connected target user to trigger an integer underflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the iso_recv_msg() function in 'iso.c'.The vendor was notified on November 12, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1801.extra: A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the connected target user's system.

CVE-2008-1802.title: rdesktop Buffer Overflow in process_redirect_pdu() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1802.body: A vulnerability was reported in rdesktop. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote RDP server can send a specially crafted RDP redirect request to the connected target user to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the process_redirect_pdu() function in 'rdp.c'.The vendor was notified on November 12, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1802.extra: A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the connected target user's system.

CVE-2008-1803.title: rdesktop Integer Signedness Bug in channel_process() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1803.body: An integer signedness vulnerability was reported in rdesktop. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote RDP server can send a specially crafted reply to the connected target user to trigger an integer signedness bug and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the channel_process() function in 'rdesktop.c'.The vendor was notified on November 12, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1803.extra: A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the connected target user's system.

CVE-2008-1805.title: Skype 'file://' URL Warning Can Be Bypassed By Remote USers
CVE-2008-1805.body: A vulnerability was reported in Skype. A remote user can bypass the 'file://' URL warning and potentially cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'file://' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will fail to warn the user before downloading and potentially executing the file.The software does not properly check the case of file extensions and does not check for some file extensions associated with executable programs.The vendor was notified on May 16, 2008.Ismael Briones of Inkatel.com reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1805.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will download the file to the target user's system without warning.

CVE-2008-1806.title: FreeType2 Integer Overflow in Parsing PFB Font Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1806.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeType2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Printer Font Binary (PFB) format font file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vulnerability occurs in the parsing of the 'Private' dictionary table structure.The vendor was notified on June 3, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1806.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1807.title: FreeType2 Memory Corruption Error in Parsing PFB Font Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1807.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeType2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Printer Font Binary (PFB) format font file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.A specially crafted 'number of axes' in a PFB file can trigger code execution.The vendor was notified on June 3, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1807.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1808.title: FreeType2 Heap Overflows in Parsing PFB and TTF Font Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1808.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeType2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Printer Font Binary (PFB) format or TrueType Font file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.The vendor was notified on June 3, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1808.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1809.title: Novell eDirectory Heap Overflow in Processing LDAP Search Parameters Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1809.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell eDirectory. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted NULL search parameter to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on March 10, 2008.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1809.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1810.title: SAP MaxDB Untrusted Path in 'dbmsrv' Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1810.body: A vulnerability was reported in MaxDB. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can set a specially crafted PATH environment variable value and then invoke the 'dbmcli' program to cause the program to execute arbitrary code on the target system with 'sdb' user privileges and 'sdba' group privileges.The vendor was notified on March 27, 2008.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1810.extra: A local user can obtain 'sdb' user privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1833.title: Clam AntiVirus Heap Overflow in Processing WWPack Packed Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1833.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PE binary packed with the WWPack executable compressor that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in 'libclamav/pe.c'.The vendor was notified on March 4, 2008.Damian Put and Thomas Pollet reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-1833.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1842.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Buffer Overflow in ovspmd Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1842.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the ovspmd service on port 8886 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/closedview.zipLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1842.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1846.title: SAP NetWeaver Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1846.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP NetWeaver. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can submit specially crafted text that, when viewed by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the SAP NetWeaver software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The file "feedbacks" feature is affected.The vendor was notified on March 11, 2008.Jaime Blasco from aitsec.com reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.aitsec.com/vulnerability-SAP-Netweaver-6.40-7.0-Cross-Site-Scripting.php
CVE-2008-1846.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the SAP NetWeaver software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1851.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovalarmsrv and ovtopmd Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1851.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 2954 cause the target 'ovalarmsrv' service to hang or crash.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 2532 cause the target 'ovtopmd' service to crash.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/closedviewx.zipLuigi Auriemma reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1851.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1852.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovalarmsrv and ovtopmd Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1852.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 2954 cause the target 'ovalarmsrv' service to hang or crash.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 2532 cause the target 'ovtopmd' service to crash.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/closedviewx.zipLuigi Auriemma reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1852.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1853.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager ovalarmsrv and ovtopmd Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1853.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 2954 cause the target 'ovalarmsrv' service to hang or crash.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 2532 cause the target 'ovtopmd' service to crash.Demonstration exploit code is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/closedviewx.zipLuigi Auriemma reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-1853.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1855.title: McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator Common Management Agent Memory Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1855.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator in the Common Management Agent. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 8081 to cause the target Common Management Agent (CMA) service to crash.CMA versions 3.6.0.574 (Patch3) and prior are affected.Managed mode installations are affected. Standalone (unmanaged) installations are not affected.Mati Aharoni of offensive-security.com reported this vulnerability.The original advisory and a demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.offensive-security.com/0day/mcafee_again.py.txt
CVE-2008-1855.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-1897.title: Asterisk IAX2 Protocol Verification Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1897.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a spoofed ACK response message to cause the target system to send audio connection packets to an arbitrary system, potentially causing denial of service conditions on the arbitrary system.The original advisory is available at:https://www.altsci.com/concepts/page.php?s=asteri&p=2Joel R. Voss (aka Javantea) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1897.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on a target system via an intermediate system.

CVE-2008-1910.title: Borland InterBase Buffer Overflow in 'ibserver.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1910.body: A vulnerability was reported in InterBase. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 3050 trigger a buffer overflow in 'ibserver.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service. Liu Zhen Hua reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1910.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1912.title: DivX Player Bug in Processing Subtitles Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1912.body: A vulnerability was reported in DivX Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a '.srt' file with a specially crafted subtitle value that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5492lhoang8500 at gmail.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1912.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1926.title: Util-linux Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject Data into the Log Files
CVE-2008-1926.body: A vulnerability was reported in Util-linux. A remote user can inject data into the log files.A remote user can supply a specially crafted account name value to potentially modify portions of the audit log.The vulnerability resides in 'login-utils/login.c'.Mirek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1926.extra: A remote user can inject data into the log files.

CVE-2008-1927.title: Perl UTF8 Regex Processing Double Free Bug May Let Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1927.body: A vulnerability was reported in Perl. A user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can supply a specially crafted regular expression containing UTF8 characters to trigger a double free and execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the process running perl.steev at hot.pl reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1927.extra: A user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-1930.title: WordPress Authentication Cookie Integrity Flaw Lets Remote Users Gain Administrative Privileges
CVE-2008-1930.body: A vulnerability was reported in WordPress. A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target application.Part of the authentication cookie is not included within the message authentication code calculation. As a result, a remote user can modify authentication cookies in a manner that will not be detected by the cryptographic integrity protection.A remote user that can register a username can register a specially crafted username beginning with the string "admin" and then modify the resulting cookie to gain administrative privileges on Wordpress.The vendor was notified on April 22, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/users/sjm217/advisories/wordpress-cookie-integrity.txtSteven J. Murdoch reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1930.extra: A remote user can gain administrative privileges on the target application.

CVE-2008-1940.title: grsecurity Lets Local Users Bypass Role Based Access Control Rules
CVE-2008-1940.body: A vulnerability was reported in grsecurity. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can bypass user_transition_deny/allow role-based access controls.
CVE-2008-1940.extra: A local user can bypass role-based access controls on the target system.

CVE-2008-1943.title: Xen PVFB Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service or Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1943.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.The hypervisor's para-virtualized framebuffer (PVFB) backend does not properly validate user-supplied input in the frontend's framebuffer description. A local user can supply a specially crafted value to cause the backend to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code in the privileged domain (dom0).Markus Armbruster reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1943.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1944.title: Xen PVFB Format Validation Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service or Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1944.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.The hypervisor's para-virtualized framebuffer (PVFB) backend does not properly validate the format of user-supplied input that update the frontend's framebuffer. A local user can supply a specially crafted value to cause the backend to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code in the privileged domain (dom0).Daniel P. Berrange reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1944.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-1946.title: coreutils Red Hat PAM Configuration Bug May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1946.body: A vulnerability was reported in coreutils on Red Hat. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The coreutils package on Red Hat Enterprise Linux does not use the Pluggable Authentication Module (PAM) pam_succeed_if() function properly in the configuration file for the "su" command.A local user with knowledge of the target user's password can exploit the command to change to a locked or expired target user account.
CVE-2008-1946.extra: A local user with knowledge of the target user's password can execute commands as the locked or expired target user account.

CVE-2008-1947.title: Tomcat Input Validation Hole in Host Manager Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1947.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tomcat in the Host Manager application. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Host Manager web application does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Tomcat software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-1947.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Tomcat software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1948.title: GnuTLS Server Name Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1948.body: A vulnerability was reported in GnuTLS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted server name value to cause the target service overwrite unallocated memory and crash.Codenomicon reported this vulnerability via CERT-FI.The original advisory is available at:https://www.cert.fi/haavoittuvuudet/advisory-gnutls.html
CVE-2008-1948.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.[Editor's note: The vendor did not evaluate whether this buffer overflow can result in code execution.]

CVE-2008-1949.title: GnuTLS Null Pointer Dereference in Processing Client Hello Messages Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1949.body: A vulnerability was reported in GnuTLS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send repeated Client Hello handshake messages to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target service to crash.Codenomicon reported this vulnerability via CERT-FI.The original advisory is available at:https://www.cert.fi/haavoittuvuudet/advisory-gnutls.html
CVE-2008-1949.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-1950.title: GnuTLS Invalid Record Length Values Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-1950.body: A vulnerability was reported in GnuTLS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send an encrypted Client Hello message with a record length of 8 to cause the target service to crash.Codenomicon reported this vulnerability via CERT-FI.The original advisory is available at:https://www.cert.fi/haavoittuvuudet/advisory-gnutls.html
CVE-2008-1950.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-1951.title: SBLIM RPATH Configuration Error on Red Hat Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1951.body: A vulnerability was reported in SBLIM on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.On Red Hat Enterprise Linux, certain SBLIM libraries are configured with the runtime library search path (RPATH) set to a world-writable temporary directory. A local user could place alternate library files in that directory. Then, when the target user runs SBLIM, the code in the alternate library files will be executed with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-1951.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1952.title: Xen Hypervisor PVFB Validation Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service and May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-1952.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The hypervisor para-virtualized frame buffer (PVFB) backend does not properly validate the frame buffer size. A privileged local user in the unprivileged domain (DomU) can exploit this to map an arbitrary amount of guest memory. The user may also be able to execute arbitrary code in the privileged domain (Dom0).The vulnerability resides in 'tools/ioemu/hw/xenfb.c'.
CVE-2008-1952.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A privileged local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-1965.title: IBM Lotus Symphony URI Handler Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1965.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Symphony. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'cai:' URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the Lotus Expeditor rcplauncher code.IBM has assigned SPR # PRAD7E2LQ4 to this vulnerability.A demonstration exploit URI is provided:cai:"%20-launcher%20\\6.6.6.6\d$\trojanThomas Pollet reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1965.extra: A remote user can create URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1965.title: IBM Lotus Expeditor URI Handler Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-1965.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Lotus Expeditor. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'cai:' URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the rcplauncher code.IBM has assigned SPR # PRAD7E2LQ4 to this vulnerability.A demonstration exploit URI is provided:cai:"%20-launcher%20\\6.6.6.6\d$\trojanThomas Pollet reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1965.extra: A remote user can create a URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-1974.title: Horde Kronolith Input Validation Hole in 'addevent.php' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-1974.body: A vulnerability was reported in Horde Kronolith. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The add event screen does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'url' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Horde Application Framework software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/horde/kronolith/addevent.php?timestamp=1208932200&url=%22%3E%3CScript%3Ealert('Aria-Security%20Team (Persian Security Team)')%3C/script%3EThe original advisory is available at:http://forum.aria-security.com/showthread.php?t=49The-0utl4w from Aria-Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1974.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Horde Application Framework software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-1979.title: CA ARCserve Backup Discovery Service Lets Remote Users Deny SErvice
CVE-2008-1979.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA ARCserve Backup. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the discovery service (casdscsvc) to cause the target service to crash.The following products are affected:CA ARCserve Backup r12.0 WindowsCA ARCserve Backup r11.5 Windows SP3 and priorCA ARCserve Backup r11.1 WindowsCA ARCserve Backup r11.1 NetwareCA Server Protection Suite r2CA Business Protection Suite r2CA Business Protection Suite for Microsoft Small Business Server Standard Edition r2CA Business Protection Suite for Microsoft Small Business Server Premium Edition r2CA ARCserve Backup r11.5 Windows SP4 is not affected.The original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/carcbackazz-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1979.extra: A remote user can cause the target discovery service to crash.

CVE-2008-1984.title: CA Secure Content Manager eCSqdmn Daemon Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2008-1984.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Secure Content Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the eTrust common services daemon (eCSqdmn) on TCP port 1882 to cause the target service to crash or enter an infinite loop.eCSqdmn versions 8.0.28000.511 and prior are affected.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://aluigi.org/poc/ecsqdamn.zipThe original advisory is available at:http://aluigi.altervista.org/adv/ecsqdamn-adv.txtLuigi Auriemma reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-1984.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash or consume excessive CPU resources.

CVE-2008-1995.title: Sun Java System Directory Proxy Server Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Administrative Privileges
CVE-2008-1995.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Directory Proxy Server. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target application.The system does not properly classify connections based on the bind DN criteria and may apply the wrong policy. As a result, a remote authenticated user can obtain administrative privileges.Version 5.2 is not affected.
CVE-2008-1995.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain administrative privileges on the target application.

CVE-2008-2005.title: Wonderware SuiteLink Service Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2005.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wonderware SuiteLink. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 5413 to trigger a memory allocation error in the Wonderware SuiteLink Service ('slssvc.exe') and cause the service to shutdown.Several Wonderware products include this service.The vendor was notified on January 30, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2187Sebastian Muniz from the Exploit Writers Team (EWT) at Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2005.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2006.title: Apple iCal Null Pointer Dereference May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2006.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iCal. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted '.ics' file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target application to crash.It may be possible to execute arbitrary code on the target system, but the report did not confirm code execution.This can also be exploited via a CalDAV server.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2219Rodrigo Carvalho from the Core Security Consulting Services (SCS) team of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2006.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's application to crash.[Editor's note: It may be possible to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system, but the report did not confirm code execution.]

CVE-2008-2015.title: Watchfire AppScan ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Overwrite Arbitrary Files
CVE-2008-2015.body: A vulnerability was reported in Watchfire AppScan. A remote user can cause arbitrary files to be overwritten on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke an ActiveX control and overwrite an arbitrary file on the target system.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: E302E486-D748-475C-84F3-4F7ED6F78EC5A demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/5496callAX reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2015.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will overwrite arbitrary files on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2026.title: RSA Authentication Agent Input Validation Hole in Login Page Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2026.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Authentication Agent. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The '/WebID/IISWebAgentIF.dll' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'postdata' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Authentication Agent software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Some demonstration exploit URLs are provided:https://[target]/WebID/IISWebAgentIF.dll?stage=useridandpasscode&referrer=Z2F&sessionid=0&postdata=%22%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert(%22XSS%22)%3C/script%3E%3Ca%20b=%22&authntype=2&username=test&passcode=testhttps://[target]/WebID/IISWebAgentIF.dll?stage=useridandpasscode&referrer=Z2F&sessionid=0&postdata=%22%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert(%22XSS%22)%3C/script%3E%3Ca%20b=%22Jan Fry and Adrian Pastor of ProCheckUp Ltd. reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: The report indicates that this may have been reported in 2005 but was not reported as exploitable via an HTTP GET request.]
CVE-2008-2026.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Authentication Agent software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2042.title: Adobe Acrobat Javascript API app.checkForUpdate() Function Lets Remote Users Execute Restricted Functions
CVE-2008-2042.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file containing specially crafted javascript that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the Javascript API app.checkForUpdate() function. This function allows the remote user to execute restricted functions and execute arbitrary code.Adobe Reader and Adobe Acrobat version 8.x are not affected.The vendor was notified on November 2, 2007.cocoruder reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2042.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2049.title: E-Post Mail Server Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain POP3 User Passwords
CVE-2008-2049.body: A vulnerability was reported in E-Post Mail Server. A remote user can obtain user passwords.A remote user can send specially-crafted APOP commands to cause the system to display the specified user's POP3 password.The vendor was notified on April 17, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://vuln.sg/epostmailserver410-en.htmlTan Chew Keong of vuln.sg reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2049.extra: A remote user can obtain the target user's POP3 password.

CVE-2008-2055.title: Cisco PIX Firewall TCP ACK Packet Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2055.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco PIX Firewall. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted TCP ACK packet to the device to cause unspecified denial of service conditions.Packets traversing the device cannot trigger this vulnerability.Versions 7.1.x and 7.2.x with WebVPN, SSL VPN, or ASDM enabled are affected. Version 8.0 with Telnet, Secure Shell (SSH), WebVPN, SSL VPN, or ASDM enabled is affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm84110 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2055.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2055.title: Cisco ASA TCP ACK Packet Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2055.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted TCP ACK packet to the device to cause unspecified denial of service conditions.Packets traversing the device cannot trigger this vulnerability.Versions 7.1.x and 7.2.x with WebVPN, SSL VPN, or ASDM enabled are affected. Version 8.0 with Telnet, Secure Shell (SSH), WebVPN, SSL VPN, or ASDM enabled is affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm84110 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2055.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2056.title: Cisco PIX Firewall TLS Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2056.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco PIX Firewall. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted TLS packets to the device to cause the target device to reload.Packets traversing the device cannot trigger this vulnerability.Versions prior to 8.0(3)9 on the 8.0.x release or prior to version 8.1(1)1 on the 8.1.x release are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm26841 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2056.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-2056.title: Cisco ASA TLS Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2056.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted TLS packets to the device to cause the target device to reload.Packets traversing the device cannot trigger this vulnerability.Versions prior to 8.0(3)9 on the 8.0.x release or prior to version 8.1(1)1 on the 8.1.x release are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm26841 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2056.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-2058.title: Cisco PIX Firewall TCP Port 443 Bug in Handling Port Scans Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2058.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco PIX Firewall. A remote user can cause the target device to reload.A remote user can conduct a port scan against TCP port 443 to cause the system to reload.Versions prior to 7.2(3)2 on the 7.2.x release and prior to 8.0(2)17 on the 8.0.x release are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj60659 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2058.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-2058.title: Cisco ASA TCP Port 443 Bug in Handling Port Scans Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2058.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause the target device to reload.A remote user can conduct a port scan against TCP port 443 to cause the system to reload.Versions prior to 7.2(3)2 on the 7.2.x release and prior to 8.0(2)17 on the 8.0.x release are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj60659 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2058.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-2059.title: Cisco PIX Firewall May Let Remote Users Bypass Control-plane ACLs
CVE-2008-2059.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco PIX Firewall. A remote user may be able to bypass control-plane access control lists.A control-plane access control list (ACL) may not work after it is initially configured on the device. As a result, a remote user may be able to connect to the target device.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm67466 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2059.extra: A remote user may be able to connect to the target device.

CVE-2008-2059.title: Cisco ASA May Let Remote Users Bypass Control-plane ACLs
CVE-2008-2059.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user may be able to bypass control-plane access control lists.A control-plane access control list (ACL) may not work after it is initially configured on the device. As a result, a remote user may be able to connect to the target device.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm67466 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2059.extra: A remote user may be able to connect to the target device.

CVE-2008-2061.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CTI Manager Service Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2061.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can connect to the Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) Manager service on TCP port 2748 and send specially crafted data to cause denial of service conditions.Cisco CUCM versions 5.x and 6.x are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCso75027 to this vulnerability.The following version are affected: * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 5.x versions prior to 5.1(3c) * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 6.x versions prior to 6.1(2)Cisco Unified Communications Manager Express is not affected.
CVE-2008-2061.extra: A remote user can interrupt voice services.

CVE-2008-2062.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Lets Remote Users Access Statistics
CVE-2008-2062.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can bypass authentication to access statistics.A remote user can connect to the Real-Time Information Server (RIS) Data Collector service on TCP port 2556 to bypass authentication and gain access to CUCM cluster statistics.For CUCM 4.x versions, Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq35151 to this vulnerability [CVE-2008-2062]. For CUCM 5.x and 6.x versions, Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj90843 to this vulnerability [CVE-2008-2730].The following version are affected: * Cisco Unified CallManager 4.1 versions * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 4.2 versions prior to 4.2(3)SR4 * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 4.3 versions prior to 4.3(2)SR1 * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 5.x versions prior to 5.1(3c) * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 6.x versions prior to 6.1(2)Cisco Unified Communications Manager Express is not affected.VoIPshield reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2062.extra: A remote user can access CUCM statistics.

CVE-2008-2069.title: Novell GroupWise Buffer Overflow in 'mailto:' URL Handler Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2069.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'mailto:' link that, when loaded by the target user via the mail client, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The link can be loaded automatically via HTML.Version 7.0 is affected. Version 7.0 with SP1 or later is reportedly not affected.Juan Pablo Lopez Yacubian reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2069.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2079.title: MySQL MyISAM Options Let Local Users Overwrite Table Files
CVE-2008-2079.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A local user can bypass security restrictions.A local user can create MyISAM tables using the DATA DIRECTORY and INDEX DIRECTORY options to overwrite existing table files in the MySQL data directory.Sergei Golubchik reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2079.extra: A local user can overwrite table files.

CVE-2008-2080.title: Common Data Format Library Buffer Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2080.body: A vulnerability was reported in the NASA Common Data Format Library. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted CDF file that, when loaded by the target application using the CDF library, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'src/lib/cdfread64.c'.The vendor was notified on April 7, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2260Alfredo Ortega from Core Security Technologies CORE IMPACT Exploit Writing Team (EWT) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2080.extra: A remote user can create a CDF file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2086.title: Java Web Start Bugs Let Remote Users Read/Write Files, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Establish Network Connections
CVE-2008-2086.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Java Web Start and Java Plug-in. A remote user can read/write files and execute applications on the target user's system. A remote user can connect to arbitrary hosts via the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Java Web Start application that, when loaded by the target user, will establish network connections to hosts other than the host that the application was downloaded from.A remote user can create a specially crafted Java Web Start application that, when loaded by the target user, will will read and write local files or execute applications on the target system with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Java Web Start application that, when loaded by the target user, will perform certain trusted operations (e.g., modify system properties).A remote user can create a specially crafted Java Web Start application that, when loaded by the target user, will determine the location of the Java Web Start cache and the username of the user running the Java Web Start application.A user can cause hidden code on a target system to make network connections to the target host and to hijack HTTP sessions using cookies stored in the browser.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will read arbitrary files on the target system and establish network connections to hosts other than the host that the applet was loaded from.A remote user can create a specially crafted application that, when loaded by the target user, will request local files to be displayed by the target user's browser.Peter Csepely via TippingPoint, Virtual Security Research (VSR), Billy Rios of Microsoft, Nate Mcfeters of Ernst and Young, and John Heasman of NGSSoftware reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2086.extra: A remote user can read/write files or execute applications on the target user's system or establish network connections to arbitrary hosts.

CVE-2008-2090.title: Solaris SCTP Response Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2090.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted SCTP protocol data to cause the target system to create a flood of response messages. System performance may degrade or the target system may hang.
CVE-2008-2090.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2097.title: VMware ESX Openwsman Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2008-2097.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESX. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted Content-Length value to Openwsman to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.Users with a local ESX account or a VirtualCenter account with the 'Host.Cim.CimInteraction' permission can exploit this flaw.Alexander Sotirov of VMware Security Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2097.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2098.title: VMware Workstation, Player, ACE, and Fusion Buffer Overflow in HGFS File System Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2098.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation, VMware Player, VMware ACE, and VMware Fusion. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a heap overflow in the shared folders feature of the VMware Host Guest File System (HGFS) to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run in the context of the vmx process.Systems with shared folders enabled (not the default configuration) may be affected if at least one folder on the host system is shared.The following versions are affected:VMware Workstation 6.0.3 and prior 6.x versionsVMware Player 2.0.3 and prior 2.x versionsVMware ACE 2.0.3 and prior 2.x versionsVMware Fusion 1.1.1 and priorAndrew Honig of the U.S. Department of Defense reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2098.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2099.title: VMware Workstation, Player, and ACE VMCI Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2099.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation, VMware Player, and VMware ACE. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user in a guest operating system can trigger a flaw in the Virtual Machine Communication Interface (VMCI) code to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run in the context of the vmx process on the host. Systems with VMCI enabled may be affected.The following versions are affected:VMware Workstation 6.0.3 and prior 6.x versionsVMware Player 2.0.3 and prior 2.x versionsVMware ACE 2.0.3 and prior 2.x versionsOnly Windows-based systems are affected.Andrew Honig of the U.S. Department of Defense reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2099.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2100.title: VMware Buffer Overflows in VIX API Let Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2100.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware in the VIX Application Programming Interface (API). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger several buffer overflows in the VIX API to execute arbitrary code on the target host operating system.VMware Workstation, VMware ACE, VMware Player, VMware Server, VMware Fusion, and ESX Server are affected.Andrew Honig of the U.S. Department of Defense reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2100.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2101.title: VMware ESX VMware Consolidated Backup Utilities May Disclose Passwords to Local Users
CVE-2008-2101.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware ESX. A local user can obtain certain passwords.A local user on the service console can obtain passwords that were supplied by the target user via some VMware Consolidated Backup (VCB) command-line utilities while the utlities are running.Utilities that accept the password via the '-p' command line switch are affected.ESX is only affected if the VCB utilities are used.
CVE-2008-2101.extra: A local user on the service console can obtain passwords supplied to certain VCB utilities.

CVE-2008-2103.title: Bugzilla Input Validation Hole in 'Format for Printing' View 'id' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2103.body: A vulnerability was reported in Bugzilla. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Bugzilla software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The "Format for Printing" view of a bug and the "Long Format" of a bug list display modes are affected.Bradley Baetz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2103.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Bugzilla software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2104.title: Bugzilla XML-RPC Interface Bug Lets Remote Users Create Confirmed Bugs
CVE-2008-2104.body: A vulnerability was reported in Bugzilla. A remote authenticated user can create confirmed bug reports.A remote authenticated user can create bugs in the NEW or ASSIGNED states via the XML-RPC interface even if the user does not have 'canconfirm' privileges.Frederic Buclin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2104.extra: A remote authenticated user without 'canconfirm' privileges can create confirmed bug entries.

CVE-2008-2105.title: Bugzilla 'email_in.pl' May Let Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Checks
CVE-2008-2105.body: A vulnerability was reported in Bugzilla. A remote authenticated user may be able to bypass security checks.On systems that perform security checks based on the 'From' header, a remote authenticated user can specify the 'reporter' value in the body of the email to override the 'From' header and bypass the security checks.Frederic Buclin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2105.extra: A remote authenticated user may be able to bypass security checks that are based on the 'From' header.

CVE-2008-2111.title: Yahoo! Assistant 'ynotifier.dll' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2111.body: A vulnerability was reported in Yahoo! Assistant. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 2283BB66-A15D-4AC8-BA72-9C8C9F5A1691The vendor was notified on April 23, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://secway.org/advisory/AD20080506EN.txtSowhat of Nevis Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2111.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2119.title: Asterisk Pedantic Mode Bug in ast_uri_decode() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2119.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted From header value during pedantic mode processing to cause the target service to crash.The vulnerability resides in the ast_uri_decode() function.Hooi Ng reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2119.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-2120.title: Sun Java System Web Server Discloses JSP Source Code to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2120.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Web Server. A remote user can view JSP source code.No details were provided.
CVE-2008-2120.extra: A remote user can view JSP source code.

CVE-2008-2120.title: Sun Java System Application Server Discloses JSP Source Code to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2120.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Application Server. A remote user can view JSP source code.No details were provided.
CVE-2008-2120.extra: A remote user can view JSP source code.

CVE-2008-2122.title: IBM Rational Build Forge Port State Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2122.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational Build Forge. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can conduct a port scan to cause the agent to generate multiple bfagent server processes, consuming excessive CPU resources. This may cause the target system to shutdown.IBM has assigned APAR PK59905 to this vulnerability.The vendor notes that version 7.0.1 iFix1 is not affected.
CVE-2008-2122.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2123.title: SAP Internet Transaction Server 'wgate.dll' Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2123.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP Internet Transaction Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'wgate.dll' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Internet Transaction Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://www.portcullis-security.com/275.phpAndrew Davies of Portcullis Computer Security Ltd discovered this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2123.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Internet Transaction Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2136.title: Linux Kernel Memory Leak in SIT Code ipip6_rcv() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2136.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel in the Simple Internet Transition code. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a memory leak in the ipip6_rcv() function.The vulnerability resides in 'net/ipv6/sit.c'.Paul Harks reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2136.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2137.title: Linux Kernel SPARC Architecture Memory Mapped Virtual Address Validation Bug Lets Local Users Crash the System
CVE-2008-2137.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can exploit a flaw in the validation of memory mapped virtual address ranges to cause the kernel to crash.Sparc-based systems are affected.David Miller and Jan Lieskovsky reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2137.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-2138.title: Oracle Application Server May Discloses Files in '/dav_portal/portal/' Directory to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2138.body: A vulnerability was reported in Oracle Application Server. A remote user can view certain files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted cookie value to bypass authentication and view files in the '/dav_portal/portal/' directory. This can reportedly be exploited by making a URL request terminating in the '%0A' string to cause a special session ID cookie to be set and then requesting the '/dav_portal/portal/' directory.Deniz Cevik reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: CVE has reported that "as of 20080512, Oracle has not commented on the accuracy of this report."]
CVE-2008-2138.extra: A remote user can view certain files on the target system.

CVE-2008-2145.title: Novell Client Buffer Overflow Lets Physically Local User Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2145.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Client. A physically local user can obtain privileges on the target system. A physically local user can cause denial of service conditions.A physically local user can supply a specially crafted username value, attempt to login, and then click the "forgot password" link to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A physically local user can also supply a specially crafted username value to cause the target system to crash.Laurent Gaffie reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2145.extra: A physically local user can obtain privileges on the target system.A physically local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-2152.title: OpenOffice Integer Overflow in rtl_allocateMemory() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2152.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice.org Office Suite. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Office file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow in the rtl_allocateMemory() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 8, 2008.Sean Larsson of iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2152.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2157.title: EMC AlphaStor Library Manager 'robotd' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2157.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC AlphaStor in the Library Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to 'robotd' on TCP port 3500 to execute arbitrary code on the target system. On Windows-based systems, the code will run with System privileges.Windows is affected. Other operating systems were not tested.The vendor was notified on April 16, 2008.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2157.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2158.title: EMC AlphaStor Stack Overflows in Server Agent Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2158.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC AlphaStor in the Server Agent. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 41025 to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. On Windows-based systems, the code will run with System privileges.Windows is affected. Other operating systems were not tested.Several buffer overflows exist.The vendor was notified on April 16, 2008.Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security reported some of these vulnerabilities via iDefense. Sean Larsson of iDefense Labs reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2158.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2160.title: Windows CE GDI+ and GIF Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows CE. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted GIF or JPEG file that, when processed, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2008-2160.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2162.title: SonicWALL Email Security Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2162.body: A vulnerability was reported in SonicWALL Email Security. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the HTTP Host header parameter before displaying the input.
