CVE-2008-2292.title: Net-snmp Buffer Overflow in __snprint_value() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2292.body: A vulnerability was reported in Net-snmp. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted OCTETSTRING in an attribute value pair to trigger a buffer overflow in the __snprint_value() function in snmp_get and execute arbitrary code on the target system or crash the target service. The code will run with the privileges of the target service. The vulnerability was originally reported in December 2007.John Kortink reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2292.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2299.title: Citrix Presentation Server May Use a Weaker Encryption Algorithm
CVE-2008-2299.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Presentation Server. The system may use the incorrect encryption algorithm.In certain situations, a remote client may connect to the server using encryption settings that are weaker than the minimum configured by the administrator.Systems that use SecureICA and ICA Basic encryption are affected.Citrix Access Essentials versions 2.0 and prior are also affected.Citrix Desktop Server 1.0 is also affected.
CVE-2008-2299.extra: The system may use weaker encryption settings than intended.

CVE-2008-2300.title: Citrix Presentation Server Lets Remote Authenticated Users Access Desktop Session Without Permission
CVE-2008-2300.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Presentation Server. A remote authenticated user can access a desktop session without authorization.A remote authenticated user can gain access to a desktop running in the context of their own account.Citrix Access Essentials versions 2.0 and prior are also affected.Citrix Desktop Server 1.0 is also affected.
CVE-2008-2300.extra: A remote authenticated user can access a desktop session without authorization to access the desktop session.

CVE-2008-2302.title: Django Input Validation Hole in Administration Login Form Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2302.body: A vulnerability was reported in Django. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The administrative login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'action' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Django software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-2302.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Django software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2304.title: Apple Xcode Buffer Overflow in 'Core Image Fun House' Application Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2304.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Xcode. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Fun House document that, when loaded by the target user with the Core Image Fun House application, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Kevin Finisterre of Netragard reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.netragard.com/pdfs/research/NETRAGARD-20080630-FUNHOUSE.txt
CVE-2008-2304.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2305.title: Mac OS X Heap Overflow in Apple Type Services Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2305.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Apple Type Services. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a document with a specially crafted font that, when viewed by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the processing of PostScript font names and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2305.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when viewed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2306.title: Safari for Windows Bug with IE Trusted Zone Sites Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2306.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will cause an executable file to be downloaded and executed on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Websites in an Internet Explorer 7 zone with the "Launching applications and unsafe files" setting set to "Enable" or websites in the Internet Explorer 6 "Local intranet" or "Trusted sites" zone on the target user's system can exploit this vulnerability.Only Windows-based systems are affected.Will Dormann of CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2306.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2307.title: Safari for Windows WebKit JavaScript Array Memory Corrpution Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2307.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML with specially crafted JavaScript arrays that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in WebKit and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Only Windows-based systems are affected.James Urquhart reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2307.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2308.title: Mac OS X Alias Manager Memory Corruption Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2308.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the Alias Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted AFP volume mount information. When an alias for the volume is resolved by the target user, arbitrary code will be executed on the target user's system.Intel-based systems running Mac OS X 10.5.1 or prior versions are affected.
CVE-2008-2308.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2309.title: Mac OS X CoreTypes May Not Warn Users Before Opening Unsafe File Types
CVE-2008-2309.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CoreTypes. A user may not be warned before opening certain unsafe file types.A remote user can create a specially crafted file type (.xht and .xhtm) that, when downloaded by the target user, will cause the system to fail to warn the user of the potentially unsafe file type.Brian Mastenbrook reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2309.extra: A user may not be warned before opening certain unsafe file types.

CVE-2008-2313.title: Mac OS X User Template Directory Permissions Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2313.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can populate the User Template directory with files that will become part of the home directory of a new user when the new user is created. A local user can exploit this flaw to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target (new) user.Systems running Mac OS X 10.5 or later are not affected.Andrew Mortensen of the University of Michigan reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2313.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2314.title: Mac OS X Dock Function Lets Physically Local Users Bypass the Screen Lock
CVE-2008-2314.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the Dock function. A physically local user can bypass the screen lock.When the screen lock or sleep password is enabled and Expos hot corners are set, a physically local user can bypass the screen lock to access the system.Systems prior to Mac OS X 10.5 are not affected.Andrew Cassell of Marine Spill Response Corporation for reporting this issue.
CVE-2008-2314.extra: A physically local user can bypass the screen lock to access the system.

CVE-2008-2318.title: Apple Xcode May Disclose WebObjects Session IDs to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2318.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Xcode. A remote user can determine WebObjects session IDs.The WOHyperlink dynamic element generates URLs with a session ID appended to the URL. The session ID may be disclosed to other web sites.
CVE-2008-2318.extra: A remote user can determine obtain session IDs.

CVE-2008-2320.title: Mac OS X CarbonCore Stack Overflow in Processing Filenames Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2320.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CarbonCore. A user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted filename that, when process by the target application, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Thomas Raffetseder of the International Secure Systems Lab and Sergio 'shadown' Alvarez of n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2320.extra: A remote user can create a filename that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2321.title: Apple CoreGraphics Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2321.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple CoreGraphics. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error in CoreGraphics and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Other applications that pass untrusted input to CoreGraphics may be able to be used to exploit this.Michal Zalewski of Google reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2321.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2322.title: Apple CoreGraphics Integer Overflow in Processing PDF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2322.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple CoreGraphics. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Pariente Kobi reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2322.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2323.title: Mac OS X Data Detectors Engine Resource Consumption Bug Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2323.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Data Detectors Engine. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can create specially crafted content that, when viewed by an application that uses Data Detectors, will trigger a resource consumption flaw.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-2323.extra: A user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-2324.title: Mac OS X Disk Utility emacs Configuration Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2324.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Disk Utility. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The 'Repair Permissions' tool in Disk Utility configures '/usr/bin/emacs' with set user id (setuid) privileges. A local user can subsequently invoke emacs to execute arbitrary commands with system privileges.Systems running Mac OS X v10.5 and later are not affected.Anton Rang and Brian Timares reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2324.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2325.title: Mac OS X Quick Look Buffer Overflow in Downloading Microsoft Office Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2325.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Quick Look. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Office file that, when downloaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-2325.extra: A remote user can create a Microsoft Office file that, when downloaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2326.title: Apple Bonjour for Windows mDNSResponder Null Pointer Dereference Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2326.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Bonjour for Windows. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can resolve a specially crafted '.local' domain to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target mDNSResponder application to crash.Mario Ballano of 48bits.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2326.extra: A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2327.title: LibTIFF Buffer Underflow in Decoding LZW Data Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2327.body: A vulnerability was reported in LibTIFF. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TIFF file that, when loaded by the target application using libTIFF, will trigger a buffer underflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in 'tif_lzw.c'.Drew Yao reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2327.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2329.title: Apple Directory Services Discloses Usernames and Password Information to Users
CVE-2008-2329.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Directory Services. A user can determine valid usernames. A local user can obtain the server password.A user with access to the login window can supply wildcard characters in the username field to potentially cause a list of user names from Active Directory to be displayed [CVE-2008-2329]. The IT Department of the West Seneca Central School District reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in slapconfig to cause the system administrator's password to be written to a file controlled by the local user when the system administrator runs slapconfig [CVE-2008-2330].
CVE-2008-2329.extra: A user with access to the login window can determine valid usernames.A local user can obtain the server password in certain cases.

CVE-2008-2330.title: Apple Directory Services Discloses Usernames and Password Information to Users
CVE-2008-2330.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Directory Services. A user can determine valid usernames. A local user can obtain the server password.A user with access to the login window can supply wildcard characters in the username field to potentially cause a list of user names from Active Directory to be displayed [CVE-2008-2329]. The IT Department of the West Seneca Central School District reported this vulnerability.A local user can exploit a flaw in slapconfig to cause the system administrator's password to be written to a file controlled by the local user when the system administrator runs slapconfig [CVE-2008-2330].
CVE-2008-2330.extra: A user with access to the login window can determine valid usernames.A local user can obtain the server password in certain cases.

CVE-2008-2331.title: Mac OS X Finder May Display Incorrect Permissions and Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2331.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Finder. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. Incorrect permissions may be displayed in certain cases.A remote user on the local network user can trigger a null pointer dereference in Finder, causing Finder to exit immediately after starting, making the target system unusable [CVE-2008-3613]. Systems running 10.5.2 are affected. MacBook Air systems running 10.5.3 and 10.5.4 are affected. Yuxuan Wang of Sogou reported this vulnerability.In some cases, the 'Get Info' window may not display the proper privileges for a file [CVE-2008-2331]. Versions prior to 10.5 are not affected. Michel Colman reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2331.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause the target system to become unusuable.The 'Get Info' window may display incorrect permissions in certain cases.

CVE-2008-2332.title: Mac OS X ImageIO TIFF and JPEG Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2332.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X ImageIO. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted TIFF or JPEG file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Robert Swiecki of Google Security Team reported the TIFF file vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2332.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2333.title: Barracuda Spam Firewall Input Validation Hole in 'ldap_test.cgi' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2333.body: A vulnerability was reported in Barracuda Spam Firewall. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'ldap_test.cgi' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'email' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Barracuda Spam Firewall interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:https://[target]/cgi-bin/ldap_test.cgi?host=127.0.0.1&port=1&tls_mode=tls_mode&tls_require=&username=&password=&filter=&searchbase=&unique_attr=&email_attr=&domain=*&email=%3Cscript%3Ealert(document.cookie)%3C/script%3EThe vendor was notified on April 24, 2008.Information Risk Management Plc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2333.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Barracuda Spam Firewall, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2338.title: Interspire ActiveKB Authentication Cookie Lets Remote Users Gain Administrative Access
CVE-2008-2338.body: A vulnerability was reported in Interspire ActiveKB. A remote user can gain administrative access on the target application.A remote user can set a specially crafted cookie value (auth=true) to gain access to the administrative interface.The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5616t0pP8uZz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2338.extra: A remote user can gain administrative access on the target application.

CVE-2008-2357.title: MTR Buffer Overflow in split_redraw() Function May Let Remote and Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2357.body: A vulnerability was reported in MTR. A remote or local user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote DNS server can return a specially crafted IP address value to trigger a stack overflow in the split_redraw() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The '-p' mode is affected.A local user can also supply a specially crafted IP address value to trigger this overflow.pi3 (pi3ki31ny) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2357.extra: A remote or local user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2358.title: Linux Kernel Buffer Overflow in DCCP Subsystem May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2358.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Kernel. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in the DCCP subsystem and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vulnerability resides in 'net/dccp/feat.c'.Brandon Edwards of McAfee Avert labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2358.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2360.title: X Integer Overflow in AllocateGlyph() Lets Local Users and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2360.body: A vulnerability was reported in the X Window System. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger an integer overflow in the AllocateGlyph() function and execute arbitrary code on the target X server. The code will run with the privileges of the target server (which may be root privileges on many systems).A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The RENDER Extension is affected.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2360.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2361.title: X Integer Overflow in ProcRenderCreateCursor() Lets Local Users and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2361.body: A vulnerability was reported in the X Window System. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger an integer overflow in the ProcRenderCreateCursor() function and execute arbitrary code on the target X server. The code will run with the privileges of the target server (which may be root privileges on many systems).A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The RENDER Extension is affected.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2361.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2362.title: X Integer Overflow in SProcRenderCreate Functions Lets Local Users and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2362.body: A vulnerability was reported in the X Window System. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger an integer overflow in the SProcRenderCreateLinearGradient(), SProcRenderCreateRadialGradient() and SProcRenderCreateConicalGradient() functions and execute arbitrary code on the target X server. The code will run with the privileges of the target server (which may be root privileges on many systems).A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The RENDER Extension is affected.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2362.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2364.title: Apache mod_proxy Interim Response Process Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2364.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_proxy. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote server can send a large number of interim responses to cause the target proxy service to consume excessive memory.The vulnerability resides in 'modules/proxy/mod_proxy_http.c'.Ryujiro Shibuya reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2364.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to consume excessive memory.

CVE-2008-2367.title: Red Hat Certificate Server Discloses Passwords to Local Users
CVE-2008-2367.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Certificate Server. A local user can obtain passwords and potentially sensitive information.The system uses insecure file permissions on certain configuration files, including 'password.conf' [CVE-2008-2367]. A local user can read the files.The system stores plain text passwords in debug log files that have insecure access restrictions [CVE-2008-2368]. The log files include the UserDirEnrollment log and RA wizard installer log. A local user can obtain passwords from the log files.
CVE-2008-2367.extra: A local user can obtain passwords.

CVE-2008-2369.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server 'manzier.pxt' Hard Coded Common Authentication Key Lets Remote Users Obtain Information
CVE-2008-2369.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Network Satellite Server. A remote user can obtain information about users on the server.The 'manzier.pxt' XML-RPC script uses a single hard-coded authentication key. A remote user with knowledge of the key can connect to the target Satellite Server XML-RPC service to obtain information about Satellite Server users, including as login names, associated email addresses, internal user IDs, and partial information about entitlements.
CVE-2008-2369.extra: A remote user can obtain information about users on the server.

CVE-2008-2370.title: Tomcat RequestDispatcher Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Access Restrictions
CVE-2008-2370.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tomcat. A remote user can bypass certain access restriction.When a RequestDispatcher is used, a remote user can submit a specially crafted request to access content that is ostensibly protected by a security constraint or by its location under the WEB-INF directory.Stefano Di Paola of Minded Security Research Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2370.extra: A remote user can bypass certain security restrictions to access content that is ostensibly protected.

CVE-2008-2374.title: BlueZ Input Validation Bug May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges or Certain Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2374.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlueZ. A local user can obtain elevated privileges. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code.The Bluetooth Session Description Protocol (SDP) packet parser does not properly validate user-supplied input. A local user that can register a service record via a UNIX socket or D-Bus interface may be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the hcid daemon.A remote Bluetooth device with an established trust relationship with the target system can return a specially crafted SDP packet in response to an SDP query from the target system to potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'sdp.c'.
CVE-2008-2374.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the hcid daemon.A remote Bluetooth device with an established trust relationship can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2375.title: vsftpd Memory Leak When Invalid Authentication Attempts Occur Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2375.body: A vulnerability was reported in vsftpd on Red Hat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can generate an invalid authentication attempt to trigger a memory leak. This can be repeated to consume excessive memory on the target system.Only the version shipped with Red Hat Enterprise Linux is affected.The system is only affected when vsftpd is used with Pluggable Authentication Modules (PAM).
CVE-2008-2375.extra: A remote user can consume excessive memory on the target system.

CVE-2008-2381.title: GForge Input Validation Flaw in 'GroupJoinRequest.class' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-2381.body: A vulnerability was reported in GForge. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The create() function in 'GroupJoinRequest.class' is affected.Debian reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://security-tracker.debian.net/tracker/CVE-2008-2381
CVE-2008-2381.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-2382.title: KVM VNC Server Bug in protocol_client_msg() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2382.body: A vulnerability was reported in the KVM VNC server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user or a local user on the guest operating system can send specially crafted data to cause the target VNC service to enter an infinite loop.The 'protocol_client_msg()' function in 'qemu/vnc.c' is affected.A demonstration exploit message value is provided:\x02\x00\x00\x00The vendor was notified on December 10, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/vnc-remote-dosAlfredo Ortega from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2382.extra: A remote user can cause the target VNC service to become unavailable.

CVE-2008-2382.title: Qemu VNC Server Bug in protocol_client_msg() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2382.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Qemu VNC server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user or a local user on the guest operating system can send specially crafted data to cause the target VNC service to enter an infinite loop.The 'protocol_client_msg()' function in 'vnc.c' is affected.A demonstration exploit message value is provided:\x02\x00\x00\x00The vendor was notified on December 10, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/vnc-remote-dosAlfredo Ortega from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2382.extra: A remote user can cause the target VNC service to become unavailable.

CVE-2008-2383.title: xterm DECRQSS Input Validation Flaw Lets Users Inject Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2008-2383.body: A vulnerability was reported in xterm. A user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target user's system.A user can create a command string containing a specially crafted Device Control Request Status String (DECRQSS) escape sequence that, when exectued by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A demonstration exploit command is provided:perl -e 'print "\eP\$q\nbad-command\n\e\\"'
CVE-2008-2383.extra: A user can create a string that, when entered or loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2400.title: Stunnel Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2400.body: A vulnerability was reported in Stunnel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.Only Windows-based systems are affected.
CVE-2008-2400.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2401.title: Sun Java ASP Server Administration Server Lets Remote Users Create Arbitrary Files
CVE-2008-2401.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java ASP Server. A remote user can create arbitrary files on the target system.A remote user can connect to the administration server on TCP port 5100 and access a function that allows the user to create arbitrary files with root privileges.The vendor was notified on April 4, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2401.extra: A remote user can create arbitrary files on the target system. This can be exploited to gain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2402.title: Sun Java ASP Server Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2402.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java ASP Server. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can connect to the administration server on TCP port 5100 and access potentially sensitive information, such as configuration data or password hashes.The vendor was notified on April 4, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2402.extra: A remote user can access potentially sensitive information, such as configuration data or password hashes.

CVE-2008-2403.title: Sun Java ASP Server Lets Remote Users View and Delete Files on the Target System
CVE-2008-2403.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java ASP Server. A remote user can view and delete files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can connect to the administration server on TCP port 5100 and supply a specially crafted request containing directory traversal characters ('../') to view and delete arbitrary files on target system.The vendor was notified on April 4, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2403.extra: A remote user can view and delete arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2008-2404.title: Sun Java ASP Server Stack Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2404.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java ASP Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on April 4, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2404.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2405.title: Sun Java ASP Server Administration Server Lets Remote Users Inject Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2008-2405.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java ASP Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted request parameters to the administration server on TCP port 5100 to inject arbitrary commands and execute them on the target system. The commands will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on May 11, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported one vulnerability via iDefense. Joshua J. Drake if Defense Labs reported an additional vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2405.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.

CVE-2008-2406.title: Sun Java ASP Server Administration Server Lets Remote Users Bypass Access Controls
CVE-2008-2406.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java ASP Server. A remote user can bypass the administration server authentication mechanism.A remote user can send connect to TCP port 5102 to access the administration server without authenticating.The vendor was notified on May 11, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2406.extra: A remote user can bypass the administration server authentication mechanism.

CVE-2008-2407.title: Trillian Remote Stack Overflow in AIM.DLL in Parsing HTML Font Parameters Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2407.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trillian. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an image file with specially crafted FONT tag attribute values that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on December 3, 2007.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-08-029An anonymous reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-2407.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2408.title: Trillian XML Parsing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2408.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trillian. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send IMG tags with specially crafted attributes via XML to the connected target user to trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'talk.dll'.The vendor was notified on April 8, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-08-030tw33k and n8 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-2408.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2409.title: Trillian Stack Overflow in Processing X-MMS-IM-FORMAT Header Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2409.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trillian. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send an X-MMS-IM-FORMAT header with specially crafted attribute values to the connected target user to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 5, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-08-031tw33k and n8 reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-2409.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2421.title: SAP Web Application Server Input Validation Hole in webgui Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2421.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP Web Application Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The '/sap/bc/gui/sap/its/webgui/' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the SAP Web Application Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]:8000/sap/bc/gui/sap/its/webgui/aaaaaaa"><img/src=javascript:alert('DSECRG_XSS')>Web Dynpro ABAP and BSP are also affected.Digital Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2421.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the SAP Web Application Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2426.title: imlib2 Stack Overflow in Processing PNM and XPM Images Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2426.body: A vulnerability was reported in imlib2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PNM or XPM image file that, when processed by the target application that uses imlib2, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in the load() function in 'src/modules/loaders/loader_pnm.c' and the load() function in 'src/modules/loader_xpm.c'.The vendor was notified on May 27, 2008.Stefan Cornelius of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2426.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2427.title: XnView Stack Overflow in Processing Sun TAAC Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2427.body: A vulnerability was reported in XnView. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a Sun TAAC file with a specially crafted 'format' value that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 28, 2008.The NConvert, and GFL SDK applications are also affected.Stefan Cornelius of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-24/advisory/
CVE-2008-2427.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2430.title: VLC Media Player Integer Overflow in Processing WAV Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2430.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player in the processing of WAV files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted WAV file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the Open() function in 'modules/demux/wav.c'.The vendor was notified on June 27, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerabililty.
CVE-2008-2430.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2433.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Insufficient Randomization Lets Remote Users Bypass Web Console Authentication
CVE-2008-2433.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan. A remote user can gain administrative acess to the web console.The software does not use sufficient randomization when creating session authentication tokens. A remote user exploit this to bypass authentication.Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security version 5.0 and Trend Micro Client/Server/Messaging Suite 3.5 and 3.6 are also affected.The vendor was notified on August 12, 2008.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2433.extra: A remote user can gain administrative acess on the target application.

CVE-2008-2435.title: Trend Micro HouseCall ActiveX Control Memory Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2435.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro HouseCall. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke an ActiveX control ('Housecall_ActiveX.dll') and access freed memory via the notifyOnLoadNative() function to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on August 25, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2435.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2436.title: Novell iPrint Buffer Overflow in ActiveX Control IppCreateServerRef() Function Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2436.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell iPrint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the 'ienipp.ocx' ActiveX control and trigger a heap overflow in the IppCreateServerRef() function to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on August 25, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2436.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2437.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Heap Overflow in 'cgiRecvFile.exe' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2437.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send an HTTP request with a specially crafted 'ComputerName' parameter value to trigger a heap overflow in 'cgiRecvFile.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The vendor was notified on September 2, 2008.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2437.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2439.title: TrendMicro OfficeScan Client Module Input Validation Flaw in 'OfficeScanNT Listener' Service Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2008-2439.body: A vulnerability was reported in TrendMicro OfficeScan Client Module. A remote user can view files on the target system.The 'OfficeScanNT Listener' service does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target client system.TrendMicro Worry-Free Business Security 5.0 is also affected.The original advisory will be available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-39/Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2439.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-2441.title: Cisco Secure Access Control Server Bug in Processing RADIUS EAP Packets Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2441.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Secure Access Control Server. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user with the RADIUS shared secret can send a specially crafted RADIUS Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) Message Attribute packet to cause the target CSRadius and CSAuth processes to crash. This will prevent the target system from processing requests via RADIUS or TACACS+ until the processes have restarted.Systems with configured with AAA Clients to authenticate using TACACS+ only are not affected.Cisco Secure ACS Express, Cisco Secure for Unix, and Cisco Access Register are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsq10103 to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on May 5, 2008.Gabriel Campana and Laurent Butti from France Telecom / Orange reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2441.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target system from processing RADIUS or TACACS+ authentication requests.

CVE-2008-2462.title: Caucho Resin Input Validation Hole in the 'viewfile' Command Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2462.body: A vulnerability was reported in Resin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'viewfile' command does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'file' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Resin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Tomasz Kuczynski reported this vulnerability via US-CERT.
CVE-2008-2462.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Resin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2463.title: Microsoft Access Snapshot Viewer ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Download Files to Arbitrary Locations
CVE-2008-2463.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Access in the Snapshot Viewer ActiveX control. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be downloaded and then later executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the 'snapview.ocx' ActiveX control and download arbitrary files to arbitrary locations on the target user's system. The files can then be subsequently executed.The CLSIDs of the vulnerable control are: F0E42D50-368C-11D0-AD81-00A0C90DC8D9, F0E42D60-368C-11D0-AD81-00A0C90DC8D9, and F2175210-368C-11D0-AD81-00A0C90DC8D9Microsoft Office Access 2000, Microsoft Office Access 2002, and Microsoft Office Access 2003 are affected.Snapshot Viewer for Microsoft Access is affected.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.
CVE-2008-2463.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will download files to the target user's system. The files can then be later executed.

CVE-2008-2464.title: NetBSD Bug in Processing ICMPv6 MLD Queries Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2464.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetBSD. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send an ICMPv6 MLD query with a specially crafted Maximum Response Delay value to trigger a system panic.Systems compiled with the 'options INET6' option are affected.Miikka Saukko, Ossi Herrala, and Jukka Taimisto from the CROSS project at Codenomicon Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2464.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-2468.title: LANDesk Management Suite Heap Overflow in the QIP Server Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2468.body: A vulnerability was reported in LANDesk Management Suite. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted 'heal' request packet to trigger a heap overflow in 'qipsrvr.exe' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.The vendor was notified on September 3, 2008.Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://dvlabs.tippingpoint.com/advisory/TPTI-08-06
CVE-2008-2468.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2476.title: FreeBSD IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol Spoofing Bug Lets Remote Users Modify Routing Data in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-2476.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol. A remote user can modify routing data for a target router in certain cases.A remote user on a physical network of an IPv6 router can spoof Neighbor Discovery messages to update routing information for a target router on a different physical network adjacent to the IPv6 router. The remote user can exploit this to deny service or access network traffic from the target router.David Miles reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2476.extra: A remote user can modify routing data for a target router in certain cases to deny service or redirect and access network traffic.

CVE-2008-2476.title: NetBSD IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol Spoofing Bug Lets Remote Users Modify Routing Data in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-2476.body: A vulnerability was reported in the NetBSD IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol. A remote user can modify routing data for a target router in certain cases.A remote user on a physical network of an IPv6 router can spoof Neighbor Discovery messages to update routing information for a target router on a different physical network adjacent to the IPv6 router. The remote user can exploit this to deny service or access network traffic from the target router.David Miles reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2476.extra: A remote user can modify routing data for a target router in certain cases to deny service or redirect and access network traffic.

CVE-2008-2476.title: OpenBSD IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol Spoofing Bug Lets Remote Users Modify Routing Data in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-2476.body: A vulnerability was reported in the OpenBSD IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Protocol. A remote user can modify routing data for a target router in certain cases.A remote user on a physical network of an IPv6 router can spoof Neighbor Discovery messages to update routing information for a target router on a different physical network adjacent to the IPv6 router. The remote user can exploit this to deny service or access network traffic from the target router.David Miles reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2476.extra: A remote user can modify routing data for a target router in certain cases to deny service or redirect and access network traffic.

CVE-2008-2478.title: cPanel Input Validation Flaw in 'Email' Parameter Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2478.body: A vulnerability was reported in cPanel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the 'wwwact' command and create an account with a specially crafted e-mail address to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with reseller privileges.Ali Jasbi of IHST security & hacking Research team reproted this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2478.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2499.title: Lotus Sametime Stack Overflow in Community Services MUX Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2499.body: A vulnerability was reported in Lotus Sametime. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted URL to the target Community Services multiplexer on TCP port 1533 to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.IBM has assigned SPR# RDES7CALDL to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on December 11, 2007.Manuel Santamarina Suarez reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-2499.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2511.title: CA Internet Security 'UmxEventCliLib' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Corrupt Files
CVE-2008-2511.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Internet Security. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the 'UmxEventCli.dll' ActiveX control and corrupt files on the target user's system.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: F13D3742-6C4F-4915-BF91-784BA02DD0BEA demonstration exploit is available at:http://retrogod.altervista.org/9sg_CA_poc.htmlsurfista of Nine:Situations:Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2511.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will corrupt files on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2512.title: Symantec Backup Exec System Recovery Manager Directory Traversal Bug Lets Remote Users Gain Access to the Target System
CVE-2008-2512.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Backup Exec System Recovery Manager. A remote user can view files on the target system and gain access to the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view arbitrary files on target system.This can be exploited to gain access to the target system.Nicolas Pouvesle of Tenable Security reported the vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2512.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can gain access to the target system.

CVE-2008-2513.title: IBM AIX Kernel Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges or Deny Service
CVE-2008-2513.body: A vulnerability was reported in AIX. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in the kernel to execute arbitrary code with kernel mode privileges or to cause the system to halt.The following files are affected: /usr/lib/boot/unix_64 /usr/lib/boot/unix_mp /usr/lib/boot/unix_up
CVE-2008-2513.extra: A local user can obtain kernel privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the target system to halt.

CVE-2008-2514.title: IBM AIX Buffer Overflow in errpt Command May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2514.body: A vulnerability was reported in AIX. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.The vulnerability resides in '/usr/bin/errpt', which is configured with set user id (setuid) root privileges.
CVE-2008-2514.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2515.title: IBM AIX Input Validation Flaw in iostat Command Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2008-2515.body: A vulnerability was reported in AIX in the iostat command. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the 'usr/bin/iostat' command with a specially crafted environment variable value to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.
CVE-2008-2515.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2516.title: libpam-pgsql Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2516.body: A vulnerability was reported in libpam-pgsql. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke sudo and enter the Control and C keys to bypass authentication and execute the sudo command.
CVE-2008-2516.extra: A local user can bypass authentication to potentially gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2518.title: Sun Java System Web Server Input Validation Hole in Advanced Search Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2518.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Web Server in the advanced search feature. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The advanced search page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Sun Java System Web Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'search/advanced.jsp'.
CVE-2008-2518.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sun Java System Web Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2528.title: Citrix Access Gateway Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2008-2528.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix Access Gateway. A remote user can bypass authentication.A remote user can bypass authentication to access hosts and resources on the target network.The Standard Edition and Advanced Edition models are affected.The Access Gateway appliance in Access Gateway or Secure Gateway modes is not affected.Access Gateway Enterprise Edition is not affected.
CVE-2008-2528.extra: A remote user can bypass authentication to access hosts and resources on the target network.

CVE-2008-2539.title: Sun Cluster Global File System May Disclose a User's Deleted Files to Other Local Users
CVE-2008-2539.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Cluster Global File System. A local user can read data from a target user's deleted files.On a Sun Cluster File System, a local user may be able to read data from deleted files that are owned by another user.A local user may be able to cause data integrity issues on certain applications.Only global filesystems mounted on top of ufs filesystems are affected. Global filesystems mounted on top of vxfs filesystems are not affected.Sun Cluster 3.0 is not affected.
CVE-2008-2539.extra: A local user can read data from files deleted by other users.

CVE-2008-2540.title: Apple Safari for Windows XP and Vista Lets Remote Users Download Files
CVE-2008-2540.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari for Windows running on Microsoft Windows XP and Vista. A remote user can cause arbitrary files to be downloaded to the target user's system and potentially executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML file that, when loaded by the target user with Apple Safari for Windows, will download the file to the target user's system without prompting the target user. The executable files may appear to be legitimate files or icons and may be executed by the target user.This vulnerability is being actively exploited on systems that have Apple Safari for Windows installed and have Apple Safari for Windows configured with the default download location (i.e., the desktop).Aviv Raff reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2540.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will download arbitrary files to the target user's system without prompting the target user.

CVE-2008-2540.title: Microsoft Windows SearchPath Function May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2540.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system in certain cases.A remote user may be able to conduct a "blended attack" and exploit the way that the SearchPath function in Windows locates and opens files on the system. A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when downloaded by the target user to a specific location, may be later executed by the target user when the target user opens an application.[Editor's note: Aviv Raff originally reported this vulnerability as affecting applications (such as Apple Safari) in conjunction with Microsoft Windows. See Alert ID 1020150.]
CVE-2008-2540.extra: A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2541.title: CA Secure Content Manager Buffer Overflow in Processing FTP Packets Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2541.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Secure Content Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted FTP requests to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Sebastian Apelt and Cody Pierce reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2541.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2543.title: Asterisk-Addons ooh323 Driver Memory Free Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2543.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk-Addons. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data via TCP to the ooh323 channel driver to cause arbitrary memory to be freed and the target service to crash.Tzafrir Cohen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2543.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2545.title: Skype 'file://' URL Warning Can Be Bypassed By Remote USers
CVE-2008-2545.body: A vulnerability was reported in Skype. A remote user can bypass the 'file://' URL warning and potentially cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'file://' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will fail to warn the user before downloading and potentially executing the file.The software does not properly check the case of file extensions and does not check for some file extensions associated with executable programs.The vendor was notified on May 16, 2008.Ismael Briones of Inkatel.com reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-2545.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will download the file to the target user's system without warning.

CVE-2008-2548.title: Motorola RAZR Phone Stack Overflow in Processing JPEG Images Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2548.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Motorola RAZR Phone. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted JPEG file via MMS that, when viewed by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's phone.The vulnerability resides in the JPEG thumbprint component of the EXIF parser.The vendor was notified on July 10, 2007.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-08-033
CVE-2008-2548.extra: A remote user can create an image that, when viewed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2552.title: Solaris Tag Service Registry Bug Lets Local Users Fill the '/var' Filesystem
CVE-2008-2552.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can consume excessive disk space.A local user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris Service Tag Registry to fill the '/var' filesystem.Sun Service Tag 1.0, 1.1, and 1.2 are affected.
CVE-2008-2552.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on applications and services that use the target '/var' filesystem.

CVE-2008-2553.title: Slash Input Validation Hole in 'userfield' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2553.body: A vulnerability was reported in Slash. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'userfield' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Slash software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-2553.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Slash software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2559.title: Borland InterBase Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2559.body: A vulnerability was reported in InterBase. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to TCP port 3050 to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2278Damian Frizza from CORE IMPACT's Exploit Writing Team (EWT) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2559.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2573.title: freeSSHd Stack Overflow in Processing Directory Name Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2573.body: A vulnerability was reported in freeSSHd. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can attempt to open a specially crafted directory name to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/5709http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/5751securfrog reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2573.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2636.title: Linksys WRH54G Router Management Interface Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2008-2636.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linksys WRH54G Router. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the management interface to cause the target service to crash. A hard reset is required to return the interface to normal operations.Traffic processing through the device is not affected.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/./front_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_pagefront_page.aspdubingyao at gmail dot com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2636.extra: A remote user can cause the management interface to hang.

CVE-2008-2637.title: F5 FirePass Input Validation Hole in 'css_exceptions' and 'sql_matchscope' Parameters Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2637.body: A vulnerability was reported in F5 FirePass. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the F5 FirePass device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'css_exceptions' parameter in '/vdesk/admincon/webyfiers.php' and the 'sql_matchscope' parameter in '/vdesk/admincon/index.php' are affected.Some demonstration exploit URLs are provided:https://[target]/vdesk/admincon/webyfiers.php?a=css&click=1&css_exceptions=%22+onfocus%3Dalert%28%26quot%3BXSS1%26quot%3B%29+foo%3D%22&save_css_exceptions=Updatehttps://[target]/vdesk/admincon/index.php?a=css⊂=sql&sql_matchscope=%22+onfocus%3Dalert%28%26quot%3BXSS2%26quot%3B%29+foo%3D%22&save_sql_matchscope=Updatennposter reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2637.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the F5 FirePass device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2639.title: CitectSCADA Buffer Overflow in ODBC Service Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2639.body: A vulnerability was reported in CitectSCADA. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the ODBC service on TCP port 20222 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The CitectFacilities application is also affected.The vendor was notified on February 6, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/?action=item&id=2186Sebastian Muniz from the Core IMPACT Exploit Writers Team (EWT) at Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2639.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2640.title: Adobe Flex Input Validation Hole in History Manager Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2640.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flex. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The History Management function (historyFrame.html) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Adobe Flex software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Flex 3 History Manager is affected.The Flex 2 History Manager is not affected.Ory Segal, Adi Sharabani, and Ayal Yogev from IBM Rational Application Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2640.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Adobe Flex software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2662.title: Ruby Bugs Let Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2662.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Ruby. A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user may be able to exploit these vulnerabilities, depending on the specific application code.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2662.extra: A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can cause denial of service conditions.
