Only Windows-based systems are affected. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-3635.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-3636.title: iTunes Windows Driver Integer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3636.body: A vulnerability was reported in iTunes. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger an integer overflow in a third-party driver provided with iTunes to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with system privileges.Only Windows-based systems are affected.Ruben Santamarta of Wintercore reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3636.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3636.title: Symantec BackupExec System Recovery Bug in 'GEARAspiWDM.Sys' Driver Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3636.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec BackupExec System Recovery. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System level privileges.The vulnerability resides in a third party device driver ('GEARAspiWDM.Sys' from Gear Software) that is distributed with this product.Norton 360, Norton Ghost, Norton Save and Restore, and Symantec LiveState Recovery are also affected.Symantec Ghost Solution Suite, Norton Internet Security, and Norton AntiVirus are not affected.Ruben Santamarta reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3636.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3636.title: Norton Ghost Bug in 'GEARAspiWDM.Sys' Driver Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3636.body: A vulnerability was reported in Norton Ghost. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System level privileges.The vulnerability resides in a third party device driver ('GEARAspiWDM.Sys' from Gear Software) that is distributed with this product.Symantec Ghost Solution Suite, Norton Internet Security, and Norton AntiVirus are not affected.Ruben Santamarta reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3636.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3636.title: Symantec LiveState Recovery Bug in 'GEARAspiWDM.Sys' Driver Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3636.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec LiveState Recovery. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System level privileges.The vulnerability resides in a third party device driver ('GEARAspiWDM.Sys' from Gear Software) that is distributed with this product.Symantec Ghost Solution Suite, Norton Internet Security, and Norton AntiVirus are not affected.Ruben Santamarta reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3636.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3637.title: Java on Mac OS X HMAC Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3637.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java on Apple Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.The code that checks Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) values uses an uninitialized variable. A remote user can create specially crafted Java applet that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Only Mac OS X is affected.Radim Marek reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3637.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3638.title: Java Mac OS X Lets Remote Users Execute Files on the Target User's System
CVE-2008-3638.body: A vulnerability was reported in Java on Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will load a 'file://' URL to launch files residing on the target user's system. It may be possible to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.Nitesh Dhanjani and Billy Rios reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3638.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will execute applications on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3639.title: CUPS Heap Overflow in 'imagetops' Processing of SGI Image Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3639.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted SGI image file to the CUPS service to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with 'lp' user privileges.The vulnerability resides in the 'imagetops' component.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-3639.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-3640.title: CUPS Heap Overflow in 'texttops' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3640.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted text file to the CUPS service to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the 'lp' user privileges.The vulnerability resides in the Text-to-PostScript "texttops" filter WriteProlog() function.regenrecht reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3640.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-3641.title: CUPS Bug in HPGL Filter Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3641.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted pen width and pen color opcodes to the CUPS service to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with 'lp' user privileges.On Mac OS X, if Printer Sharing is not enabled, a local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges.The vulnerability resides in the Hewlett-Packard Graphics Language (HPGL) filter.Apple was notified on August 19, 2008. Other operating systems are also affected.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2008-3641.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-3642.title: Mac OS X ColorSync Buffer Overflow in Processing ICC Profiles Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3642.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X ColorSync. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image file within an ICC profile that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2008-3642.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3644.title: Safari Form Autocomplete Feature May Disclose Information to Local Users
CVE-2008-3644.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user on the console can obtain potentially sensitive information from the browser page cache even if the form autocomplete feature is disabled.An anonymous reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3644.extra: A local user on the console can obtain potentially sensitive information from the browser page cache.

CVE-2008-3645.title: Mac OS X Networking Heap Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3645.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a heap overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with system privileges.The vulnerability resides in the local IPC component of configd's EAPOLController plugin.
CVE-2008-3645.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3647.title: Mac OS X Buffer Overflow in PSNormalizer Lets Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3647.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X PSNormalizer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PostScript file with a specially crafted bounding box comment that, when viewed by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2008-3647.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3648.title: Windows nslookup Bug May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3648.body: A vulnerability was reported in nslookup on Microsoft Windows XP. A remote user may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.When the target user enters an nslookup zone transfer command, the remote DNS server can return a specially crafted response to execute arbitrary code on the target system. Other commands may be affected.The original advisory is available at:http://packetstormsecurity.org/0808-advisories/Nslookup-Crash.txtThe report notes that this vulnerability is being actively exploited.Ivan Sanchez reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3648.extra: A remote server can return a response to a user-generated nslookup command that, when processed by the target nslookup application, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3651.title: IPsec-Tools Memory Leak in Processing Invalid Proposals Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3651.body: A vulnerability was reported in IPsec-Tools. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted proposal to cause the target service to consume excessive memory.
CVE-2008-3651.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to consume excessive memory.

CVE-2008-3652.title: IPsec-Tools Racoon Phase 1 Handle Cleanup Flaw May Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3652.body: A vulnerability was reported in IPsec-Tools. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The software does not remove orphaned Phase 1 handles for remotely initiated negotiations. A remote user may be able to cause excessive resource consumption on the target system.The vulnerability resides in 'src/racoon/handler.c'.Krzysztof Piotr Oledzki reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3652.extra: A remote user can cause excessive resource consumption on the target system.

CVE-2008-3655.title: Ruby Safe Level Access Control Bug Lets Applications Bypass Certain Access Controls
CVE-2008-3655.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. An application can bypass certain safe level access restrictions.An application running at safe level 4 can invoke the untrace_var() function.An application running at safe level 4 can modify the $PROGRAM_NAME variable.An application running at safe level 4 can perform syslog operations.An application running at safe level 1 through 3 can invoke insecure methods.Keita Yamaguchi reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-3655.extra: A user can bypass safe level access control restrictions.

CVE-2008-3656.title: Ruby WEBrick HTTP Server split_header_value() Function Regex Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3656.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby WEBrick. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to cause the target web service to consume an excessive amount of time processing the request.The vulnerability resides in the WEBrick::HTTP::DefaultFileHandler in the WEBrick::HTTPUtils.split_header_value() function.Christian Neukirchen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3656.extra: A remote user can cause the web service to consume excessive amount of time responding to a request.

CVE-2008-3657.title: Ruby 'dl' Does Not Check for Taint
CVE-2008-3657.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. An application may be able to invoke potentially dangerous functions.The dynamic linker library does not check to determine if objects are tainted. As a result, an application may be able to invoke potentially dangerous functions.sheepman reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3657.extra: An application may be able to invoke potentially dangerous functions.

CVE-2008-3659.title: PHP Buffer Overflow in explode() Function May Let Users Bypass Safe Mode Restrictions
CVE-2008-3659.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A user may be able to bypass safe mode restrictions.A user can set a specially crafted delimiter to trigger a buffer overflow in the explode function and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.A local user can exploit this to bypass safe_mode restrictions.[Editor's note: This vulnerability was original corrected by the vendor in August 2008.]
CVE-2008-3659.extra: A user may be able to bypass safe mode restrictions.

CVE-2008-3660.title: PHP FastCGI Module Request Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3660.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP when used as a FastCGI module. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted request with multiple dots preceding the extension (e.g., 'foo..php) to cause the target service to crash.[Editor's note: This vulnerability was original corrected by the vendor in August 2008.]
CVE-2008-3660.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-3681.title: Joomla! Password Reset Bug Lets Remote Users Reset a Password
CVE-2008-3681.body: A vulnerability was reported in Joomla!. A remote user can reset the password of a certain account.The password reset mechanism does not function properly. A remote user can reset the password for the first enabled user, which is typically the administrative user.The vulnerability resides in 'com_user/models/reset.php'.Marijke Stuivenberg reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3681.extra: A remote user can reset the password of the account with the lowest account ID number.

CVE-2008-3687.title: Xen Buffer Overflow in XSM:Flask flask_op() May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3687.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply specially crafted arguments to the flask_op() hypercall of the XSM:Flask module to trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.Rafal Wojtczuk of McAfee reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3687.extra: A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3688.title: HTTP Anti Virus Proxy Bug in 'sockethandler.cpp' Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3688.body: A vulnerability was reported in HTTP Anti Virus Proxy. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can trigger a flaw in 'sockethandler.cpp' to cause the system to enter an infinite loop.Peter Warasin reported this vulnerability in July 2008.
CVE-2008-3688.extra: A remote user can cause the proxy to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2008-3697.title: VMware Server ISAPI Extension Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3697.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to trigger a flaw in an Internet Server Application Programming Interface (ISAPI) extension and cause the target IIS service to shut down.On IIS 6.0, the service will restart automatically. On IIS 5.0, the service must be manually restarted if the Startup Type is set to Manual.The Juniper Networks J-Security Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3697.extra: A remote user can cause the target IIS service to crash.

CVE-2008-3698.title: VMware Workstation/ACE/Player/Server OpenProcess Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3698.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation, ACE, Player, and Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in OpenProcess to gain elevated privileges on the host system.Only Windows-based hosts are affected.Sun Bing from McAfee reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3698.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target host system.

CVE-2008-3703.title: VERITAS Storage Foundation for Windows Accepts NULL NTLMSSP Authentication
CVE-2008-3703.body: A vulnerability was reported in VERITAS Storage Foundation for Windows. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can connect to the Scheduler Service (VxSchedService.exe) on TCP port 4888 and use NULL NTLMSSP authentication to add, modify, or delete snapshots schedules. This allows the remote user to execute arbitrary code with System privileges.The vendor was notified on August 26, 2008.Tenable Network Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-3703.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System level privileges.

CVE-2008-3704.title: Visual Studio Buffer Overflow in 'Msmask32.ocx' ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3704.body: A vulnerability was reported in Visual Studio. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the 'Msmask32.ocx' ActiveX control and trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: C932BA85-4374-101B-A56C-00AA003668DCA demonstration exploit is available at:http://downloads.securityfocus.com/vulnerabilities/exploits/30674.jsThe report indicates that this vulnerability is being actively exploited.Symantec's Threat Analysis Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3704.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3714.title: AWStats Input Validation Hole in Displaying Action Attribute Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-3714.body: A vulnerability was reported in AWStats. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the AWStats software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/awstats/awstats.pl?config=www.example.com&%22onload=%22alert(document.domain)//Morgan Todd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3714.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the AWStats software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-3761.title: VMware Workstation 'hcmon.sys' IOCTL Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3761.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware Workstation. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send a specially crafted IOCTL request to the '\\.\hcmon' device to cause the target system to crash.The original advisory and demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.orange-bat.com/adv/2008/adv.08.17.txtOrange Bat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3761.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-3773.title: vBulletin Input Validation Hole in Private Message Title Field Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-3773.body: A vulnerability was reported in vBulletin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the private message title field before displaying the input. If the 'Show New Private Message Notification Pop-Up' option is enabled, a remote user can send a specially crafted private message that, when viewed by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the vBulletin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on August 14, 2008.Federico Muttis from Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3773.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the vBulletin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-3776.title: Fujitsu Web-Based Admin View Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2008-3776.body: A vulnerability was reported in Fujitsu Web-Based Admin View. A remote user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system that are located outside of the document directory.A demonstration exploit request is provided:GET /.././.././.././.././.././.././.././.././.././etc/passwd HTTP/1.0Host: [target]:8081Deniz Cevik of www.intellectpro.com.tr reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3776.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-3789.title: Samba 'group_mapping.ldb' Has Unsafe Permissions That Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3789.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system creates the 'group_mapping.ldb' file with 0666 permissions. A local user can edit the SID mappings in the file and then subsequently connect to the file server with root privileges.Sascha Herrmann reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3789.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target file server.

CVE-2008-3790.title: Ruby REXML Recursive Entity Expansion Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3790.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted XML data to trigger a flaw in the REXML library and cause the target application to become unresponsive.Luka Treiber and Mitja Kolsek of ACROS Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3790.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to become unresponsive.

CVE-2008-3794.title: VLC Media Player Heap Overflow in MMS Protocol Handling Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3794.body: A vulnerability was reported in VLC Media Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MMS stream that, when loaded by the target user via a 'mmst://' URL, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the mms_ReceiveCommand() function in 'modules\access\mms\mmstu.c'.Orange Bat reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.orange-bat.com/adv/2008/adv.08.24.txt
CVE-2008-3794.extra: A remote user can create a stream that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3799.title: Cisco IOS SIP Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3799.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS in the processing of Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) packets. A remote user can disrupt voice services on the target device or cause the target device to reload.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets to trigger a memory leak [CVE-2008-3799] or cause the target device to reload.Repeated exploitation of the memory leak vulnerability may disrupt all voice services, even if the device is still running.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCse56800 to the memory leak vulnerability.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsg91306, CSCsl62609, and CSCsk42759 to the device reload vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-3799.extra: A remote user can disrupt voice services or cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-3803.title: Cisco IOS MPLS VPN Routing Bug May Send Potentially Sensitive Information to the Wrong VPN
CVE-2008-3803.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the routing on Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Virtual Private Networks (VPNs). A remote user on a VPN may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.If extended communities are used with MPLS VPNs, a corrupted route target may be used to forward traffic, causing traffic to leak from one MPLS VPN to another.Devices configured for MPLS VPNs or VPN Routing and Forwarding Lite (VRF Lite) and using Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) between Customer Edge (CE) and Provider Edge (PE) devices may be affected.Cisco IOS 12.1 releases are not affected.The vendor reports that a remote user cannot deterministically trigger this vulnerability.The vulnerability was introduced by the fix for Cisco bug ID CSCee83237.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCec12299 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3803.extra: A remote user on an MPLS VPN may receive misrouted traffic from a different MPLS VPN.

CVE-2008-3805.title: Cisco IOS 10000, uBR10012, uBR7200 Series IPC Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3805.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS on Cisco 10000, uBR10012, and uBR7200 series devices. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the interprocess communications UDP port 1975 to cause the target device or linecards to reload.Only Cisco 10000, uBR10012, and uBR7200 series devices are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsg15342 and CSCsh29217 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3805.extra: A remote user can cause the target device or linecards or both to reload.

CVE-2008-3810.title: Cisco IOS NAT SCCP Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3810.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the processing of Skinny Call Control Protocol (SCCP) messages. A remote user can cause the target device to reload.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted SCCP messages to cause the target device to reload.Devices configured with network address translation (NAT) SCCP fragmentation support are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsg22426 and CSCsi17020 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3810.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-3811.title: Cisco IOS NAT SCCP Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3811.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the processing of Skinny Call Control Protocol (SCCP) messages. A remote user can cause the target device to reload.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted SCCP messages to cause the target device to reload.Devices configured with network address translation (NAT) SCCP fragmentation support are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsg22426 and CSCsi17020 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3811.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-3812.title: Cisco IOS Firewall Bug in HTTP Application Inspection Control Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3812.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the firewall application inspection control function. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP packet through the target device to cause the target device to reload.Systems configured for IOS firewall Application Inspection Control (AIC) with an HTTP configured application-specific policy are affected.The vulnerable feature was introduced in release 12.4(9)T.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsh12480 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3812.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-3814.title: Cisco Unity Authentication Bypass Bug Lets Remote Users View and Modify the Configuration
CVE-2008-3814.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unity. A remote user can view and modify portions of the configuration.When the system is configured for anonymous authentication, a remote user can bypass authentication to view and modify some configuration parameters on the target server.The remote user cannot obtain credentials, personally identifiable information, or user information.Systems that are configured for the Integrated Windows authentication method are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsr86943 to this vulnerability.VoIPshield Systems reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3814.extra: A remote user can view and modify some configuration parameters.

CVE-2008-3815.title: Cisco ASA Windows NT Domain Authentication Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass IPSec/SSL VPN Authentication
CVE-2008-3815.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user may be able to bypass VPN authentication.When the target device is configured for IPSec or SSL-based remote access VPNs using Microsoft Windows NT Domain authentication, a remote user may be able to bypass authentication and access the VPN.Other types of external authentication (i.e., LDAP, RADIUS, TACACS+, SDI, or local database) are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsu65735 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3815.extra: A remote user can bypass VPN authentication.

CVE-2008-3815.title: Cisco PIX Firewall Windows NT Domain Authentication Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass IPSec/SSL VPN Authentication
CVE-2008-3815.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco PIX Firewall. A remote user may be able to bypass VPN authentication.When the target device is configured for IPSec or SSL-based remote access VPNs using Microsoft Windows NT Domain authentication, a remote user may be able to bypass authentication and access the VPN.Other types of external authentication (i.e., LDAP, RADIUS, TACACS+, SDI, or local database) are not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsu65735 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3815.extra: A remote user can bypass VPN authentication.

CVE-2008-3817.title: Cisco ASA Bug in Hardware Crypto Accelerator Support Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3817.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted packets destined to the target device to trigger a memory leak in the hardware crypto accelerator initialization code. The target device may reload.The processing of packets traversing the device is not affected.The following features may be affected because they use the hardware crypto accelerator: * Clientless WebVPN, SSL VPN Client, and AnyConnect Connections * ASDM (HTTPS) Management Sessions * Cut-Through Proxy for Network Access * TLS Proxy for Encrypted Voice Inspection * IP Security (IPsec) Remote Access and Site-to-site VPNs * Secure Shell (SSH) AccessCisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsj25896 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3817.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2008-3818.title: Cisco ONS TCP Processing Flaw in Control Cards Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3818.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ONS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted TCP data stream to the control card to cause the target control card to reload.The synchronous data channels traversing the switch will drop traffic until the card finishes reloading. Asynchronous data channels traversing the switch are not affected.On the Cisco ONS 15600 hardware, if both the active and standby control cards reboot at the same time, the data channels traversing the switch are not affected.The following models are affected: * Cisco ONS 15310-CL and 15310-MA * Cisco ONS 15327 * Cisco ONS 15454 and 15454 SDH * Cisco ONS 15600Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsr41128 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3818.extra: A remote user can cause the target control card to reload.

CVE-2008-3821.title: Cisco IOS Input Validation Flaw in HTTP Server Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-3821.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco IOS HTTP server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The server does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco IOS HTTP Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Special characters are not properly escaped. Special characters in the ping parameter are also not properly escaped.Systems with the IOS HTTP server or HTTP secure server enabled are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug IDs CSCsi13344 and CSCsr72301 to these vulnerabilities.Adrian Pastor and Richard J. Brain of ProCheckUp and Nobuhiro Tsuji of NTT Data Security Corporation with co-operation of JPCert reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-3821.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco IOS HTTP Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-3825.title: pam_krb5 Credential Cache Permissions Bug Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3825.body: A vulnerability was reported in pam_krb5 on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.If the pam_krb5 "existing_ticket" option is configured to use an existing credential cache, a local user may be able to gain the privileges of another user.Stephane Bertin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3825.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3826.title: Condor Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges or Deny Service
CVE-2008-3826.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Condor. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can submit a job to cause the job to run with different user privileges [CVE-2008-3826].A local user with privileges to submit a job can trigger a stack overflow in the condor_schedd daemon [CVE-2008-3828].A local user with privileges to submit a job can cause the condor_schedd daemon to crash [CVE-2008-3829].If a configuration file contains an overlapping netmask in the allow or deny rules, the rule may be ignored [CVE-2008-3830].
CVE-2008-3826.extra: A local user can obtain condor_schedd daemon privileges on the target system.A local user can run jobs with the privileges of another user.A local user can cause the condor_schedd daemon to crash.

CVE-2008-3827.title: MPlayer Heap Overflow in Real Media Demuxer Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3827.body: A vulnerability was reported in MPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Real media video file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'libmpdemux/demux_real.c'.The vendor was notified on August 24, 2008.Felipe Andres Manzano reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2008-013.html
CVE-2008-3827.extra: A remote user can create a video file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3828.title: Condor Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges or Deny Service
CVE-2008-3828.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Condor. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can submit a job to cause the job to run with different user privileges [CVE-2008-3826].A local user with privileges to submit a job can trigger a stack overflow in the condor_schedd daemon [CVE-2008-3828].A local user with privileges to submit a job can cause the condor_schedd daemon to crash [CVE-2008-3829].If a configuration file contains an overlapping netmask in the allow or deny rules, the rule may be ignored [CVE-2008-3830].
CVE-2008-3828.extra: A local user can obtain condor_schedd daemon privileges on the target system.A local user can run jobs with the privileges of another user.A local user can cause the condor_schedd daemon to crash.

CVE-2008-3830.title: Condor Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges or Deny Service
CVE-2008-3830.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Condor. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can submit a job to cause the job to run with different user privileges [CVE-2008-3826].A local user with privileges to submit a job can trigger a stack overflow in the condor_schedd daemon [CVE-2008-3828].A local user with privileges to submit a job can cause the condor_schedd daemon to crash [CVE-2008-3829].If a configuration file contains an overlapping netmask in the allow or deny rules, the rule may be ignored [CVE-2008-3830].
CVE-2008-3830.extra: A local user can obtain condor_schedd daemon privileges on the target system.A local user can run jobs with the privileges of another user.A local user can cause the condor_schedd daemon to crash.

CVE-2008-3831.title: Linux Kernel i915 Driver May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3831.body: A vulnerability was reported in Linux Kernel. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the DRM_I915_HWS_ADDR ioctl() for Xserver to trigger memory corruption.The vulnerability resides in 'drivers/char/drm/i915_dma.c'.Olaf Kirch reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3831.extra: A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3834.title: D-Bus dbus_signature_validate() Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3834.body: A vulnerability was reported in D-Bus. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can supply a specially crafted message signature type to the dbus_signature_validate() function to the cause the target application to crash.schelte at wanadoo.nl reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3834.extra: A local user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-3835.title: Mozilla Firefox nsXMLDocument::OnChannelRedirect() Domain Validation Bug Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Domain Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-3835.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can conduct cross-domain scripting attacks.The nsXMLDocument::OnChannelRedirect() function does not properly validate JavaScript origin. A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by a target user, will execute arbitrary scripting code in the context of a different site. The code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are also affected.moz_bug_r_a4 reproted this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3835.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-3836.title: Mozilla Firefox feedWriter Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3836.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted feed that, when previewed by the target user, will execute arbitrary scripting code on the target system with chrome level privileges.The flaw resides in the feedWriter function.moz_bug_r_a4 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3836.extra: A remote user can create a feed that, when previewed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3838.title: Solaris NFS RPC Zones Bug Lets Local Administrative Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3838.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local administrative user can cause denial of service conditions.An administrative user in a non-global zone can exploit a flaw in the NFS Remote Procedure Calls (RPC) zones implementation to intercept and corrupt NFS traffic destined for other non-global zones on the system.Hewitt Associates reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3838.extra: A local administrative user can disrupt NFS traffic on the target system.

CVE-2008-3844.title: OpenSSH for Red Hat Enterprise Linux Packages May Have Been Compromised
CVE-2008-3844.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSH on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Certain packages may have been compromised.An intrusion incident was detected on certain systems used by Red Hat to distribute OpenSSH packages to customers. Certain OpenSSH packages may have been modified.Some OpenSSH packages relating to Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4 (i386 and x86_64 architectures only) and Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 (x86_64 architecture only) may have been modified.Red Hat reports that the compromise does not affect content distributed via Red Hat Network.
CVE-2008-3844.extra: Certain packages may have been modified to include malicious code.

CVE-2008-3852.title: IBM DB2 Unspecified CLR Stored Procedures Bug Has Unspecified Impact
CVE-2008-3852.body: A vulnerability was reported in DB2. The impact was not specified.The deployment of CLR stored procedures using an add-on to DB2 for Visual Studio creates an unspecified vulnerability with unspecified impact.IBM has assigned APAR JR28431 to this vulnerability.

CVE-2008-3860.title: Lotus Quickr Various Input Validation Holes Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-3860.body: A vulnerability was reported in Lotus Quickr. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Lotus Quickr software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned Defect IDs MBAM7DYHUD, MBAM7F9J3R, MBAM7ETH7L, and THES7EWKUK to these vulnerabilities.The html import functionality and rich text editor components are affected. The use of WYSIWYG editors is affected. The function for creating a new local group is also affected.
CVE-2008-3860.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Lotus Quickr software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-3862.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Stack Overflow in Parsing CGI Requests Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3862.body: A vulnerability was reported in OfficeScan. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP POST request to trigger a stack overflow in the processing of CGI requests and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor was notified on September 24, 2008.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2008-40/
CVE-2008-3862.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-3864.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3864.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan. A local user can gain elevated privileges. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-3865]. The code will run with System level privileges.A local user send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2008-3864].The vendor was notified on October 17, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3864.extra: A local user can gain System privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the firewall to crash.

CVE-2008-3864.title: Trend Micro Internet Security Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3864.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Trend Micro Internet Security. A local user can gain elevated privileges. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-3865]. The code will run with System level privileges.A local user send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2008-3864].The vendor was notified on October 17, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3864.extra: A local user can gain System privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the firewall to crash.

CVE-2008-3865.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3865.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan. A local user can gain elevated privileges. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-3865]. The code will run with System level privileges.A local user send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2008-3864].The vendor was notified on October 17, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3865.extra: A local user can gain System privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the firewall to crash.

CVE-2008-3865.title: Trend Micro Internet Security Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3865.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Trend Micro Internet Security. A local user can gain elevated privileges. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-3865]. The code will run with System level privileges.A local user send specially crafted data to the target firewall service (TmPfw.exe) to cause the target service to crash [CVE-2008-3864].The vendor was notified on October 17, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3865.extra: A local user can gain System privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the firewall to crash.

CVE-2008-3866.title: Trend Micro OfficeScan Lets Local Users Modify the Firewall Configuration
CVE-2008-3866.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro OfficeScan. A local user can modify the firewall configuration.The firewall service (TmPfw.exe) does not require authentication to modify the firewall configuration. A local user can send specially crafted packets to the service to modify the firewall settings.The vendor was notified on October 22, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3866.extra: A local user can modify the target firewall configuration.

CVE-2008-3866.title: Trend Micro Internet Security Lets Local Users Modify the Firewall Configuration
CVE-2008-3866.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro Internet Security. A local user can modify the firewall configuration.The firewall service (TmPfw.exe) does not require authentication to modify the firewall configuration. A local user can send specially crafted packets to the service to modify the firewall settings.The vendor was notified on October 22, 2008.Carsten Eiram of Secunia reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3866.extra: A local user can modify the target firewall configuration.

CVE-2008-3869.title: sadmind Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3869.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in sadmind. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root level privileges.Specially crafted RPC request parameters can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2008-3869].Specially crafted 'sadmind' requests sent via RPC can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2008-3870].The vendor was notified on October 30, 2008 and October 31, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3869.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3870.title: sadmind Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3870.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in sadmind. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root level privileges.Specially crafted RPC request parameters can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2008-3869].Specially crafted 'sadmind' requests sent via RPC can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2008-3870].The vendor was notified on October 30, 2008 and October 31, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3870.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3875.title: Solaris Kernel Lets Local Users Establish Covert Channels
CVE-2008-3875.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. Two local users can bypass security restrictions to establish a covert channel.Two local users can exploit flaws in Solaris kernel system calls to bypass the Solaris Trusted Extensions multi-level security policy or the isolation policy implemented using zones(5) or chroot(2) to establish a covert communications channel.
CVE-2008-3875.extra: Two local users can establish a covert channel.

CVE-2008-3876.title: Apple iPhone Password Locking Bug Lets Physically Local Users Bypass the Password to Access the Device
CVE-2008-3876.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iPhone. A physically local user can bypass the password locking feature to obtain information from the device.A physically local user can tap the 'Emergency Call' button and then double-tap the home button to gain access to contacts that are marked as favorites. This grants the user access to various applications and information on the target device.The original advisory is available at:http://forums.macrumors.com/showpost.php?p=6121914&postcount=118hdm42 on macrumors.com reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: On September 12, 2008, Apple reported a similar, or possibly the same, vulnerability identified as CVE-2008-3633 and credited to Matthew Yohe of The University of Iowa's Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering. Apple has indicated that the vulnerability reported by hdm42 had been previously submitted.]
CVE-2008-3876.extra: A physically local user can bypass the password locking feature to obtain information from the device.

CVE-2008-3889.title: Postfix Linux epoll File Descriptor Leak Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3889.body: A vulnerability was reported in Postfix. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger a file descriptor leak and then access the leaked file descriptor to cause performance degradation in Postfix or cause Postfix to shutdown.Only Linux-based systems are affected.
CVE-2008-3889.extra: A local user can cause Postfix performance to degrade or cause Postfix to shutdown.

CVE-2008-3890.title: FreeBSD Kernel amd64 swapgs Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3890.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the swapgs CPU instruction to be incorreclty executed, allowing the local user to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel level privileges.Systems running the 32 bit FreeBSD/i386 kernel are not affected, even if they have 64-bit capable CPUs.Nate Eldredge reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3890.extra: A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3900.title: Intel BIOS Discloses Boot Password to Local users
CVE-2008-3900.body: A vulnerability was reported in Intel BIOS. A local user can determine the boot password.The BIOS API that reads the boot password from the keyboard does not clear the password from memory after authentication. A local user with privileges to read memory can read the password from physical memory location 0x40:0x1e. The vendor was notified on July 15, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.ivizsecurity.com/research/preboot/preboot_whitepaper.pdfJonathan Brossard from iViZ Techno Solutions Pvt. Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3900.extra: A local user can determine the boot password.

CVE-2008-3912.title: Clam AntiVirus Memory Access Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3912.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an out-of-memory null dereference [CVE-2008-3912], memory leaks [CVE-2008-3913], and file descriptor leaks [CVE-2008-3914].The vulnerabilities reside in 'message.c' and 'mbox.c'.
CVE-2008-3912.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-3914.title: Clam AntiVirus Memory Access Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3914.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger an out-of-memory null dereference [CVE-2008-3912], memory leaks [CVE-2008-3913], and file descriptor leaks [CVE-2008-3914].The vulnerabilities reside in 'message.c' and 'mbox.c'.
CVE-2008-3914.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-3916.title: GNU ed Heap Overflow in strip_escapes() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3916.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNU ed. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when processed by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'signal.c'.
CVE-2008-3916.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3919.title: Ichitaro Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-3919.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ichitaro. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-3919.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-3932.title: Wireshark NCP Dissector and zlib Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3932.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted NCP data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash or enter an infinite loop.A remote user can also send a specially crafted zlib-compressed packet to cause the target service to crash.A user can create a specially crafted Tektronix .rf5 file that, when loaded, will cause Wireshark to crash.
CVE-2008-3932.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-3933.title: Wireshark NCP Dissector and zlib Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3933.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted NCP data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash or enter an infinite loop.A remote user can also send a specially crafted zlib-compressed packet to cause the target service to crash.A user can create a specially crafted Tektronix .rf5 file that, when loaded, will cause Wireshark to crash.
CVE-2008-3933.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-3934.title: Wireshark NCP Dissector and zlib Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3934.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted NCP data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target service to crash or enter an infinite loop.A remote user can also send a specially crafted zlib-compressed packet to cause the target service to crash.A user can create a specially crafted Tektronix .rf5 file that, when loaded, will cause Wireshark to crash.
CVE-2008-3934.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-3936.title: DreamBox Web Interface Can Be Crashed By Remote Users Requesting a Long URL
CVE-2008-3936.body: A vulnerability was reported in DreamBox. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to the web interface to cause the target web service to become unavailable. Some operating system functions may also become unavailable.A request of approximately 512 bytes can trigger this flaw.A demonstration exploit request (using the Attack Tool Kit) is provided: open|send GET http://192.168.0.1/aaa(...) HTTP/1.0\n\n|sleep|close|pattern_not_exists HTTP/1.# ### *The vendor was notified on April 30, 2008.The vulnerability was discovered by Marc Ruef.Marc Ruef of scip AG reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.scip.ch/cgi-bin/smss/showadvf.pl?id=3807
CVE-2008-3936.extra: A remote user can cause the web interface and some operating system functions to become unavailable.

CVE-2008-3947.title: OpenVMS Alpha Command Line Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-3947.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenVMS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted command line entry to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.Only Alpha-based systems are affected.Claes Nyberg, Christer Oberg, and James Tusini reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://deathrow.vistech.net/DEFCON16/VMS.PDF
CVE-2008-3947.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-3954.title: AlstraSoft Forum Pay Per Post Exchange Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-3954.body: A vulnerability was reported in AlstraSoft Forum Pay Per Post Exchange. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in the 'cat' parameter. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A demonstration exploit is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/6396r45c4l and P47r1ck reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3954.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-3960.title: IBM DB2 JDBC Applet Server Bug Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-3960.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the IBM DB2 JDBC Applet Server Service (DB2JDS) to cause the target service to crash.IBM has assigned APARs JR29274 to this vulnerabilities.Ariel Sanchez of ApplicationSecurity Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-3960.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2008-4018.title: IBM AIX swcons Bug Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2008-4018.body: A vulnerability was reported in AIX. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user in the system group can create arbitrary files with root permissions. This can be exploited to execute arbitrary code with root privileges.The vulnerability resides in the 'bos.rte.console' fileset swcons command.The vulnerability either resides in a fix for a vulnerability that was ostensibly patched in October 2007 or in the patch itself.iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4018.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4019.title: Microsoft Excel Object, Calendar, and Formula Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4019.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An Excel file with a specially crafted object can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3471].An Excel file in a VBA Performance Cache that contains a specially crafted calendar object can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-3477].An Excel file with a specially crafted formula embedded inside a cell can trigger code execution [CVE-2008-4019].Wushi via TippingPoint, Lionel d'Hauenens of Labo Skopia via iDefense, and Joshua J. Drake of iDefense reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4019.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4020.title: Microsoft Office CDO Protocol Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Scripting Code
CVE-2008-4020.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can access information on the target user's system.The CDO Protocol (cdo:) does not properly process the 'content-disposition: attachment' header. A remote user can create a CDO URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary scripting code on the target user's browser. The code can access information on the target user's system.NetAgent Co., Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4020.extra: A remote user can access information on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4023.title: Microsoft Active Directory LDAP Memory Allocation Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4023.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Active Directory. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted LDAP or LDAPS requests to trigger a memory allocation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Microsoft Windows 2000 Servers that are running as an Active Directory Server are affected.Paul Miseiko of nCircle reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4023.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4024.title: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4024.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted Word documents can trigger memory corruption errors [CVE-2008-4024, CVE-2008-4026].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents can trigger parsing errors [CVE-2008-4025, CVE-2008-4027, CVE-2008-4028, CVE-2008-4030, CVE-2008-4031]A specially crafted Word object can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2008-4837].Ricardo Narvaja of Core Security Technologies, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks, Wushi, working with TippingPoint, Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs, and Wushi and Ling, working with TippingPoint, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4024.extra: A remote user can create a Word or RTF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted Word documents can trigger memory corruption errors [CVE-2008-4024, CVE-2008-4026].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents can trigger parsing errors [CVE-2008-4025, CVE-2008-4027, CVE-2008-4028, CVE-2008-4030, CVE-2008-4031]A specially crafted Word object can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2008-4837].Ricardo Narvaja of Core Security Technologies, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks, Wushi, working with TippingPoint, Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs, and Wushi and Ling, working with TippingPoint, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4025.extra: A remote user can create a Word or RTF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted Word documents can trigger memory corruption errors [CVE-2008-4024, CVE-2008-4026].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents can trigger parsing errors [CVE-2008-4025, CVE-2008-4027, CVE-2008-4028, CVE-2008-4030, CVE-2008-4031]A specially crafted Word object can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2008-4837].Ricardo Narvaja of Core Security Technologies, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks, Wushi, working with TippingPoint, Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs, and Wushi and Ling, working with TippingPoint, reported these vulnerabilities.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted Word documents can trigger memory corruption errors [CVE-2008-4024, CVE-2008-4026].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents can trigger parsing errors [CVE-2008-4025, CVE-2008-4027, CVE-2008-4028, CVE-2008-4030, CVE-2008-4031]A specially crafted Word object can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2008-4837].Ricardo Narvaja of Core Security Technologies, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks, Wushi, working with TippingPoint, Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs, and Wushi and Ling, working with TippingPoint, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4028.extra: A remote user can create a Word or RTF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4029.title: Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4029.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain information from the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML with specially crafted XML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will trigger a flaw in the XML parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2007-0099]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will trigger a flaw in the error checking of external document type definitions (DTDs) and access information from arbitrary domains on the target user's browser [CVE-2008-4029].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will trigger a flaw in the processing of transfer-encoding headers and access information from arbitrary domains on the target user's browser [CVE-2008-4033].Gregory Fleischer, Stefano Di Paola of Minded Security, Robert Hansen of SecTheory, and Michal Zalewski reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4029.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain information from arbitrary domains on the target user's browser.

CVE-2008-4030.title: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4030.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted Word documents can trigger memory corruption errors [CVE-2008-4024, CVE-2008-4026].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents can trigger parsing errors [CVE-2008-4025, CVE-2008-4027, CVE-2008-4028, CVE-2008-4030, CVE-2008-4031]A specially crafted Word object can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2008-4837].Ricardo Narvaja of Core Security Technologies, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks, Wushi, working with TippingPoint, Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs, and Wushi and Ling, working with TippingPoint, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4030.extra: A remote user can create a Word or RTF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.
