The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted Word documents can trigger memory corruption errors [CVE-2008-4024, CVE-2008-4026].Specially crafted Rich Text Format (RTF) documents can trigger parsing errors [CVE-2008-4025, CVE-2008-4027, CVE-2008-4028, CVE-2008-4030, CVE-2008-4031]A specially crafted Word object can trigger a memory corruption error [CVE-2008-4837].Ricardo Narvaja of Core Security Technologies, Dyon Balding of Secunia Research, Yamata Li of Palo Alto Networks, Wushi, working with TippingPoint, Aaron Portnoy of TippingPoint DVLabs, and Wushi and Ling, working with TippingPoint, reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4031.extra: A remote user can create a Word or RTF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4032.title: Microsoft Office SharePoint Server Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Gain Administrative Access
CVE-2008-4032.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office SharePoint Server. A remote user can gain limited administrative access.A remote user can directly load certain URLs to bypass authentication and gain access to certain SharePoint administrative functions.With this access, the remote user can executing commands to cause excessive processing load on the target system. The remote user can also gain access to potentially sensitive information, such as internal path names and users email addresses. The remote user can also create scripts that will execute in the context of the site when other users access the site.
CVE-2008-4032.extra: A remote user can gain limited administrative access on the target application.

CVE-2008-4033.title: Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4033.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain information from the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML with specially crafted XML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will trigger a flaw in the XML parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2007-0099]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will trigger a flaw in the error checking of external document type definitions (DTDs) and access information from arbitrary domains on the target user's browser [CVE-2008-4029].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will trigger a flaw in the processing of transfer-encoding headers and access information from arbitrary domains on the target user's browser [CVE-2008-4033].Gregory Fleischer, Stefano Di Paola of Minded Security, Robert Hansen of SecTheory, and Michal Zalewski reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4033.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain information from arbitrary domains on the target user's browser.

CVE-2008-4036.title: Windows Kernel Virtual Address Descriptor Integer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-4036.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Kernel memory manager. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Memory Manager does not properly allocate memory when processing Virtual Address Descriptors (VADs). A local user can trigger an integer overflow to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with System privileges.
CVE-2008-4036.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4037.title: Windows Server Message Block NTLM Authentication Replay Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4037.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Server Message Block. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote SMB server can replay the target user's NTLM authentication credentials to the target user to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2008-4037.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4038.title: Windows Server Message Block Buffer Underflow Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4038.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows Server Message Block. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted SMB filename data to the target system that is sharing files or folders to trigger a buffer underflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Joshua Morin of Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4038.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4047.title: Novell Forum Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Tcl Code
CVE-2008-4047.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Forum. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to inject and execute arbitrary Tcl code.
CVE-2008-4047.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4058.title: Mozilla Firefox XPCnativeWrapper Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4058.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or XSLT that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger flaws in XPCnativeWrapper to execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges.Thunderbird and Seamonkey are also affected.moz_bug_r_a4 and Olli Pettay reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4058.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4059.title: Mozilla Firefox XPCnativeWrapper Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4059.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or XSLT that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger flaws in XPCnativeWrapper to execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges.Thunderbird and Seamonkey are also affected.moz_bug_r_a4 and Olli Pettay reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4059.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4060.title: Mozilla Firefox XPCnativeWrapper Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4060.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or XSLT that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger flaws in XPCnativeWrapper to execute arbitrary scripting code with chrome privileges.Thunderbird and Seamonkey are also affected.moz_bug_r_a4 and Olli Pettay reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4060.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4061.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4061.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause the target user's browser to crash and may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error. It may be possible to execute arbitrary code.The vulnerabilities reside in the browser engine and the image/graphics rendering code.Mozilla Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are affected.Igor Bukanov, Philip Taylor, Georgi Guninski, Antoine Labour, Jesse Ruderman, Bob Clary, Martijn Wargers, David Maciejak, and Drew Yao reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4061.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4062.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4062.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause the target user's browser to crash and may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error. It may be possible to execute arbitrary code.The vulnerabilities reside in the browser engine and the image/graphics rendering code.Mozilla Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are affected.Igor Bukanov, Philip Taylor, Georgi Guninski, Antoine Labour, Jesse Ruderman, Bob Clary, Martijn Wargers, David Maciejak, and Drew Yao reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4062.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4064.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4064.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause the target user's browser to crash and may be able to cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error. It may be possible to execute arbitrary code.The vulnerabilities reside in the browser engine and the image/graphics rendering code.Mozilla Thunderbird and SeaMonkey are affected.Igor Bukanov, Philip Taylor, Georgi Guninski, Antoine Labour, Jesse Ruderman, Bob Clary, Martijn Wargers, David Maciejak, and Drew Yao reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4064.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4065.title: Mozilla Firefox Character Processing Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-4065.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software strips certain BOM characters from JavaScript code and ignores certain HTML-escaped low surrogate characters. A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser.Dave Reed and Gareth Heyes reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4065.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the accessed site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-4066.title: Mozilla Firefox Character Processing Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-4066.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software strips certain BOM characters from JavaScript code and ignores certain HTML-escaped low surrogate characters. A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser.Dave Reed and Gareth Heyes reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4066.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the accessed site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-4067.title: Mozilla Firefox 'resource:' Protocol Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2008-4067.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'resource:' protocol URL that, when loaded by the target user, will access files on the target user's system.Boris Zbarsky and Georgi Guninski reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4067.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-4068.title: Mozilla Firefox 'resource:' Protocol Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Traverse the Directory
CVE-2008-4068.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'resource:' protocol URL that, when loaded by the target user, will access files on the target user's system.Boris Zbarsky and Georgi Guninski reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4068.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2008-4069.title: Mozilla Firefox XBM Decoder May Let Remote Users Access Uninitialized Memory Contents
CVE-2008-4069.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user may be able to access uninitialized memory.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access "random small chunks" of uninitialized memory. The vulnerability resides in the XBM decoder.SeaMonkey is also affected.Billy Hoffman reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4069.extra: A remote user may be able to access uninitialized memory.

CVE-2008-4070.title: Mozilla Thunderbird Heap Overflow in Processing Canceled Newsgroup Messages Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4070.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Thunderbird. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted message that, when loaded by the target user's newsreader, will trigger a heap overflow in the processing of canceled newsgroup messages and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Georgi Guninski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4070.extra: A remote user can create a newsgroup message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4094.title: Ruby on Rails Input Validation Flaw in ':limit' and ':offset' Parameters Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-4094.body: A vulnerability was reported in Rails. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in the ':limit' and ':offset' parameters. If an application uses unfiltered user-supplied input in making calls with those parameters, a remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The original advisory is available at:http://blog.innerewut.de/2008/6/16/why-you-should-upgrade-to-rails-2-1Jonathan Weiss reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4094.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-4105.title: Joomla! JRequest Initialization Bug Lets Remote Users Inject Characters into Variables
CVE-2008-4105.body: A vulnerability was reported in Joomla!. A remote user can modify certain variables.The system does not properly initialize variables set with JRequest::setVar. A remote user can inject characters into the returned data.Andrew Eddie reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4105.extra: A remote user can modify certain variables.

CVE-2008-4106.title: WordPress SQL Truncation and Password Generation Flaw Lets Remote Users Determine the Administrator's Password
CVE-2008-4106.body: A vulnerability was reported in WordPress. A remote user can determine the administrator's password.The user registration feature does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to cause the system to reset the administrator's password to a randomly generated value.The system uses mt_rand() to create passwords and password reset tokens. As a result, a user can predict generated passwords in certain cases.Because of the validation flaw and password generation flaw, a remote user may be able to obtain the newly reset administrative password.Wordpress systems that are configured to allow open registration are affected.The vendor was notified on August 17, 2008.Stefan Esser of SektionEins GmbH reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.sektioneins.de/advisories/SE-2008-05.txt
CVE-2008-4106.extra: A remote user can determine the administrator's password.

CVE-2008-4107.title: WordPress SQL Truncation and Password Generation Flaw Lets Remote Users Determine the Administrator's Password
CVE-2008-4107.body: A vulnerability was reported in WordPress. A remote user can determine the administrator's password.The user registration feature does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to cause the system to reset the administrator's password to a randomly generated value.The system uses mt_rand() to create passwords and password reset tokens. As a result, a user can predict generated passwords in certain cases.Because of the validation flaw and password generation flaw, a remote user may be able to obtain the newly reset administrative password.Wordpress systems that are configured to allow open registration are affected.The vendor was notified on August 17, 2008.Stefan Esser of SektionEins GmbH reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.sektioneins.de/advisories/SE-2008-05.txt
CVE-2008-4107.extra: A remote user can determine the administrator's password.

CVE-2008-4109.title: OpenSSH on Debian Lets Remote Users Prevent Logins
CVE-2008-4109.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSH on Debian. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user may be able to exploit a flaw in the signal handler (which calls a function that is not safe to be called asynchronously) to cause the ssh daemon to leave zombie processes. If enough processes are left, subsequent login attempts may be blocked.The vulnerability can be triggered by accident.
CVE-2008-4109.extra: A remote user can prevent ssh logins.

CVE-2008-4113.title: Linux Kernel Validation Flaw in sctp_getsockopt_hmac_ident() Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2008-4113.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can issue a specially crafted SCTP_HMAC_IDENT IOCTL request when the SCTP-AUTH extension is enabled to obtain potentially sensitive information.The vulnerability resides in 'net/sctp/socket.c'.
CVE-2008-4113.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2008-4114.title: Windows SMB Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4114.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted WRITE_ANDX SMB packets to an interface that uses a named pipe as the endpoint to cause the target server to crash.Javier Vicente Vallejo and Ruben Santamarta reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4114.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2008-4119.title: CA Service Desk Input Validation Holes in Several Web Forms Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-4119.body: A vulnerability was reported in CA Service Desk. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several web forms do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the CA Service Desk software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2008-4119.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the CA Service Desk software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-4121.title: cpCommerce Input Validation Holes in 'search.php' and 'sendtofriend.php' Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-4121.body: A vulnerability was reported in cpCommerce. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted POST request that, when submitted by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the cpCommerce software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'search' parameter in 'search.php' and the 'name' parameter in 'sendtofriend.php' are affected.The vendor was notified on September 23, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.datensalat.eu/~fabian/cve/CVE-2008-4121-cpcommerce.htmlFabian Fingerle reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4121.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the cpCommerce software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-4131.title: Solaris Text Editors (vi, ex, vedit, view, and edit) Tag Processing Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-4131.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Solaris text editors. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the processing of tags to execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of another user.The vi(1), ex(1), vedit(1), view(1), and edit(1) editors are affected."Eli the Bearded" reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4131.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4133.title: D-Link DIR-100 Router URL Filter Can Be Bypassed By Remote Users
CVE-2008-4133.body: A vulnerability was reported in the D-Link DIR-100 router. A remote user can bypass the URL filter.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to bypass the web proxy filter function. A long URL (such as a valid URL appended with a lengthy, non-existent parameter) can trigger this flaw.The vendor was notified on July 25, 2008.Marc Ruef at scip AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4133.extra: A remote user can bypass the URL filter to access ostensibly blocked web sites.

CVE-2008-4136.title: Personal FTP Server Bug in Processing RETR Commands Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4136.body: A vulnerability was reported in Personal FTP Server. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted RETR commands to cause the target service to crash.The original advisory is available at:http://shinnok.evonet.ro/vulns_html/pftp.htmlA demonstration exploit is available at:http://www.milw0rm.com/exploits/6458Shinnok raydenxy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4136.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-4160.title: Solaris UFS File System acl(2) Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris in acl(2). A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can exploit a flaw in the access control list (ACL) implementation for UFS file systems to trigger a kernel panic.Systems that have a UFS filesystem are affected.
CVE-2008-4160.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-4163.title: BIND Windows UDP Client Handler Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4163.body: A vulnerability was reported in BIND on Windows. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can cause the UDP client handler to shutdown.
CVE-2008-4163.extra: A remote user can cause the UDP client handler to shutdown.

CVE-2008-4171.title: Invision Power Board Input Validation Flaw in 'xmlout.php' Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2008-4171.body: A vulnerability was reported in Invision Power Board. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to trigger a flaw in the check_display_name() function and execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vulnerability resides in 'xmlout.php'.DarkFig reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4171.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2008-4193.title: Alt-N SecurityGateway Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4193.body: A vulnerability was reported in Alt-N SecurityGateway. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send an HTTP POST request with a specially crafted 'username' value to the remote administration port to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.securfrog reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/5718
CVE-2008-4193.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4195.title: Opera Frame Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Modify Framed Content in Arbitrary Domains
CVE-2008-4195.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can modify framed content from arbitrary sites.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will change the address of framed pages that the HTML has opened in other domains.
CVE-2008-4195.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will modify framed content from arbitrary sites.

CVE-2008-4196.title: Opera Unspecified Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-4196.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. No details were provided.Chris Weber of Casaba Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4196.extra: A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.

CVE-2008-4197.title: Opera Custom Shortcut or Menu Command Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4197.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.Custom shortcut and menu commands used to activate external applications may use uninitialized memory, potentially interpreting the data from memory as additional parameters to be passed to the external applications.A remote user can create a specially crafted shortcut or menu command that, when executed by the target user, may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.Michael A. Puls II reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4197.extra: A remote user can create a custom shortcut or menu command that, when executed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4199.title: Opera Feed Source File Links Let Remote Users Determine if Local Files Exist
CVE-2008-4199.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can determine if certain files exist on the target user's system.A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke links to feed source files on the target user's system to determine if the target file exists or not.
CVE-2008-4199.extra: A remote user can determine if certain files exist on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4200.title: Opera Subscription Feed Address Bug May Prevent the Correct Address From Being Displayed
CVE-2008-4200.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can prevent correct subscription feed information from be displayed.A remote user can cause the page address to be changed but the displayed address to remain when the target user subscribes to a news feed using the feed subscription button.
CVE-2008-4200.extra: A remote user can prevent correct subscription feed information from be displayed.

CVE-2008-4211.title: Mac OS X QuickLook Bug in Processing Excel Columns Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4211.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X QuickLook. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Microsoft Excel file that, when downloaded or viewed by the target user, will trigger a signed variable error in processing Excel columns and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems prior to version 10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-4211.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when downloaded or viewed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4214.title: Mac OS X Script Editor Uses Unsafe Temporary Files That Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-4214.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Script Editor. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Script Editor uses unsafe temporary files when opening application scripting dictionaries. A local user can cause the scripting dictionary to be written to an arbitrary path with the privileges of the target user running Script Editor.
CVE-2008-4214.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4215.title: Mac OS X Weblog ACL Bug May Let Remote Users Bypass Weblog Posting Access Controls
CVE-2008-4215.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Weblog. A remote user may be able to bypass weblog posting access controls.When a user with multiple short names is added to the access control list for a Weblog posting, the Weblog server may not properly enforce the access controls.Systems running Mac OS X Server v10.4.x are affected.
CVE-2008-4215.extra: A remote user may be able to bypass weblog posting access controls.

CVE-2008-4216.title: Safari WebKit Plug-in Interface Lets Remote Users Launch Local Applications
CVE-2008-4216.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can launch local files to obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the WebKit plug-in interface and launch local URLs. This can be exploited to obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's system.Billy Rios of Microsoft and Nitesh Dhanjani of Ernst & Young reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4216.extra: A remote user can launch local files to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2008-4217.title: Mac OS X Buffer Overflow in Processing CPIO Archives Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4217.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted CPIO archive that, when downloaded or viewed by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4217.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4218.title: Mac OS X Kernel Integer Overflows in i386_set_ldt() and i386_get_ldt() Let Local Users Gain System Privileges
CVE-2008-4218.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Mac OS X kernel. A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke the i386_set_ldt() and i386_get_ldt() system calls to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with system privileges.PowerPC systems are not affected.Richard Vaneeden of IOActive, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4218.extra: A local user can obtain system privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4219.title: Mac OS X Kernel NFS Execution Exception Processing Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4219.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Mac OS X kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can execute a specially crafted executable that links dynamic libraries on an NFS share to cause the target system to enter an infinite loop and then shutdown.Ben Loer of Princeton University reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4219.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2008-4220.title: Mac OS X Libsystem Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-4220.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Libsystem. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke an application that uses the inet_net_pton API to potentially cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target application [CVE-2008-4220].A local user can invoke an application that uses the strptime API and supply a specially crafted date string to potentially cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target application [CVE-2008-4221].
CVE-2008-4220.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4221.title: Mac OS X Libsystem Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-4221.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Libsystem. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke an application that uses the inet_net_pton API to potentially cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target application [CVE-2008-4220].A local user can invoke an application that uses the strptime API and supply a specially crafted date string to potentially cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the target application [CVE-2008-4221].
CVE-2008-4221.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-4222.title: Mac OS X TCP Processing Flaw in natd Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4222.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X natd. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.If Internet Sharing is enabled, a remote user can send specially crafted TCP packets to trigger an infinite loop in natd.Alex Rosenberg of Ohmantics and Gary Teter of Paizo Publishing reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4222.extra: A remote user can cause the target natd service to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2008-4223.title: Mac OS X Podcast Producer Lets Remote Users Gain Administrative Access
CVE-2008-4223.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Podcast Producer. A remote user can gain administrative access on the target application.A remote user can bypass authentication to gain access to the administrative functions of Podcast Producer.
CVE-2008-4223.extra: A remote user can gain access to the administrative functions of Podcast Producer.

CVE-2008-4224.title: Mac OS X UDF Volume Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4224.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted ISO file that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's system to shutdown.Mauro Notarianni of PCAX Solutions reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4224.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's system to shutdown.

CVE-2008-4225.title: Libxml2 Integer Overflow in xmlBufferResize() Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4225.body: A vulnerability was reported in Libxml2. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted XML that, when loaded by the target application using libxml2, will trigger an integer overflow in the xmlBufferResize() function and cause the application to enter an infinite loop.The vulnerability resides in 'tree.c'.Drew Yao of Apple Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4225.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-4226.title: Libxml2 Integer Overflow in xmlSAX2Characters() May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4226.body: A vulnerability was reported in Libxml2. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted XML content that, when processed by the target application using libxml2, will trigger an integer overflow in the xmlSAX2Characters() function and crash the target application or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vulnerability resides in 'SAX2.c'.Drew Yao from Apple Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4226.extra: A remote user can create XML content that, when loaded by the target application, may execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4227.title: Apple iPhone May Use a Less Secure PPTP VPN Encryption Level
CVE-2008-4227.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iPhone. The system may use a less secure VPN connection.The device may revert to use a previously configured lower encryption level for PPTP VPN connections.Stephen Butler of the University of Illinois of Urbana-Champaign reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4227.extra: The system may use a less secure VPN connection than intended.

CVE-2008-4228.title: Apple iPhone Lets Physically Local Users Make Arbitrary Calls in Emergency Mode
CVE-2008-4228.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iPhone. A physically local user can make arbitrary calls when in emergency mode.A physically local user can make an emergency call to any number [CVE-2008-4228].When a device is restored from backup, the Passcode Lock settings may be removed [CVE-2008-4229]. A physically local user can access the device without supplying the passcode. Nolen Scaife reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4228.extra: A physically local user can make arbitrary calls when in emergency mode.A physically local user can access the device without using the passcode.

CVE-2008-4231.title: Apple iPhone Safari Bugs Let Remote Users Spoof the Interface and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4231.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iPhone. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can spoof the user interface.A remote user can create HTML with specially crafted HTML table elements that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-4231].Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create HTML with a specially crafted iframe element that, when loaded by the target user, will display content outside the boundaries of the iframe [CVE-2008-4232]. This can be exploited to spoof the user interface.John Resig of Mozilla Corporation reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4231.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target device or spoof the user interface.

CVE-2008-4234.title: Mac OS X CoreTypes May Not Warn Users Before Opening Unsafe File Types
CVE-2008-4234.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X CoreTypes. A user may not be warned before opening certain unsafe file types.A remote user can create a specially crafted file type that, when downloaded by the target user, will cause the system to fail to warn the user of the potentially unsafe file type.Content types that have executable permissions but no specific application association are affected.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2008-4234.extra: A user may not be warned before opening certain unsafe file types.

CVE-2008-4236.title: Apple Type Services Bug in Processing Embedded Fonts Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-4236.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Apple Type Services. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a PDF file containing a specially crafted embedded font that, when loaded by the target user, will cause Apple Type Services to enter an infinite loop.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.Michael Samarin and Mikko Vihonen of Futurice Ltd. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4236.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will cause denial of service conditions on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4242.title: ProFTPD Request Processing Bug Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2008-4242.body: A vulnerability was reported in ProFTPD. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.Long 'ftp://' URLs may be split by the FTP server into multiple requests. A remote user can create a specially crafted 'ftp://' URL that, when loaded by the authenticated target user, will cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target FTP server with the privileges of the target user.Maksymilian Arciemowicz of securityreason.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4242.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed by the authenticated target user on the target ProFTPD site.

CVE-2008-4247.title: BSD ftpd Request Processing Bug Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2008-4247.body: A vulnerability was reported in ftpd on BSD-based systems. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.Long 'ftp://' URLs may be split by the FTP server into multiple requests. A remote user can create a specially crafted 'ftp://' URL that, when loaded by the authenticated target user, will cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target FTP server with the privileges of the target user.Maksymilian Arciemowicz of securityreason.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4247.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed by the authenticated target user on the target ftpd site.

CVE-2008-4247.title: NetBSD ftpd Request Processing Bug Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2008-4247.body: A vulnerability was reported in NetBSD ftpd. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.Long 'ftp://' URLs may be split by the FTP server into multiple requests. A remote user can create a specially crafted 'ftp://' URL that, when loaded by the authenticated target user, will cause arbitrary commands to be executed on the target FTP server with the privileges of the target user.Maksymilian Arciemowicz of securityreason.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-4247.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary commands to be executed by the authenticated target user on the target NetBSD ftpd site.

CVE-2008-4250.title: Windows Server Service RPC Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4250.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows in the Server service. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted RPC request to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor notes that a "wormable" exploit is possible on Windows XP and older operating systems.The vendor also notes that this vulnerability is being actively exploited.Windows 7 Pre-Beta is also affected.
CVE-2008-4250.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-4252.title: Microsoft Visual Basic DataGrid/FlexGrid/Heirarchival FlexGrid/Windows Common/Charts ActiveX Controls Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4252.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Visual Basic in various ActiveX controls. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or AVI content that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke an ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The DataGrid ActiveX control is affected [CVE-2008-4252]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: cde57a43-8b86-11d0-b3c6-00a0c90aea82The FlexGrid ActiveX control is affected [CVE-2008-4253]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 6262d3a0-531b-11cf-91f6-c2863c385e30The Hierarchical FlexGrid ActiveX control is affected [CVE-2008-4254]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 0ECD9B64-23AA-11d0-B351-00A0C9055D8EThe Windows Common ActiveX control is affected by specially crafted AVI content [CVE-2008-4255]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: B09DE715-87C1-11d1-8BE3-0000F8754DA1The Charts ActiveX control is affected [CVE-2008-4256]. The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: 3A2B370C-BA0A-11d1-B137-0000F8753F5DADLab of VenusTech, Jason Medeiros of Affiliated Computer Services, Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research, Mark Dowd, working with McAfee Avert Labs, Brett Moore of Insomnia Security, CHkr_D591, working with TippingPoint, Michal Bucko, working with CERT/CC, and Symantec s Security Intelligence Analysis Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4252.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4258.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer HTML Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4258.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted navigation method calls can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4258]Specially crafted HTML objects can access uninitialized memory and trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4259].Specially crafted HTML that accesses deleted objects can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4260].The rendering of embedded objects can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4261].Carlo Di Dato (aka shinnai), Brett Moore, working with TippingPoint, Chris Weber of Casaba Security, and Jun Mao of Verisign iDefense Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4258.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4259.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Specially crafted navigation method calls can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4258]Specially crafted HTML objects can access uninitialized memory and trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4259].Specially crafted HTML that accesses deleted objects can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4260].The rendering of embedded objects can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2008-4261].Carlo Di Dato (aka shinnai), Brett Moore, working with TippingPoint, Chris Weber of Casaba Security, and Jun Mao of Verisign iDefense Labs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4259.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-4264.title: Microsoft Excel Formula, Object, and Global Array Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-4264.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an Excel file with a specially crafted formula that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a pointer corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-4264]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-4265]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-4266]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Joshua J. Drake of VeriSign iDefense Labs, Claes M Nyberg of signedness.org, and Dyon Balding of Secunia reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2008-4264.extra: A remote user can create an Excel file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.
