CVE-2008-5246.title: xine-lib Bugs in Processing Media Files Lets Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5246.body: A vulnerability was reported in xine-lib. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file with a specially crafted ID3 value that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted Real file may also be able to trigger a buffer overflow in the Real demuxer.A remote user can create specially crafted media files (e.g., Ogg format) that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a crash [CVE-2008-3231].
CVE-2008-5246.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system or cause the target player to crash.

CVE-2008-5259.title: DivX Web Player Heap Overflow in Processing Stream Format Chunks Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5259.body: A vulnerability was reported in DivX Web Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a DivX file with specially crafted stream format chunks that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on December 17, 2008.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5259.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-5285.title: Wireshark SMTP Dissector Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-5285.body: A vulnerability was reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted SMTP data to cause the target service to enter a "large loop".Security Vulnerability Research Team of Bkis (SVRT-Bkis) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5285.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-5286.title: CUPS Integer Overflow in _cupsImageReadPNG() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5286.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PNG file that, when processed by the target system, will trigger an integer overflow in _cupsImageReadPNG() and execute arbitrary code on the target system.iljavs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5286.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target system, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-5304.title: TWiki Input Validation Flaw in %URLPARAM{}% Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-5304.body: A vulnerability was reported in TWiki. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the TWiki %URLPARAM{}% parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Marc Schoenefeld and TWiki:Main.SteveMilner of Red Hat Security Response Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5304.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-5305.title: TWiki Input Validation Flaw in %SEARCH{}% Parameter Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2008-5305.body: A vulnerability was reported in TWiki. A remote user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote user can submit a specially crafted %SEARCH{}% parameter value containing a Perl backtick (``) character to execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system. The commands will run with the privileges of the target web service.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/twiki/bin/view/Main/WebSearch?search=%25SEARCH%7Bdate%3D%22P%60pr+-%3F%60%22+search%3D%22xyzzy%22%7D%25&scope=allThe vulnerability resides in 'twiki/lib/TWiki/Time.pm'.Peter Allor, IBM Internet Security Systems, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5305.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary operating system commands on the target system.

CVE-2008-5314.title: Clam AntiVirus cli_check_jpeg_exploit() Recursive Loop Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-5314.body: A vulnerability was reported in Clam AntiVirus. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted JPEG file that, when processed by the target system, will trigger a stack overflow and cause the Clam AntiVirus process to crash.Ilja van Sprundel reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5314.extra: A remote user can create a JPEG file that, when processed by the target application, will cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2008-5330.title: Rational ClearCase Input Validation Flaw in Rational Web Platform Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2008-5330.body: A vulnerability was reported in Rational ClearCase. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target authenticated user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Rational Web Platform (RWP) software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/ccrc/??''??script?alert(1234)?/script?=1IBM has assigned APAR PK70972 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5330.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Rational ClearCase software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2008-5346.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment zip File Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Read Memory Locations
CVE-2008-5346.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE). A remote user can read certain memory locations on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet or application and zip file that, when loaded by the target user, will read arbitrary memory locations in the process that the applet or application is running in.The University of Oulu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5346.extra: A remote user can read certain memory locations on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-5347.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment JAX-WS and JAXB Lets Remote Applets Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-5347.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE) in the JAX-WS and JAXB packages. A remote user can read/write files and execute applications on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet or application that, when loaded by the target user, will read and write local files or execute applications on the target system with the privileges of the target user.Adam Gowdiak reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5347.extra: A remote user can create an applet or application that, when loaded by the target user, will read/write files and execute applications on the target user's system with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2008-5350.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment Lets Remote Users View Directory Contents
CVE-2008-5350.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE). A remote user can view the target user's home directory.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet or application that, when loaded by the target user, will list the contents of the home directory of the target user.Henri Torgemane and Sami Koivu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5350.extra: A remote user can view the target user's home directory listing.

CVE-2008-5351.title: Java Runtime Environment UTF-8 Decoding Bug May Let Users Bypass Access Restrictions
CVE-2008-5351.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE). A remote user may be able to bypass URL-based access controls.The Unicode Transformation Format-8 (UTF-8) decoder accepts encodings that are longer than the "shortest" form. A user may be able to exploit this to bypass access controls on systems that expect the JRE UTF-8 decoder to reject non-shortest form sequences.[Editor's note: Sun indicates that this is not a vulnerability in Java.]
CVE-2008-5351.extra: A remote user may be able to bypass URL-based access controls.

CVE-2008-5352.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment Buffer Overflow in unpack200 Utility Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5352.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java Runtime Environment (JRE). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted applet that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the "unpack200" JAR unpacking utility and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on October 2, 2008.regenrecht reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2008-5352.extra: A remote user can create an applet that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-5355.title: Sun Java Runtime Environment Java Update Fails to Validate Digital Signatures
CVE-2008-5355.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Sun Java Update feature. A remote user with control of the network may be able to cause arbitrary code to be downloaded to the target user's system.The Java Runtime Environment (JRE) Java Update mechanism does not validate the digital signature of downloaded JRE updates.Francisco Amato reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5355.extra: A remote user with control of the network may be able to cause arbitrary code to be downloaded to the target user's system.

CVE-2008-5384.title: IBM AIX 'crontab' Command Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-5384.body: A vulnerability was reported in the IBM AIX 'crontab' command. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with 'aix.system.config.cron' can invoke '/usr/bin/crontab' to gain elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned APARs IZ34783 IZ34478 IZ30248 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5384.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-5385.title: IBM AIX 'enq' Command Lets Local Users Delete Arbitrary Files
CVE-2008-5385.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can delete arbitrary files on the target system.If a print queue is defined in '/etc/qconfig', a local user can invoke '/usr/bin/enq' to remove arbitrary files on the target system.The vendor has assigned APARs IZ34785, IZ34481, and IZ33088 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5385.extra: A local user can delete arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2008-5386.title: IBM AIX 'ndp' Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-5386.body: A vulnerability was reported in the IBM AIX 'ndp' command. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke '/usr/sbin/ndp' to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges if the netcd daemon is running.The vendor has assigned APARs IZ35181, IZ35170, and IZ35209 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5386.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-5387.title: IBM AIX 'autoconf6' Buffer Overflow Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2008-5387.body: A vulnerability was reported in the IBM AIX 'autoconf6' command. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with RBAC 'aix.network.config.tcpip' privileges can invoke '/usr/sbin/autoconf6' to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned APARs IZ34753, IZ34393, and IZ30231 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5387.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2008-5401.title: Trillian Buffer Overflow in Creating Tooltips Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5401.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trillian. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted image via AIM. When the target user creates a tooltip for the image, a stack overflow may occur and arbitrary code may be executed on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on November 10, 2008.Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-5401.extra: A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.

CVE-2008-5402.title: Trillian Bug in Processing IMG SRC ID Tag Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5402.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trillian. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted IMG SRC ID XML tag to trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on November 10, 2008.Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-5402.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-5403.title: Trillian Buffer Overflow in Processing AIM XML Tags May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5403.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trillian. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted XML tag via AIM to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on November 24, 2008.Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-5403.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-5407.title: Symantec Backup Exec Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2008-5407.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Backup Exec remote agents. A remote user can view and delete files on the target system. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can connect to the target Backup Exec agent and bypass authentication to obtain or deleted files on the target system. A remote user can also trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Renaud Deraison and Nicolas Pouvesle of Tenable Network Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5407.extra: A remote user can view and delete files on the target system.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-5408.title: Symantec Backup Exec Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication and Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target System
CVE-2008-5408.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Backup Exec remote agents. A remote user can view and delete files on the target system. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can connect to the target Backup Exec agent and bypass authentication to obtain or deleted files on the target system. A remote user can also trigger a buffer overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system.Renaud Deraison and Nicolas Pouvesle of Tenable Network Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2008-5408.extra: A remote user can view and delete files on the target system.A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-5410.title: Solaris OpenSSL PKCS#11 Engine Session Cache Bug Lets Remote or Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2008-5410.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris in the OpenSSL PKCS#11 engine. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote or local user can invoke an application that uses the OpenSSL PKCS#11 engine and potentially cause certain cryptographic operations to fail. The RSA_sign and RSA_verify functions are affected.
CVE-2008-5410.extra: A remote or local user can cause certain cryptographic operations to fail.

CVE-2008-5416.title: Microsoft SQL Server Memory Overwrite Bug in sp_replwritetovarbin May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5416.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SQL Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted parameters to the sp_replwritetovarbin extended stored procedure to overwrite memory and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target SQL service.The vendor was notified on April 17, 2008.Bernhard Mueller of SEC Consult Vulnerability Lab reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.sec-consult.com/files/20081209_mssql-000-sp_replwritetovarbin_memwrite.txt
CVE-2008-5416.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the target SQL service.

CVE-2008-5416.title: Microsoft SQL Server Heap Overflow Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5416.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SQL Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger a heap overflow in the 'sp_replwritetovarbin' MSSQL extended stored procedure and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Exploit code is publicly available.Microsoft SQL Server 2000 Desktop Engine (MSDE) is affected.Windows Internal Database (WYukon) is affected.Microsoft SQL Server versions 7.0 SP4, 2005 SP3, and 2008 are not affected.[Editor's note: The same vulnerability was reported on December 9, 2008 by SEC Consult. See CVE-2008-5416, Alert ID 1021363. This Alert will be merged with the previous Alert and then this Alert will be deleted from our database.]
CVE-2008-5416.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2008-5417.title: OpenVMS Lets Local Users Modify the OSIT$NAMES Logical Name Table
CVE-2008-5417.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenVMS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can modify the OSIT$NAMES logical name table.
CVE-2008-5417.extra: A local user can can modify the OSIT$NAMES logical name table.

CVE-2008-5419.title: EMC ControlCenter SAN Manager Buffer Overflow in Processing SST_CTGTRANS Requests Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2008-5419.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC ControlCenter SAN Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can a send specially crafted SST_CTGTRANS request to the SAN Manager Master Agent service (msragent.exe) on TCP port 10444 to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with System privileges.The vendor was notified on September 23, 2008.An anonymous reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-5419.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with System privileges.

CVE-2008-5420.title: EMC ControlCenter SAN Manager SST_SENDFILE Request Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users View Arbitrary Files
CVE-2008-5420.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC ControlCenter SAN Manager. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted SST_SENDFILE request to the SAN Manager Master Agent service (msragent.exe) on TCP port 10444 to view arbitrary files on target system.The vendor was notified on November 10, 2008An anonymous reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2008-5420.extra: A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2008-5422.title: Sun Ray Server Lets Remote Users Obtain the Administrative Password in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-5422.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Ray Server. A remote user can obtain the Sun Ray administration password.With access to this password, the user can gain access to the Sun Ray Data Store and the Sun Ray Administration GUI.
CVE-2008-5422.extra: A remote user can obtain the Sun Ray administration password.

CVE-2008-5423.title: Sun Ray Server Lets Local Users Obtain the Administrative Password in Certain Cases
CVE-2008-5423.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Ray Server and Sun Ray Windows Connector. A local user can determine the administrative password.A local user can gain access to the Sun Ray administration password while the product is being configured.With access to this password, the user can gain remote access to the Sun Ray Data Store and the Sun Ray Administration GUI.
CVE-2008-5423.extra: A local user can gain access to the Sun Ray administration password while the product is being configured.

CVE-2008-5459.title: WebLogic Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code, Acces and Modify Information, and Deny Service
CVE-2008-5459.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in WebLogic. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the WebLogic Server Plugins for Apache, Sun, and IIS web servers and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-5457].Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/8336Other vulnerabilities exist in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Portal.A remote user can affect the confidentiality and integrity of data on the target system.A remote user can cause unspecified denial of service conditions.No details were provided.The following researchers reported these and other Oracle vulnerabilities:Deniz Cevik of Intellect; Andy Davis of Information Risk Management Plc (IRM Plc); Esteban Martinez Fayo of Application Security, Inc.; Franz Huell of Red Database Security; Wasim Iqbal; Joxean Koret; Joxean Koret of TippingPoint (3com); Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Sasa Kos of ACROS Security; Code Audit Labs of iDefense; David Litchfield of NGS Software; Zhenhua Liu of Fortinet, Inc.; Andy Sch. of Centre for the Protection of National Infrastructure; Daiki Fukumori [Secure Sky Technology] of JPCERT/CC Vulnerability Handling Team; Geoff Whittington of Assurent Secure Technologies; and Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet, Inc.
CVE-2008-5459.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can access and modify data on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2008-5460.title: WebLogic Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitary Code, Acces and Modify Information, and Deny Service
CVE-2008-5460.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in WebLogic. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the WebLogic Server Plugins for Apache, Sun, and IIS web servers and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-5457].Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/8336Other vulnerabilities exist in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Portal.A remote user can affect the confidentiality and integrity of data on the target system.A remote user can cause unspecified denial of service conditions.No details were provided.The following researchers reported these and other Oracle vulnerabilities:Deniz Cevik of Intellect; Andy Davis of Information Risk Management Plc (IRM Plc); Esteban Martinez Fayo of Application Security, Inc.; Franz Huell of Red Database Security; Wasim Iqbal; Joxean Koret; Joxean Koret of TippingPoint (3com); Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Sasa Kos of ACROS Security; Code Audit Labs of iDefense; David Litchfield of NGS Software; Zhenhua Liu of Fortinet, Inc.; Andy Sch. of Centre for the Protection of National Infrastructure; Daiki Fukumori [Secure Sky Technology] of JPCERT/CC Vulnerability Handling Team; Geoff Whittington of Assurent Secure Technologies; and Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet, Inc.
CVE-2008-5460.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can access and modify data on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the WebLogic Server Plugins for Apache, Sun, and IIS web servers and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2008-5457].Some demonstration exploit code is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/8336Other vulnerabilities exist in WebLogic Server and WebLogic Portal.A remote user can affect the confidentiality and integrity of data on the target system.A remote user can cause unspecified denial of service conditions.No details were provided.The following researchers reported these and other Oracle vulnerabilities:Deniz Cevik of Intellect; Andy Davis of Information Risk Management Plc (IRM Plc); Esteban Martinez Fayo of Application Security, Inc.; Franz Huell of Red Database Security; Wasim Iqbal; Joxean Koret; Joxean Koret of TippingPoint (3com); Alexander Kornbrust of Red Database Security; Sasa Kos of ACROS Security; Code Audit Labs of iDefense; David Litchfield of NGS Software; Zhenhua Liu of Fortinet, Inc.; Andy Sch. of Centre for the Protection of National Infrastructure; Daiki Fukumori [Secure Sky Technology] of JPCERT/CC Vulnerability Handling Team; Geoff Whittington of Assurent Secure Technologies; and Xiaopeng Zhang of Fortinet, Inc.
CVE-2008-5461.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can access and modify data on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.
